original: @1b # // rgyal ba khyab bdag rdo rje 'chang chen po dpal ldan bla ma dam pa dang mkhyen rab kyi mnga' bdag rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //

translated: Homage to the Victorious One, the all-pervading lord, the great Vajradhara, the glorious and holy master, and to the lord of wisdom, the venerable Manjushri.

original: rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: rgya gar skad du /

original: p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na s'u tra /
analyzed: p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na s'u tra /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: brda sprod pa p'a ni ni'i mdo /🔽aa ai aun /
analyzed: brda sprod pa p'a ni ni'i mdo / aa ai aun /
translated: Ai un.🔽Rik e ong.

original: ri lik ae aong /
analyzed: ri lik ae aong /
translated: Ai o uc.

original: aee aootsa / ha ya wa ra ta lan /
analyzed: aee aootsa / ha ya wa ra ta lan /

analyzed: nya ma nga na nam / dzha bha nya gha dha dha sha /

analyzed: dza ba ga da da sha / kha pha tsha tha tha tsa ta ta pa /

original: ka pa ya sha sha sar /
analyzed: ka pa ya sha sha sar /
translated: Ka pa ya sha sha sar.🔽Hal.

original: hal / ha yig la sogs pa rnams la aa yig brjod pa'i don no //
analyzed: hal / ha yig la sogs pa rnams la aa yig brjod pa'i don no //

original: nye ba'i yul la aa tsa dang rjes su sna ldan 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i yul la aa tsa dang rjes su sna ldan 'gro ba'o //
translated: In the case of the near-place, A tsa and the following are endowed with a nose.

original: de dbyi'o // mtha'i hala'o //
analyzed: de dbyi'o // mtha'i hala'o //
translated: That is the vowel. The final is Hal.

original: dang po dang mtha'i 'gro ba'i bar dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: dang po dang mtha'i 'gro ba'i bar dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The beginning and the end are connected with the going.

original: au a'u au&amp ;
analyzed: au a'u au&amp ;

original: yi dus lta bu aatsa thung ngu ring po plu ta'o //
analyzed: yi dus lta bu aatsa thung ngu ring po plu ta'o //
translated: In the case of the time of the vowel, A tsa is short and long. Pluta.

original: kha sna nas brjod pa dag rjes su sna ldan no //🔽aan aut 'gro ba yang rkyen la 'dra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: kha sna nas brjod pa dag rjes su sna ldan no // aan aut 'gro ba yang rkyen la 'dra ba ma yin no //
translated: The suffix ana is added to the root vac meaning to speak, and the suffix anas is added to the root na meaning nose.

original: ta pha rol de'i dus kyi'o //
analyzed: ta pha rol de'i dus kyi'o //
translated: The suffix ut is added to the root gam meaning to go, and the suffix ta is added to the root para meaning the other side.

original: skye gnas mnyam pa'i rigs mthun 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: skye gnas mnyam pa'i rigs mthun 'dra ba'o //

analyzed: a'at aeetsa 'phel ba'o // aat aeng yon tan no //

original: shatu yi sha tu'o //
analyzed: shatu yi sha tu'o //

analyzed: ta da dag gi su la sa mtha' ma yin pa la'o //

analyzed: nge dang po dag gi aama'o // su la tva aa ha'o //

analyzed: lhag ma la dbyi'o //

analyzed: gnyis tshig la: yu wa: a'awa dag go //

original: dang po'i 'ang gnyis tshig brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: dang po'i 'ang gnyis tshig brjod pa la'o //

original: dzas la y'u ya wa ya'o ;
analyzed: dzas la y'u ya wa ya'o ;

original: / gcig tshig la tva ma dag go //
analyzed: / gcig tshig la tva ma dag go //

analyzed: gnyis pa la 'ang ngo // shas kyi na'o // aatsa la ya'o //

original: yushmad aasmad dag gi kun nas ma bsgyur ba la'o //🔽nge la tu bhya mah++ya dag go //
analyzed: yushmad aasmad dag gi kun nas ma bsgyur ba la'o // nge la tu bhya mah++ya dag go //

original: bhyas kyi bhyam'o //
analyzed: bhyas kyi bhyam'o //

original: gcig tshig gi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: gcig tshig gi 'ang ngo //

original: lnga pa'i aata\'o //🔽ngas la ta wa ma ma dag go //🔽yushmad aasmad dag las ngas kyi aasha'o //
analyzed: lnga pa'i aata\'o // ngas la ta wa ma ma dag go // yushmad aasmad dag las ngas kyi aasha'o //

original: s'am gyi a'ak ma'o //
analyzed: s'am gyi a'ak ma'o //
translated: The first of the two sa and ma is also āk.

original: yushmad aasmad dag gi drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams gnas pa dag gi w'am noo dag go //
analyzed: yushmad aasmad dag gi drug pa bzhi pa gnyis pa rnams gnas pa dag gi w'am noo dag go //

original: mang tshig gi was nas dag go //
analyzed: mang tshig gi was nas dag go //
translated: The plural va is from nas.

original: gcig tshig gi te me dag go //
analyzed: gcig tshig gi te me dag go //
translated: The singular te and me are from ta.

original: gnyis pa'i tv'a m'a dag go //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i tv'a m'a dag go //

original: tsa b'a aa ha ha ae wa rnams sbyor ba la ma yin no //
analyzed: tsa b'a aa ha ha ae wa rnams sbyor ba la ma yin no //
translated: The ca, va, a, ha, ha, and e are not used in compounds.

original: lta ba'i @5b don rnams kyi 'ang mig gis mi mthong ba la'o //
analyzed: lta ba'i @5b don rnams kyi 'ang mig gis mi mthong ba la'o //

original: p'ad kyi pada'o //
analyzed: p'ad kyi pada'o //
translated: The pada is of the foot.🔽The it is of the going, not of the halupadeśa.

original: ait 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa'i hal gyi au pa dh'a'i ka\ da\ 'gro ba la'o //🔽aatsa'i 'o // tsa la'o //
analyzed: ait 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa'i hal gyi au pa dh'a'i ka\ da\ 'gro ba la'o // aatsa'i 'o // tsa la'o //

analyzed: bi shvak de wa dag gi'ang ti'i aa dri aanytsa ba 'gro ba'i rkyen can la'o //

original: aa das kyi sa'i da la au ste da'i 'ang ma'o //
analyzed: aa das kyi sa'i da la au ste da'i 'ang ma'o //

original: aut las a'it 'o //🔽sam gyi sa mi'o //
analyzed: aut las a'it 'o // sam gyi sa mi'o //
translated: The ut is of the ā.🔽The sam is of the sa.

original: ti ras kyi ti ri mi dbyi ba la'o //
analyzed: ti ras kyi ti ri mi dbyi ba la'o //

original: aanytsa'i mchod pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: aanytsa'i mchod pa la ma yin no //

original: gnyis pa la aa bhyasta'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la aa bhyasta'o //

original: aa bhyasta las sha tu'i ma yin no //
analyzed: aa bhyasta las sha tu'i ma yin no //

original: dzaksha sogs drug la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dzaksha sogs drug la 'ang ngo //

original: tyad sogs rnams la dri sha'i mi mthong ba la kanya 'ang ngo //
analyzed: tyad sogs rnams la dri sha'i mi mthong ba la kanya 'ang ngo //

original: na sha'i yang na'o ;
analyzed: na sha'i yang na'o ;

original: / spri sha'i chu ma yin pa la kvin 'o //🔽ra\ ba\ dag gi au pa dh'a'i ring po aik gi'o //
analyzed: / spri sha'i chu ma yin pa la kvin 'o // ra\ ba\ dag gi au pa dh'a'i ring po aik gi'o //
translated: In spṛś, it is not water, but kṣa.🔽In the long i of upaḍ of the ra, it is eka.

original: shar la rnam bcad num bar na yod kyang ngo //
analyzed: shar la rnam bcad num bar na yod kyang ngo //
translated: In śar, it is the exclusion of na.

original: was kyi sam pra s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: was kyi sam pra s'a ra na'o //
translated: In va, it is saṃprasāraṇa.

original: ma ba dag la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ma ba dag la 'ang ngo //
translated: It is also in ma.

original: gam han dzan khanra ghas\ rnams kyi dbyi ba aang ma yin pa'i kranga\ 'gro ba la'o //🔽pum+sa'i aa sung ngo //
analyzed: gam han dzan khanra ghas\ rnams kyi dbyi ba aang ma yin pa'i kranga\ 'gro ba la'o // pum+sa'i aa sung ngo //
translated: In ghaṃ, jhaṃ, kṣaṃ, ghaṃ, the i is not aṅga.🔽In puṃ, it is a.🔽In adas, it is o. It is also su.

original: aa das kyi aoo ste su dbyi ba 'ang ngo //🔽sa las au 'ang ngo //

analyzed: aa das kyi da la au ste da'i 'ang ma'o //
translated: In adas, it is u. It is also da.

original: aet kyi a'it mang tshig la'o zhes pa b'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las skyes pa'i rtags hal mtha' can rnams rdzogs so /🔽// / na ha yi dha'o //

original: su la ya'o //
analyzed: su la ya'o //

original: ba hu sogs rnams las yang na'o //

translated: The suffix ṇini is added to the second member of a compound.🔽The suffix ṇini is added to the second member of a compound.🔽The suffix ṇini is added to the second member of a compound.🔽The suffix ṇini is added to the second member of a compound.🔽The suffix ṇini is added to the second member of a compound.🔽The suffix ṇini is added to the second member of a compound.🔽The suffix ṇini is added to the second member of a compound.

original: 'gro ba dang rtogs pa dang zas dang sgra'i don gyi las dang las med pa rnams kyi na dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i ni med pa la byed pa po la'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang rtogs pa dang zas dang sgra'i don gyi las dang las med pa rnams kyi na dang lhan cig pa ma yin pa'i ni med pa la byed pa po la'o //
translated: The suffix ṇini is added to the second member of a compound.

original: hri kri dag gi yang na'o //
analyzed: hri kri dag gi yang na'o //
translated: The Śrīkṛittikas have yaṅ.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.

original: aa dhi sh'ing sth'a a'a pa rnams kyi'ang ngo //
analyzed: aa dhi sh'ing sth'a a'a pa rnams kyi'ang ngo //
translated: The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.

original: aa bhi ni bi sha'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: aa bhi ni bi sha'i 'ang ngo //
translated: The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.

original: au pa aa nu aa dhi a'ang rnams pas la'o //🔽gnyis dang thams cad de dag gi bya ba @7a * //
analyzed: au pa aa nu aa dhi a'ang rnams pas la'o // gnyis dang thams cad de dag gi bya ba @7a * //
translated: The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.

original: dang ; 'dzin pa dang / yang yang la sogs par gsum du dang / zlos pa'i mtha' rnams su dang / de las gzhan du yang dag gnyis pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: dang ; 'dzin pa dang / yang yang la sogs par gsum du dang / zlos pa'i mtha' rnams su dang / de las gzhan du yang dag gnyis pa mthong ngo //
translated: The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.

original: aanta ra aanta re na sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: aanta ra aanta re na sbyor ba la'o //
translated: The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.

original: aa nu'i mtshan nyid la'o //🔽gsum pa'i don la'o //
analyzed: aa nu'i mtshan nyid la'o // gsum pa'i don la'o //
translated: The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.

original: dman pa la'o //
analyzed: dman pa la'o //
translated: The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.

original: au pa lhag pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: au pa lhag pa la'ang ngo //
translated: The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.

original: mtshan nyid dang / 'di ltar gyur pa dang / bgo skal dang zlos pa rnams la bra ti pa ri aa nu rnams las so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang / 'di ltar gyur pa dang / bgo skal dang zlos pa rnams la bra ti pa ri aa nu rnams las so //
translated: The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.

original: aa bhi bgo skal ma yin pa la'o //🔽aa ti shin tu ba'i bya ba la'o //
analyzed: aa bhi bgo skal ma yin pa la'o // aa ti shin tu ba'i bya ba la'o //
translated: The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.🔽The Ādhisthānikas have ṇa.🔽The Abhinīvikta have ṇa.🔽The Upaguṇas have ṇa.

original: dus dang lam bar mtshams med par sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: dus dang lam bar mtshams med par sbyor ba la'o //
translated: The Ādhisthānikas have

original: rang dbang can de byed po'o //
analyzed: rang dbang can de byed po'o //
translated: The independent one is the agent.

original: bsgrub nus pa de byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsgrub nus pa de byed pa'o //
translated: The one who is able to accomplish is the agent.

original: byed pa po dang byed pa dag la gsum pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa po dang byed pa dag la gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is in regard to the agent and the action.

original: pra kri ti sogs rnams las gsum pa'o //
analyzed: pra kri ti sogs rnams las gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is in regard to the three, such as the natural state.

original: di ba'i las la'ang ngo //
analyzed: di ba'i las la'ang ngo //
translated: It is also in regard to the action of the son.

original: 'bras bu thob pa la gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu thob pa la gsum pa'o //
translated: The third is in regard to the attainment of the result.

original: lhan cig sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: lhan cig sbyor ba la'o //
translated: It is in regard to the simultaneous application.

original: gang gi lus kyi rnam 'gyur la'o //
analyzed: gang gi lus kyi rnam 'gyur la'o //
translated: It is in regard to the bodily expression.

original: 'di 'drar yod pa'i mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'di 'drar yod pa'i mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: It is in regard to the characteristic of existing in this way.

original: yang dag par shes pa'i las la yang na'o //
analyzed: yang dag par shes pa'i las la yang na'o //
translated: It is also in regard to the action of right knowledge.

original: rgyu la'o // mi 'os pa'i rgyu la bzhi pa'i don la gsum pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu la'o // mi 'os pa'i rgyu la bzhi pa'i don la gsum pa'o //
translated: It is in regard to the cause. The third is in regard to the meaning of the fourth, in an improper cause.

original: gang gi las mngon par rab tu 'ong ba de yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi las mngon par rab tu 'ong ba de yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa'o //
translated: The one whose action is manifestly present is the one who perfectly bestows.

original: yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa la bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa la bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourth is in regard to the perfect bestower.

original: sred pa'i don dang ldan pa'i dga' ba la'o //
analyzed: sred pa'i don dang ldan pa'i dga' ba la'o //
translated: It is in regard to the delight endowed with the meaning of craving.

original: shl'a gha hnung sth'a shapa rnams kyi shes pa'i 'dod pa dang ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: shl'a gha hnung sth'a shapa rnams kyi shes pa'i 'dod pa dang ldan pa la'o //
translated: It is in regard to the desire for knowledge of the Śālāganḍas.

original: 'dzin pa'i bu lon lhag pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i bu lon lhag pa la'o //
translated: It is in regard to the remaining debt of the holder.

original: grogs 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: grogs 'dod pa la'o //
translated: It is in regard to the desire for friends.

original: kru dha: dru ha: airshya: aa s'u rnams gang la so sor khro ba'i don la'o //
analyzed: kru dha: dru ha: airshya: aa s'u rnams gang la so sor khro ba'i don la'o //
translated: kruddhāḥ, druhat, ṛṣyaḥ, asuraḥ—in the sense of being angry with each one.

original: kru dha dru ha dag gi nye bar 'os pa dag la'o //
analyzed: kru dha dru ha dag gi nye bar 'os pa dag la'o //
translated: druhat—in the sense of being worthy of.

original: r'a dha a'iksha dag las gang gi 'dri ba la'o//
analyzed: r'a dha a'iksha dag las gang gi 'dri ba la'o//
translated: rādhaikṣaḥ—in the sense of asking.

original: pra ti a'ang dag las shru'i snga ma'i byed pa po la'o //🔽aa nu pra ti dag gi gri na la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: pra ti a'ang dag las shru'i snga ma'i byed pa po la'o // aa nu pra ti dag gi gri na la 'ang ngo //
translated: prati-aṅgaḥ—in the sense of the agent of the former.🔽anu-prati—in the sense of also.

original: ba ri kri ya'i yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa yang na'o //
analyzed: ba ri kri ya'i yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa yang na'o //
translated: pari-kriyā—in the sense of giving.

original: de'i don la bzhi pa brjod do //
analyzed: de'i don la bzhi pa brjod do //
translated: The meaning of that is stated in the fourth case.

original: bya ba'i don gyi nye ba'i tshig la'ang las la'o //
analyzed: bya ba'i don gyi nye ba'i tshig la'ang las la'o //
translated: In the case of the near-synonyms of the meaning of action, it is in the sense of object.

original: tum gyi don las kyang dngos po brjod pa las so //
analyzed: tum gyi don las kyang dngos po brjod pa las so //
translated: tum-artha—in the sense of thing, from the expression.

original: na mas svasti sv'a h'a aa lam ba shat rnams sbyor ba las kyang ngo //
analyzed: na mas svasti sv'a h'a aa lam ba shat rnams sbyor ba las kyang ngo //
translated: namas-svāhā-alam-vaśat—in the sense of connection.

original: ma n+ya las la srog chags ma yin pa rnams la smad pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: ma n+ya las la srog chags ma yin pa rnams la smad pa la yang na'o //
translated: mañña—in the sense of censure, in the case of non-living beings.

original: 'gro ba'i don gyi las la gnyis ba dang bzhi ba dag g-yo ba la ste lam ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don gyi las la gnyis ba dang bzhi ba dag g-yo ba la ste lam ma yin pa la'o //
translated: gati-artha—in the sense of movement, in the case of the action of going, in the second and fourth cases.

original: brtan pa las bral ba de nges par kun sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa las bral ba de nges par kun sbyin pa'o //
translated: That which is free from stability is certainly all-giving.

original: nges par kun sbyin pa la lnga @7b pa'o ;
analyzed: nges par kun sbyin pa la lnga @7b pa'o ;
translated: There are five for the certainly all-giving.

original: /'jig pa dang bsrung ba'i don rnams kyi 'jig pa'i rgyu la'o //
analyzed: /'jig pa dang bsrung ba'i don rnams kyi 'jig pa'i rgyu la'o //
translated: For the purposes of destruction and protection, it is the cause of destruction.

original: rgyal ba ma yin pa'i 'pham pa la'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba ma yin pa'i 'pham pa la'o //
translated: It is the defeat of the non-victorious.

original: spangs pa'i don rnams kyi 'dod pa la'o //
analyzed: spangs pa'i don rnams kyi 'dod pa la'o //
translated: For the purposes of abandonment, it is desire.

original: gang gis mi mthong bar byed pa'i sbed pa la'o //
analyzed: gang gis mi mthong bar byed pa'i sbed pa la'o //
translated: It is the concealment that causes one not to see.

original: klog pa dang nye bar sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: klog pa dang nye bar sbyor ba la'o //
translated: It is reading and application.

original: skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin la'o //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin la'o //
translated: It is the nature of generation.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba las so //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba las so //
translated: It is from the arising.

original: gang las lam dus nges pa'i tshad de la lnga pa 'ang ngo //
analyzed: gang las lam dus nges pa'i tshad de la lnga pa 'ang ngo //
translated: The measure of the path is determined in that, and there is also the fifth.

original: aa n+ya: a'a r'ata: ai ta ra: ri te: phyogs kyi sgra aanytsu rnams kyi phyi ma'i tshig dang / a'atsa a'a hi sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: aa n+ya: a'a r'ata: ai ta ra: ri te: phyogs kyi sgra aanytsu rnams kyi phyi ma'i tshig dang / a'atsa a'a hi sbyor ba la'o //
translated: For the directional sounds anya, āta, ita, ṛte, and phye, it is the subsequent word, and the combination of āca and āhi.

original: aa pa ba ri dag gi bor ba la'o //
analyzed: aa pa ba ri dag gi bor ba la'o //
translated: For the abandonment of apa and pari, it is the abandonment.

original: a'ang las mtshams brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: a'ang las mtshams brjod pa la'o //
translated: For āṅ it is the expression of the section.

original: aapa a'ang pa ri rnams kyi lnga pa'o //
analyzed: aapa a'ang pa ri rnams kyi lnga pa'o //
translated: For the five of apa and āṅ pari, it is the fifth.

original: pra ti 'gran pa dang brje ba dag la'o //
analyzed: pra ti 'gran pa dang brje ba dag la'o //
translated: Prati is used for ‘to compete’ and ‘to exchange’.

original: gang la 'gran pa dang brje ba la'ang ngo //
analyzed: gang la 'gran pa dang brje ba la'ang ngo //
translated: It is also used for ‘to compete with’ and ‘to exchange with’.

original: byed pa po med pa la bu lon la lnga pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa po med pa la bu lon la lnga pa'o //
translated: Na is used for ‘without an agent’ and ‘in a debt’.

original: bud med ma yin pa la yon tan la yang na'o //
analyzed: bud med ma yin pa la yon tan la yang na'o //
translated: Na is used for ‘without a woman’ and ‘in a quality’.

original: pri thag: bi n'a: n'a n'a rnams kyi gsum pa yang na'o //
analyzed: pri thag: bi n'a: n'a n'a rnams kyi gsum pa yang na'o //
translated: Na is used for the third case of prītiḥ, viṇā, and nāna.

original: byed pa la 'ang sto ka: aalpa: kritstsha: ka ti pa ya rnams kyi yod pa ma yin pa'i brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: byed pa la 'ang sto ka: aalpa: kritstsha: ka ti pa ya rnams kyi yod pa ma yin pa'i brjod pa la'o //
translated: Stokaḥ, alpaḥ, kṛcchraḥ, and katipaya are used for ‘not existing’ in the sense of ‘to do’.

original: ring ba dang nye ba'i don dag las gnyis pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: ring ba dang nye ba'i don dag las gnyis pa'ang ngo //
translated: The second case is also used for the meanings of ‘far’ and ‘near’.

original: lhag ma la drug pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma la drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth case is used for the rest.

original: rgyu dang rab tu sbyor ba la drug pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang rab tu sbyor ba la drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth case is used for ‘cause’ and ‘application’.

original: sarba n'a ma'i gsum pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: sarba n'a ma'i gsum pa la'ang ngo //
translated: The third case is also used for sarva.

original: rkyen aata tas kyis don la drug pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen aata tas kyis don la drug pa'o //
translated: The sixth case is used for the meaning of ‘condition’ by atat.

original: ae na'i gnyis pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: ae na'i gnyis pa la'ang ngo //
translated: The second case is also used for ena.

original: ring ba dang nye ba'i don rnams kyi drug pa yang na'o //
analyzed: ring ba dang nye ba'i don rnams kyi drug pa yang na'o //
translated: The sixth case is also used for the meanings of ‘far’ and ‘near’.

original: dzan shes pa'i don ma yin pa la byed pa po la'o //
analyzed: dzan shes pa'i don ma yin pa la byed pa po la'o //
translated: The agent is used for the meaning of ‘not knowing’.

original: dran pa'i don dang da ya ai sha rnams kyi las la'o //
analyzed: dran pa'i don dang da ya ai sha rnams kyi las la'o //
translated: The meaning of smṛti, and the action of the yādis.

original: krinya'i 'bad pa la'o //
analyzed: krinya'i 'bad pa la'o //
translated: Kṛtya is for effort.

original: nad kyi don rnams kyi dngos po brjod pa rnams kyi dzva ra ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: nad kyi don rnams kyi dngos po brjod pa rnams kyi dzva ra ma yin pa la'o //
translated: The things that have the meaning of disease are for the non-jarā of the things that are expressed.

original: n'a tha'i smon pa la'o //
analyzed: n'a tha'i smon pa la'o //
translated: Nāthī is for aspiration.

original: dz'a si: ni pra ha na: n'a ta: kr'a tha: pi sha rnams kyi 'tshe ba'i don rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dz'a si: ni pra ha na: n'a ta: kr'a tha: pi sha rnams kyi 'tshe ba'i don rnams kyi'o //
translated: Jāsas is for the harm of the prahanāt, karātha, and piśas.

original: bi: aa ba: hri: pa na dag gi rgyal ba la'o //
analyzed: bi: aa ba: hri: pa na dag gi rgyal ba la'o //
translated: Vi, ava, and hri are for the jina of the pāṇis.

original: di ba'i de'i don gyi'o //
analyzed: di ba'i de'i don gyi'o //
translated: Dīva is for the meaning of that.

original: nyer bsgyur la yang na'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur la yang na'o //
translated: The secondary suffix na is also used.

original: dus kyi don rab tu sbyor ba'i krita las lhag par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: dus kyi don rab tu sbyor ba'i krita las lhag par byed pa la'o //
translated: For the application of the meaning of time, kṛt is for the superlative.

original: byed pa po dang las dag la krita la'o //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las dag la krita la'o //
translated: Kṛt is for the agent and the object.

original: gnyis thob pa la las la'o //
analyzed: gnyis thob pa la las la'o //
translated: For the attainment of two, it is for the object.

original: kta'i 'ang da ltar ba la'o //
analyzed: kta'i 'ang da ltar ba la'o //
translated: Kta is also for the present.

original: ma ning la dngos po la'o //
analyzed: ma ning la dngos po la'o //
translated: For the neuter, it is for the thing.

original: lhag par byed pa po brjod pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: lhag par byed pa po brjod pa la'ang ngo //
translated: It is also for the expression of the superlative.

original: 'jig rten mi bzad pa bden pa shal trina rnams kyi don la ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten mi bzad pa bden pa shal trina rnams kyi don la ma yin no //
translated: The unbearable world is not for the meaning of the satrins.

original: aaka aina dag gi 'byung 'gyur bu lon ngan pa la'o //
analyzed: aaka aina dag gi 'byung 'gyur bu lon ngan pa la'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots aṅ and ṇi in the sense of debt.

original: @8a * // krita rnams kyi byed pa po la yang na'o //
analyzed: @8a * // krita rnams kyi byed pa po la yang na'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the agent of the roots kṛ and kṛ.

original: mnyam pa'i don dang mnyam par nye bar 'jal ba ma yin pa dag la gsum pa yang na'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i don dang mnyam par nye bar 'jal ba ma yin pa dag la gsum pa yang na'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots that mean equality and to those that do not mean equality in the sense of the third.

original: smon pa a'a yu shya: ma dra: bha dra: ku sha la bde ba'i don rnams dang hi ta rnams kyi bzhi pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: smon pa a'a yu shya: ma dra: bha dra: ku sha la bde ba'i don rnams dang hi ta rnams kyi bzhi pa'ang ngo //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots āyuṣya, mātra, bhadra, and kuśala in the sense of happiness and to the roots hita in the sense of the fourth.

original: tshim pa'i don rnams kyi byed pa po la drug pa yang na'o //
analyzed: tshim pa'i don rnams kyi byed pa po la drug pa yang na'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the agent of the roots that mean satisfaction in the sense of the sixth.

original: gnas gzhi ste lhag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gnas gzhi ste lhag par byed pa'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots that mean basis and that mean predominance.

original: lhag par byed pa la 'ang bdun pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par byed pa la 'ang bdun pa'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots that mean predominance in the sense of the seventh.

original: dngos po gang gi dngos po'i mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: dngos po gang gi dngos po'i mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots that mean the nature of a thing in the sense of the nature of a thing.

original: aa dhi dbang phyug la'o //
analyzed: aa dhi dbang phyug la'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots that mean lord.

original: gang las aa dhi gang gi dbang phyug brjod pa de la bdun pa'o //
analyzed: gang las aa dhi gang gi dbang phyug brjod pa de la bdun pa'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots that mean lord in the sense of the seventh.

original: ma gus pa la drug pa yang na'o //
analyzed: ma gus pa la drug pa yang na'o //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots that mean disrespect in the sense of the sixth.

original: sv'a m'i: a'i shva ra: aa dhi pa dhi: d'a y'a da: s'akshi: pra ti bh'u: pra s'u ta rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: sv'a m'i: a'i shva ra: aa dhi pa dhi: d'a y'a da: s'akshi: pra ti bh'u: pra s'u ta rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
translated: The augment ṇ is added to the roots svāmi, ājñā, adhipati, dāyāda, sākṣin, pratibhū, and prasūta in the sense of the seventh.

original: a'a yukta ku sha la dag gi mchod pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: a'a yukta ku sha la dag gi mchod pa la yang na'o //
translated: The seventh case is used for the worship of the āyus and kuśalas.

original: gang las kyang nges par bkar ba rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: gang las kyang nges par bkar ba rnams kyi'o //
translated: The fifth case is used for those who are definitely selected from something.

original: rnam par gus pa la lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par gus pa la lnga pa'o //
translated: The fifth case is used for the respect of the five.

original: pra ti med pa'i mchod pa'i don la s'a dhu ni pu na dag gi bdun pa'o ;
analyzed: pra ti med pa'i mchod pa'i don la s'a dhu ni pu na dag gi bdun pa'o ;
translated: The seventh case is used for the meaning of worship with pratīti.

original: / pra si ta dang: aut+su ka dag gi gsum pa yang na'o //
analyzed: / pra si ta dang: aut+su ka dag gi gsum pa yang na'o //
translated: The third case is used for prasīda and utsūka.🔽The fifth case is used for the meaning of not seeing even the stars.

original: skar ma la'ang mi mthong ba la'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las byed pa can rnams rdzogs so /

analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa dang: mtha' dag dang: mtha'i tshig rnams la'o //
translated: The words perfect, entire, and end are added.

original: dang po nges par sbyor ba'i tshig sdud nyer bsgyur ro //
analyzed: dang po nges par sbyor ba'i tshig sdud nyer bsgyur ro //
translated: The first is the affix ka in the sense of definite connection.

original: nyer bsgyur sngon du'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur sngon du'o //
translated: The affix ka is placed first.

original: byings pr'a ti pa di ka dag las sup kyi'o //
analyzed: byings pr'a ti pa di ka dag las sup kyi'o //
translated: From the roots prā and pād comes sup.

original: mi zad par gyur pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: mi zad par gyur pa la'ang ngo //
translated: It is also for inexhaustible.

original: mi zad par gyur pa las aata la ma yin zhing lnga pa ma yin pa'i aama mo //
analyzed: mi zad par gyur pa las aata la ma yin zhing lnga pa ma yin pa'i aama mo //
translated: From inexhaustible comes am when it is not the fifth and is not at.

original: gsum pa bdun pa dag yang na'o //
analyzed: gsum pa bdun pa dag yang na'o //
translated: The third and seventh are also for inexhaustible.

original: mi zad par gyur pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: mi zad par gyur pa'ang ngo //
translated: It is also for inexhaustible.

original: mi zad par gyur pa la'ang dus ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: mi zad par gyur pa la'ang dus ma yin pa la'o //
translated: It is also for inexhaustible when it is not the time.

original: ya th'a'i mnyam pa ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: ya th'a'i mnyam pa ma yin pa la'o //
translated: It is for not equal to yathā.

original: y'a bata kyi logs su bkol ba la'o //
analyzed: y'a bata kyi logs su bkol ba la'o //
translated: It is for the opposite of yāvat.

original: pra ti yi tsam gyi don la s'u pa la'o //
analyzed: pra ti yi tsam gyi don la s'u pa la'o //
translated: It is for just a little from prati.

original: aa pa: pa ri: ba hir: aanytsa rnams lnga pa'i yang na'o //
analyzed: aa pa: pa ri: ba hir: aanytsa rnams lnga pa'i yang na'o //
translated: The five ap, pari, bhinna, anya, ca are also for the fifth.

original: a'ang gi tshad bzung thams cad dag las so //
analyzed: a'ang gi tshad bzung thams cad dag las so //
translated: The measure of aṅga is from all.

original: mtshan nyid kyi aa bhi pra ti dag @8b sngon du mthong ba la'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi aa bhi pra ti dag @8b sngon du mthong ba la'o //
translated: The affixes a, abhi, prati are for the seen.

original: aa nu'i gang nye ba la'o //
analyzed: aa nu'i gang nye ba la'o //
translated: The genitive case of anu is used for near to.

original: gang gi'ang dkyus la'o //
analyzed: gang gi'ang dkyus la'o //
translated: The genitive case of ka is used for in the middle of.

original: tishthata gu la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: tishthata gu la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: The genitive case of tiṣṭhat and so forth is used for in the middle of.

original: p'a re ma dhye drug pa'i yang na'o //
analyzed: p'a re ma dhye drug pa'i yang na'o //
translated: The genitive case of pare is used for in the middle of the sixth.

original: rigs kyi grangs la'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi grangs la'o //
translated: The genitive case of kula is used for in the number of the family.

original: chu klung rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: chu klung rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
translated: The genitive case of nadī is used for in the rivers.

original: tshig don gzhan la ming la'o //
analyzed: tshig don gzhan la ming la'o //
translated: The genitive case of pada is used for in the other meaning.

original: mi zad par gyur pa la sha rat sogs rnams las so //🔽pra ti: pa ra: sam\: aa nu rnams las aaksha'i 'o //🔽de phan rnams so //🔽aan las kyang ngo //
analyzed: mi zad par gyur pa la sha rat sogs rnams las so // pra ti: pa ra: sam\: aa nu rnams las aaksha'i 'o // de phan rnams so // aan las kyang ngo //
translated: The genitive case of śarā and so forth is used for in the imperishable.🔽The genitive case of prati and so forth is used for in the akṣa.

original: de phan las na'i 'o //🔽ma ning las yang na'o //
analyzed: de phan las na'i 'o // ma ning las yang na'o //
translated: The genitive case of para and so forth is used for in the beyond.🔽The genitive case of an is used for in the beyond.🔽The genitive case of na is used for in the beyond.

original: na d'i: poorna m'a si: aa pra hva ya ni rnams las so //
analyzed: na d'i: poorna m'a si: aa pra hva ya ni rnams las so //
translated: The genitive case of punda and so forth is used for in the beyond.

original: dzha ya'i 'o //
analyzed: dzha ya'i 'o //
translated: The genitive case of jayā is used for in the beyond.

original: gi ri las mchod pa'i 'o //
analyzed: gi ri las mchod pa'i 'o //
translated: The genitive case of giri is used for in the worship.🔽The genitive case of dvitīya is used for in the second.

original: gnyis pa la bstan pa dang: 'das pa dang: lhung ba dang: song ba dang: bden pa dang: thob pa dang: gyur pa rnams kyi'o //🔽sva yam la kta'i 'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa la bstan pa dang: 'das pa dang: lhung ba dang: song ba dang: bden pa dang: thob pa dang: gyur pa rnams kyi'o // sva yam la kta'i 'o //
translated: The genitive case of svayam is used for in the statement.

original: kha tva'i ngan pa la'o //
analyzed: kha tva'i ngan pa la'o //
translated: The genitive case of kṣata is used for in the bad.

original: s'a mi'o // dus rnams so //
analyzed: s'a mi'o // dus rnams so //
translated: The genitive case of sama is used for in the time.

original: de'i byed pa'i don gyi yon tan brjod pa la gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de'i byed pa'i don gyi yon tan brjod pa la gsum pa'o //
translated: The third case is used to express the quality of the object of the action.🔽The fourth case is used for purva, sadṛśa, sama, adūṣaṇa, kāla, and punar.

original: p'urba: sa dri sha: sa ma don ngan pa: ka la ha: ni pu na: mi shra shlaksha rnams kyi'o //🔽byed pa byed po dag la krita kyi mang po'o //
analyzed: p'urba: sa dri sha: sa ma don ngan pa: ka la ha: ni pu na: mi shra shlaksha rnams kyi'o // byed pa byed po dag la krita kyi mang po'o //
translated: The fifth case is used for kṛt and kartṛ.

original: krita rnams kyis lhag pa'i don brjod pa la'o //🔽zas kyis bya na la'o //
analyzed: krita rnams kyis lhag pa'i don brjod pa la'o // zas kyis bya na la'o //
translated: The sixth case is used to express the remainder of the meaning.🔽The seventh case is used for the object of the action.

original: zas kyis sre ba'i byed pa la'o //
analyzed: zas kyis sre ba'i byed pa la'o //
translated: The eighth case is used for the object of the action of eating.

original: de'i don dang ba li hi ta su kha /
analyzed: de'i don dang ba li hi ta su kha /
translated: The ninth case is used for the object of the action of the meaning.🔽The tenth case is used for the object of the action of fear.🔽The eleventh case is used for the object of the action of the small.🔽The twelfth case is used for the object of the action of the far.🔽The thirteenth case is used for the object of the action of the great.

original: rakshi ta rnams kyi bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: rakshi ta rnams kyi bzhi pa'o //
translated: The fourteenth case is used for the object of the action of the near.

original: 'jigs pas lnga pa'o ;
analyzed: 'jigs pas lnga pa'o ;

original: / aa pe ta: aa po dha: mukta: pa ti ta: aa pa trastra rnams kyi chung ngu la'o //🔽sto ka: aanti ka ring ba'i don kri tsha\ rnams kta'i'o //
analyzed: / aa pe ta: aa po dha: mukta: pa ti ta: aa pa trastra rnams kyi chung ngu la'o // sto ka: aanti ka ring ba'i don kri tsha\ rnams kta'i'o //
translated: The twenty-first case is used for the object of the action of the near.🔽The twenty-second case is used for the object of the action of the far.🔽The twenty-third case is used for the object of the action of the great.🔽The twenty-fourth case is used for the object of the action of the small.🔽The twenty-fifth case is used for the object of the action of the near.🔽The twenty-sixth case is used for the object of the action of the far.🔽The twenty-seventh case is used for the object of the action of the great.

original: drug pa'o // y'a dza ka sogs rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: drug pa'o // y'a dza ka sogs rnams kyi'o //
translated: The twenty-eighth case is used for the object of the action of the small.

original: nges par bkar ba la ma yin no //
analyzed: nges par bkar ba la ma yin no //
translated: The twenty-ninth case is used for the object of the action of the near.🔽The thirtieth case is used for the object of the action of the far.🔽The thirty-first case is used for the object of the action of the great.🔽The thirty-second case is used for the object of the action of the small.🔽The thirty-

original: gang ba dang yon tan dang shin tu phan pa'i don dang bde ba dang mi zad pa ta bya rnams mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa'i'o //
analyzed: gang ba dang yon tan dang shin tu phan pa'i don dang bde ba dang mi zad pa ta bya rnams mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa'i'o //
translated: The words pūrṇa, guṇa, ati-hita, sukha, and akṣaya have the meaning of “full,” “quality,” “very beneficial,” “happiness,” and “inexhaustible,” respectively.

original: kta'i 'ang mchod pa la'o //
analyzed: kta'i 'ang mchod pa la'o //
translated: The word pūjā means “worship.”

original: las la'ang ngo //
analyzed: las la'ang ngo //
translated: The word karma means “action.”

original: tritsa aaka dag las byed pa la'o //
analyzed: tritsa aaka dag las byed pa la'o //
translated: The words tricaka and kāraka mean “to do.”

original: rtag tu rtsed mo 'tsho ba dag las so //
analyzed: rtag tu rtsed mo 'tsho ba dag las so //
translated: The word nitya means “always.”

original: p'urba: aa pa ra: aa dha ra: autta ra rnams lus gcig gis gcig lhag par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: p'urba: aa pa ra: aa dha ra: autta ra rnams lus gcig gis gcig lhag par byed pa la'o //
translated: The words pūrva, aparā, adhara, and uttara mean “one higher than another.”

original: aardha ma ning ngo //🔽dvi t'i ya: tri t'i ya: tsa turtha: tur++ya rnams yang na'o //
analyzed: aardha ma ning ngo // dvi t'i ya: tri t'i ya: tsa turtha: tur++ya rnams yang na'o //

original: pr'apta a'a banna 'ang gnyis pa'i 'o //
analyzed: pr'apta a'a banna 'ang gnyis pa'i 'o //
translated: The words dvitīya, tṛtīya, caturtha, and turya mean “second,” “third,” “fourth,” and “fourth,” respectively.🔽The word prāpta means “obtained.”

original: dus rnams kyi tshad la'o //
analyzed: dus rnams kyi tshad la'o //

original: shoonda rnams kyi bdun pa'i'o //
analyzed: shoonda rnams kyi bdun pa'i'o //

original: grub pa: bskams pa: tshod pa 'ching ba rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: grub pa: bskams pa: tshod pa 'ching ba rnams kyi 'ang ngo //

original: ku: ga ti: pra la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: ku: ga ti: pra la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: The words ku, gati, and pra also have these meanings.

original: @9a * // a'u r'i sogs dang / tsvi d'a tsa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: @9a * // a'u r'i sogs dang / tsvi d'a tsa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: The words āurva and cavadāca also have these meanings.

original: ti ras kyi yang na'o //
analyzed: ti ras kyi yang na'o //
translated: The word tīra means “other side.”

original: rnam dbye gcig la'ang snga ma ma yin pa'i nges tshig la'o //
analyzed: rnam dbye gcig la'ang snga ma ma yin pa'i nges tshig la'o //

original: go bud med dag gi au pa sardza'i 'o //
analyzed: go bud med dag gi au pa sardza'i 'o //
translated: The feminine of upa is upā.

original: snga ma'i dus: ae ka: sarba: dza rata: pur'a na rnams gcig ma yin pa la'ang mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: snga ma'i dus: ae ka: sarba: dza rata: pur'a na rnams gcig ma yin pa la'ang mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa la'o //
translated: The negative particle is used in the sense of equality and superiority, as in eka, sarva, jara, purāṇa.

analyzed: de'i skyes bu mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa las 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The masculine of that is upā.🔽The masculine is used in the sense of action, as in karma, jāti, deśa.

original: skyes pa dang 'dra bar las 'dzin rigs yul rnams la'o //🔽nye bar sbyor ba rnams mnyam par brjod pas so //
analyzed: skyes pa dang 'dra bar las 'dzin rigs yul rnams la'o // nye bar sbyor ba rnams mnyam par brjod pas so //

analyzed: nye bar sbyor ba by'a ghra la sogs pa rnams kyis so // khyad par khyad par gyis mang po la'o //

analyzed: nanya'i 'o // nanya'i na dbyi'o // de las aatsa la nuta'o //

original: na bhr'at: na p'ata: na be da: n'a sa tya: na mu tsi: na ku la: na kha: na puma sa ka: naksha tra: nagna: nakra: n'a ga rnams la rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: na bhr'at: na p'ata: na be da: n'a sa tya: na mu tsi: na ku la: na kha: na puma sa ka: naksha tra: nagna: nakra: n'a ga rnams la rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: The feminine is used in the sense of distinction, as in viśeṣa.🔽The feminine is

original: sata: ma hata: pa ra ma: autta ma: autkrishta rnams mchod pa sems pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sata: ma hata: pa ra ma: autta ma: autkrishta rnams mchod pa sems pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The suffixes sat, mat, ah, parām, uttama, utkrṣṭa are used when one wishes to express honor.

original: ma hata kyi mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa dang rigs dag la a'ata'o //
analyzed: ma hata kyi mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa dang rigs dag la a'ata'o //
translated: The suffix at is used for samāna and atiśaya.

original: de phan gyi don tshig phyi ma mnyam du 'dus pa la'ang ngo //🔽phyogs kyi tshig snga ma las ming ma yin pa la nya'o //
analyzed: de phan gyi don tshig phyi ma mnyam du 'dus pa la'ang ngo // phyogs kyi tshig snga ma las ming ma yin pa la nya'o //
translated: The suffix at is also used for the meaning of 'after' when it is combined with the following word.🔽The suffix nya is used for the non-nominal case ending in the first part of a compound.

original: phyogs grangs dag la ming la'o //
analyzed: phyogs grangs dag la ming la'o //
translated: The suffix na is used for the nominal case ending in the second part of a compound.

original: grangs thog ma can ni phyogs gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: grangs thog ma can ni phyogs gnyis pa'o //
translated: The first part of a compound is the second part.

original: 'dus pa la zas la'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa la zas la'o //
translated: The suffix na is used for the meaning of 'collection' and 'food'.

original: phyogs gnyis pa'i bu brgyud ma yin pa la dbyi'o //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa'i bu brgyud ma yin pa la dbyi'o //
translated: The suffix na is used for the meaning of 'not a son of the second part'.

original: de yis rdzas brje ba la'o //
analyzed: de yis rdzas brje ba la'o //
translated: The suffix na is used for the meaning of 'exchanging substances with that'.

original: lhag pa'i don snga ma las phyogs gnyis pa la ming ma yin pa la dbyi'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i don snga ma las phyogs gnyis pa la ming ma yin pa la dbyi'o //
translated: The suffix na is used for the non-nominal second part of a compound when the meaning is 'after'.

original: go yis de phan dbyi ba ma yin no //
analyzed: go yis de phan dbyi ba ma yin no //
translated: The suffix na is not dropped after that.

original: phyogs gnyis pa la gcig tshig go //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa la gcig tshig go //
translated: The suffix na is used for the first part of a compound in the second part.

original: de ma ning ngo //
analyzed: de ma ning ngo //
translated: That is neuter.

original: phyogs gnyis pa aa yig mtha' tshig phyi ma la'o //
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa aa yig mtha' tshig phyi ma la'o //
translated: The suffix na is used for the second part of a compound ending in the letter a.

original: a'a pa mtha' la yang na'o //
analyzed: a'a pa mtha' la yang na'o //
translated: The suffix na is also used for the final a.

original: aam gu li las da'i skyes bu'i grangs mi zad pa sogs kyi'o //
analyzed: aam gu li las da'i skyes bu'i grangs mi zad pa sogs kyi'o //
translated: From Aṅguli, the names of the men of the Daśa, and so on.

original: aa han sarba sam khy'a ta: pu nya rnams las r'a tri las kyang ngo //
analyzed: aa han sarba sam khy'a ta: pu nya rnams las r'a tri las kyang ngo //
translated: From Ahan, Sarvasaṃkhyāta, and Puṇya, also from Rātri.

original: r'a tri: aa ha na: aa ha rnams skyes pa'o //
analyzed: r'a tri: aa ha na: aa ha rnams skyes pa'o //
translated: From Rātri, Ahan, and Ahar, the masculine.

original: r'a dzan: aa han: sa khi rnams las tatsa'o //🔽aa han gyi ta kha de dag las nges pa'o //🔽aa han gyi aahna 'di rnams las so //
analyzed: r'a dzan: aa han: sa khi rnams las tatsa'o // aa han gyi ta kha de dag las nges pa'o // aa han gyi aahna 'di rnams las so //
translated: From Rājan, Ahan, and Saki, the feminine.🔽From Ahan, Gati, and Kṣaṇa, the neuter.🔽From Ahan, Ahan, and Ahan, the plural.

original: aa han gyi aata mtha' las so //
analyzed: aa han gyi aata mtha' las so //
translated: From Ahan, Ahan, and Atam, the final.

original: grangs la sogs pa'i kun sdud pa la ma yin no //
analyzed: grangs la sogs pa'i kun sdud pa la ma yin no //
translated: Not in the collection of numbers and so on.

original: autta ma ae ka dag las kyang ngo //
analyzed: autta ma ae ka dag las kyang ngo //
translated: From Uttama and Eka, also.

original: au ras las tsub las so //
analyzed: au ras las tsub las so //

analyzed: gr'a ma koo ta dag las kyang takshi las so //

original: aa ti las shva na las so //
analyzed: aa ti las shva na las so //

original: nye bar 'jal ba las srog chags ma yin pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: nye bar 'jal ba las srog chags ma yin pa rnams la'o //

analyzed: autta ra mri ga p'urba rnams la sakthi las kyang ngo //

analyzed: noo las phyogs gnyis pa las so //

original: aardha las kyang ngo ;
analyzed: aardha las kyang ngo ;

analyzed: / khv'a r'i las shar ba rnams kyi'o //

original: ku ma hata dag las yang na'o //
analyzed: ku ma hata dag las yang na'o //

analyzed: de la bdun pa gnas pa la nye ba'i tshig go //

analyzed: nye ba'i tshig la ting ma yin pa la'o //

analyzed: tu mun nul dag dang bya ba sbyor ba bdun pa'i yul ting mtha' ma yin pa'i nye ba'i tshig gi'o //

analyzed: mi zad pa'i nges par aama'o //

original: gsum pa sogs rnams yang na'o //
analyzed: gsum pa sogs rnams yang na'o //

original: ktv'a yang ngo //
analyzed: ktv'a yang ngo //

analyzed: au pa dzny'a: au pa ka ma de sogs 'dod pa la'o //

analyzed: aang+gu la la shing la'o //

analyzed: dvi tri dag las m'urdhana las so //

original: aantar ba hir dag las kyang lo man las so //
analyzed: aantar ba hir dag las kyang lo man las so //

original: sth'a la ma yin pa las n'a si ka'i ming la aatsa ste nas kyang ngo //
analyzed: sth'a la ma yin pa las n'a si ka'i ming la aatsa ste nas kyang ngo //

original: snga ma'i tshig las ming la ga ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: snga ma'i tshig las ming la ga ma yin pa las so //

analyzed: nyer bsgyur las kyang ngo //

original: nyer bsgyur las mang po'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur las mang po'o //

original: nanya dur su rnams las ha li sakthi las yang na'o //
analyzed: nanya dur su rnams las ha li sakthi las yang na'o //

original: pra dz'a me dha dag la rtag tu aa sitsa'o //
analyzed: pra dz'a me dha dag la rtag tu aa sitsa'o //

original: gcig las dharma las aa ni tsa'o //
analyzed: gcig las dharma las aa ni tsa'o //

original: dakshi nerm'a bsnun pa'i sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: dakshi nerm'a bsnun pa'i sbyor ba la'o //

analyzed: pra sam dag la dz'a nun gyi dznyu'o //

original: dha nusha'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dha nusha'i 'ang ngo //

original: dz'a y'a'i ning 'o //
analyzed: dz'a y'a'i ning 'o //

original: wa ya\ dag gi wal la dbyi'o //
analyzed: wa ya\ dag gi wal la dbyi'o //

original: gandha'i auta: p'u ti: su su ra bhi rnams las aita 'o //
analyzed: gandha'i auta: p'u ti: su su ra bhi rnams las aita 'o //

original: chung ngu brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: chung ngu brjod pa la'o //
translated: In the expression of the small.

original: nye bar gzhal ba la'o //
analyzed: nye bar gzhal ba la'o //

original: hasti sogs rnams ma yin pa las p'a da'i dbyi'o //
analyzed: hasti sogs rnams ma yin pa las p'a da'i dbyi'o //
translated: The case of Hastya and the rest is not so.

original: kumbha p'a d'i rnams la'ang ngo //
analyzed: kumbha p'a d'i rnams la'ang ngo //
translated: The case of Kum-bhapada and the rest is also so.

original: grangs dang su snga ma'i 'o //
analyzed: grangs dang su snga ma'i 'o //
translated: The number is in the first case.

original: na tshod la danta'i da tri'o //
analyzed: na tshod la danta'i da tri'o //
translated: The age is in the dative.

original: aa ga aanta shuddha shu bhra: bri sha b'a r'a ha rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: aa ga aanta shuddha shu bhra: bri sha b'a r'a ha rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: The case of Agant, Suddha, Subhra, Brisha, and Varaha is also so.

original: ka ku da yi na tshod la dbyi'o //
analyzed: ka ku da yi na tshod la dbyi'o //
translated: The age is in the ablative.

original: auta bi dag las ka ku da yi'o //🔽su hri da: durhri dag grogs dang grogs min dag las so //
analyzed: auta bi dag las ka ku da yi'o // su hri da: durhri dag grogs dang grogs min dag las so //
translated: The case of U and Vi is that of the ablative.🔽The case of Su and Hri is that of the genitive and the ablative.

original: au ras sogs rnams las kapa'o //
analyzed: au ras sogs rnams las kapa'o //
translated: The case of Ur and the rest is that of the ablative.

original: ain las bud med la'o //
analyzed: ain las bud med la'o //
translated: The case of In is that of the feminine.

original: kab la ma yin no //
analyzed: kab la ma yin no //
translated: The case of Kap is not so.

original: lhag ma las 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: lhag ma las 'dam ka'o //
translated: The case of the rest is optional.

original: a'ab kyi yang na'o //
analyzed: a'ab kyi yang na'o //
translated: The case of Ab is that of the locative.

original: ming la ma yin no //
analyzed: ming la ma yin no //
translated: The case of Nam is not so.

original: a'i yas kyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: a'i yas kyi 'ang ngo //
translated: The case of Ai is also so.

original: bstod pa la bhr'a tri yi'o //
analyzed: bstod pa la bhr'a tri yi'o //
translated: The case of Bharatri is that of the vocative.

original: sarb'a n'a ma grangs dag gi'o //
analyzed: sarb'a n'a ma grangs dag gi'o //
translated: The case of Sarvan is that of the genitive.

original: aindu sogs rnams las ma yin no //
analyzed: aindu sogs rnams las ma yin no //
translated: The case of Indu and the rest is not so.

original: nishth'a'o // a'a hi ta aagni sogs rnams la yang na'o //
analyzed: nishth'a'o // a'a hi ta aagni sogs rnams la yang na'o //
translated: The case of Ahita, Agnis, and the rest is that of the locative.

original: dang gi don la zlas dbye'o //
analyzed: dang gi don la zlas dbye'o //
translated: The meaning of and is a dvandva compound.

original: zlas dbye la ghi'o ;
analyzed: zlas dbye la ghi'o ;
translated: The dvandva compound is GHI.

original: / aatsa dang po aata mtha'o //
analyzed: / aatsa dang po aata mtha'o //
translated: The first is a, the last a.

original: aatsa nyung ngu'o //
analyzed: aatsa nyung ngu'o //
translated: A is a small quantity.

original: zlas dbye la srog chags dang: rol mo dang: dpung rnams kyi yan lag la'ang ngo //
analyzed: zlas dbye la srog chags dang: rol mo dang: dpung rnams kyi yan lag la'ang ngo //
translated: The secondary formation is used for animals, music, and armies, and for their parts.

original: srog chags ma yin pa'i rigs rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: srog chags ma yin pa'i rigs rnams kyi'o //
translated: It is used for those of the class of non-animals.

original: grong khyer ma yin pa'i yul dang chu bo rnams kyi rtags tha dad pa'i'o //
analyzed: grong khyer ma yin pa'i yul dang chu bo rnams kyi rtags tha dad pa'i'o //
translated: It is used for those of different signs among the countries and rivers that are not cities.

original: srog chags phra mo rnams @10b so ;
analyzed: srog chags phra mo rnams @10b so ;
translated: It is used for the small animals.

original: / gang rnams kyi gtan gyi dgra rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: / gang rnams kyi gtan gyi dgra rnams kyi'o //
translated: It is used for those who are enemies for life.

original: dmangs rigs rnams kyi mi gnas pa ma yin pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dmangs rigs rnams kyi mi gnas pa ma yin pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: It is used for the non-abiding of the śūdra class.

original: ba lang la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
translated: It is also used for cows and so on.

original: ljon shing dang: ri dags dang: rtsva dang: 'bru dang: bya na dang: phyugs dang: bya dang: rta dang: rgod ma dang: shar dang: gzhan dang: mchu dang: byang rnams kyi yang na'o //
analyzed: ljon shing dang: ri dags dang: rtsva dang: 'bru dang: bya na dang: phyugs dang: bya dang: rta dang: rgod ma dang: shar dang: gzhan dang: mchu dang: byang rnams kyi yang na'o //
translated: It is also used for trees, deer, grass, grain, birds, cattle, birds, horses, mares, elephants, others, beaks, and the north.

original: 'gal ba rdzas med pa rnams kyi brjod pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: 'gal ba rdzas med pa rnams kyi brjod pa la'ang ngo //
translated: It is also used for the expression of contradictory non-substances.

original: dadhi pa yas la sogs pa rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: dadhi pa yas la sogs pa rnams ma yin no //
translated: It is not used for dadhi, etc.

original: zlas dbye la rita rnams kyi a'a nang 'o //
analyzed: zlas dbye la rita rnams kyi a'a nang 'o //
translated: For the vowels, the feminine of the neuter is the same.

original: lha la'ang zlas dbye la'o //
analyzed: lha la'ang zlas dbye la'o //
translated: For the gods, the feminine is the same as the neuter.

original: aagni'i so ma ba ru na dag la ai ta'o //
analyzed: aagni'i so ma ba ru na dag la ai ta'o //
translated: For Agni, Soma, and Varuna, the feminine is ita.

original: aagni las stuta stom som rnams so //🔽'phel ba la aita'o //🔽zlas dbye las tsu drisha ha mtha' las kun sdud la'o //
analyzed: aagni las stuta stom som rnams so // 'phel ba la aita'o // zlas dbye las tsu drisha ha mtha' las kun sdud la'o //
translated: For Agni, the feminine is stut, stom, and stum.

original: skyes pa las bud med kyi'o //🔽spun zla dang bu dag la sring mo dang bu mo dag gi'o //
analyzed: skyes pa las bud med kyi'o // spun zla dang bu dag la sring mo dang bu mo dag gi'o //
translated: For the feminine of the neuter, the feminine is ita.🔽For the feminine of the neuter, the feminine of the neuter is the same.

original: ma ning la ma ning ma yin pa'i gcig 'dra ba'ang 'di'i yang na'o //🔽pha la ma yi'o //
analyzed: ma ning la ma ning ma yin pa'i gcig 'dra ba'ang 'di'i yang na'o // pha la ma yi'o //
translated: For the masculine, the feminine is the same.🔽For the masculine, the feminine is the same.🔽For the neuter, the feminine is the same.

original: gyos bo la sgyug mo'i 'o //
analyzed: gyos bo la sgyug mo'i 'o //
translated: For the father, the feminine is the same.🔽For the father-in-law, the feminine is the same.

original: tyad sogs rnams la thams cad rnams kyi rtag tu'o //
analyzed: tyad sogs rnams la thams cad rnams kyi rtag tu'o //
translated: For tyad and so on, the feminine is the same for all.

original: grong gi phyugs 'dus pa rnams la gzhon nu ma yin pa la bud med 'o //
analyzed: grong gi phyugs 'dus pa rnams la gzhon nu ma yin pa la bud med 'o //
translated: For the cattle of the village, the feminine is the same.

original: ri tsa bur dhur ba thin rnams kyi aaksha ma yin pa las aapa'o //
analyzed: ri tsa bur dhur ba thin rnams kyi aaksha ma yin pa las aapa'o //
translated: For ric, budh, and vathin, the feminine is the same.

original: dve aantar nyer bsgyur rnams las aa ba kyi a'i ta'o //
analyzed: dve aantar nyer bsgyur rnams las aa ba kyi a'i ta'o //
translated: For the intermediate prefixes, the feminine is the same.

original: aa nu las yul la a'uta'o //
analyzed: aa nu las yul la a'uta'o //
translated: For anu, the feminine is the same.

original: pra ti aa nu aa ba sngon ma las s'a ma lo man las aatsa'o //
analyzed: pra ti aa nu aa ba sngon ma las s'a ma lo man las aatsa'o //
translated: Pratyanumataprathama, Samalomam, Acita.

original: aakshi'i mi mthong ba las so //
analyzed: aakshi'i mi mthong ba las so //
translated: Akshi, from non-seeing.

original: aa tsa tu ra: bi tsa tu ra: su tsa tu ra: str'i pum sa: dhe nva na duha: rika s'a ma: w'adma nas: aakshi bhru ba: d'a ra ga ba: a'urbashthi ba: ba dashthi ba: naktam di ba: r'i tram di ba: aa hardi ba: sa ra dza sa: ni
analyzed: aa tsa tu ra: bi tsa tu ra: su tsa tu ra: str'i pum sa: dhe nva na duha: rika s'a ma: w'adma nas: aakshi bhru ba: d'a ra ga ba: a'urbashthi ba: ba dashthi ba: naktam di ba: r'i tram di ba: aa hardi ba: sa ra dza sa: ni
translated: Acatur, vicatur, sucatur, satripuṃsaḥ, dhenvanaduḥ, rikasaṃ, vadhaṃsaḥ, akṣibhruvaḥ, daragaḥ, ūrvaṣṭhibah, badhasthibah, naktaṃdibah, rātraṃdibā, ahardībā, sarajasā,

original: shre ya sa: pu ru sh'a yu sha: dvy'a yu sha: try'a yu sha: rik++ya dzu sha: dza teksha: briddhva ksha: au pa shun: goshtha shva rnams so //
analyzed: shre ya sa: pu ru sh'a yu sha: dvy'a yu sha: try'a yu sha: rik++ya dzu sha: dza teksha: briddhva ksha: au pa shun: goshtha shva rnams so //
translated: niśreyaḥ, puruṣāyus, dvayāyus, tarayāyus, rikṣayūṣaḥ, jatekṣaḥ, vidhvāṅkṣaḥ, upāśuṃ, goṣṭhaśvāḥ.

original: brahma hasti dag las bartstsas las so //
analyzed: brahma hasti dag las bartstsas las so //

analyzed: aa ba sam aandha rnams las ta mas la'o //

analyzed: aa nu aa ba tapta las ra has las so //

original: pra ti las au ras las so //
analyzed: pra ti las au ras las so //

original: aa nu las go la rgyas pa la'o //
analyzed: aa nu las go la rgyas pa la'o //
translated: Anu, from Golā.

original: bstod pa las ma yin no //
analyzed: bstod pa las ma yin no //
translated: Not from praise.

original: kim gyi phrag dog la'o //
analyzed: kim gyi phrag dog la'o //

original: na nya'i de'i skyes bu las so //
analyzed: na nya'i de'i skyes bu las so //

original: pa thin gyi 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: pa thin gyi 'dam ka'o //

original: ming la au da ka'i au da'o //
analyzed: ming la au da ka'i au da'o //

original: pesha b'a sa /
analyzed: pesha b'a sa /

analyzed: b'a ha na dhi rnams la yang ngo // dang por hal gcig pa la gang bar byed @11a * //

original: pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: pa la yang na'o //

original: mantha: ao da na: saktu: bindu: badzrabh'a ra: h'a ra b'i: ba dha: g'a ha rnams la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: mantha: ao da na: saktu: bindu: badzrabh'a ra: h'a ra b'i: ba dha: g'a ha rnams la 'ang ngo //

original: ae k'a'i de phan la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ae k'a'i de phan la 'ang ngo //

original: d'i ba a'ap dag gi ming sde ba sbyordag las mang po'o //
analyzed: d'i ba a'ap dag gi ming sde ba sbyordag las mang po'o //

analyzed: aishta k'a: a'i sh'i k'a: m'a l'a rnams kyi tsi ta h'u la bh'a ra rnams la'o //

original: bandhu shu: dzyo ti sha: dza na pa da: r'a tri: n'a bhi: n'a ma: go tra: r'u pa: sth'a na: barna: pa yas: pa tsa na: bandhu rnams la'o //
analyzed: bandhu shu: dzyo ti sha: dza na pa da: r'a tri: n'a bhi: n'a ma: go tra: r'u pa: sth'a na: barna: pa yas: pa tsa na: bandhu rnams la'o //

original: spyod pa la brahma ts'a ri la'o //
analyzed: spyod pa la brahma ts'a ri la'o //

original: t'irtha la ya la'o //
analyzed: t'irtha la ya la'o //
translated: Of Tirtha, of Yati.

original: au dar la 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: au dar la 'dam ka'o //
translated: The choice of Udana.

original: dri ka dri sha ba tu rnams la'o //
analyzed: dri ka dri sha ba tu rnams la'o //

original: ai dam kim dag gi a'i sha k'i dag go //
analyzed: ai dam kim dag gi a'i sha k'i dag go //

original: sarba n'a ma'i a'a'o ;
analyzed: sarba n'a ma'i a'a'o ;
translated: To Sarva, the a.

original: / drug pa dang gsum pa dag gnas pa ma yin pa'i aa n+ya kyi du ka a'a sh'isha a'a sha: a'asth'a: a'asthi ta: aut+su ka: a'u ti: k'a ra ka: r'a ga: tsha rnams la'o //
analyzed: / drug pa dang gsum pa dag gnas pa ma yin pa'i aa n+ya kyi du ka a'a sh'isha a'a sha: a'asth'a: a'asthi ta: aut+su ka: a'u ti: k'a ra ka: r'a ga: tsha rnams la'o //
translated: To the sixth and third, the non-locative a of any, the du of ka, the aś of āśi, the aś of āsthā, the aś of āsthita, the uka of utsūka, the u of ūtī, the kara of kāraka, and the ra of rāga.

original: ku'i kata de'i skyes bu la aatsa'o //
analyzed: ku'i kata de'i skyes bu la aatsa'o //
translated: To Kūkata, the a of its man.

original: ra tha pa da dag las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ra tha pa da dag las kyang ngo //

original: tri na la'ang rigs la'o //
analyzed: tri na la'ang rigs la'o //
translated: To Triṇa, the gotra.

original: pa thin aaksha dag las k'a'o //
analyzed: pa thin aaksha dag las k'a'o //

original: chung ngu'i don la'ang ngo //
analyzed: chung ngu'i don la'ang ngo //

original: pu ru shal gdam nga'o //
analyzed: pu ru shal gdam nga'o //

original: aushna la ka pa'ang ngo //
analyzed: aushna la ka pa'ang ngo //

original: pri sho da ra la sogs pa rnams gang legs pa rnams su'o //
analyzed: pri sho da ra la sogs pa rnams gang legs pa rnams su'o //
translated: To Priṣodara and so on, the best.

original: na hi bri ti: bri dzi: bya dhi: ru tsi: sa hi: ta ni rnams la kvi pa la'o //
analyzed: na hi bri ti: bri dzi: bya dhi: ru tsi: sa hi: ta ni rnams la kvi pa la'o //

original: pa na gi ri dag las ming la ko ta ra kim shu lu ka sogs rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: pa na gi ri dag las ming la ko ta ra kim shu lu ka sogs rnams kyi'o //

original: pa na'i pu ra k'a: mi shra k'a: si dhra k'a: sa ri k'a: ko ta ra: aa gra rnams las so //
analyzed: pa na'i pu ra k'a: mi shra k'a: si dhra k'a: sa ri k'a: ko ta ra: aa gra rnams las so //
translated: from Panini, Pushkara, Misraka, Siddhanti, Sarirka, Koti, and Agra.

original: pra nir: aantar: shar: aikshu plaksha: a'a mra: k'arshya: kha di ra: p'i lu: a'uksh'a rnams las ming la yang ngo //
analyzed: pra nir: aantar: shar: aikshu plaksha: a'a mra: k'arshya: kha di ra: p'i lu: a'uksh'a rnams las ming la yang ngo //
translated: From Pranir, Antar, Shar, Ikshu, Plaksha, Amra, Karshya, Khadira, Pulu, and Uksha, also in the name.

original: nyer bsgyur gyi ghanya la mi ma yin pa la mang por ro //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur gyi ghanya la mi ma yin pa la mang por ro //

original: sman rnams la ba na'i gdam nga'o //
analyzed: sman rnams la ba na'i gdam nga'o //

original: ai ri k'a sogs rnams las ma yin no //
analyzed: ai ri k'a sogs rnams las ma yin no //
translated: Not from Irika, etc.

original: p'a na'i yul la'o //
analyzed: p'a na'i yul la'o //

original: dngos po dang byed pa dag las yang na'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang byed pa dag las yang na'o //

original: gi ri na d'i sogs rnams kyi yang na'o //
analyzed: gi ri na d'i sogs rnams kyi yang na'o //

original: ming num rnam dbye rnams la'ang ngo //
analyzed: ming num rnam dbye rnams la'ang ngo //

original: yu ban sogs kyi ma yin no //
analyzed: yu ban sogs kyi ma yin no //
translated: Not in the case of Uban, etc.

original: ku ldan pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: ku ldan pa la'ang ngo //
translated: Also in the case of Kula.

original: tshig bar na yod pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: tshig bar na yod pa la'ang ngo //
translated: Also in the case of words in the middle.

original: p'a raska ra la sogs pa rnams kyang ming la'o //
analyzed: p'a raska ra la sogs pa rnams kyang ming la'o //

original: aa dha shi ra shi'i pa da la'o //
analyzed: aa dha shi ra shi'i pa da la'o //

original: sto ka la sogs pa rnams lnga pa'i 'o //
analyzed: sto ka la sogs pa rnams lnga pa'i 'o //

original: ao dzas: sa has: aambhas: ta mas las gsum pa'i 'o //
analyzed: ao dzas: sa has: aambhas: ta mas las gsum pa'i 'o //
translated: Ojas, Sahas, Ambhas, Tamas are the three for the three actions.

original: ma nas las ming la'o //
analyzed: ma nas las ming la'o //
translated: Manas is for the name of action.

original: a'a dzny'a yin la'ang ngo //
analyzed: a'a dzny'a yin la'ang ngo //
translated: Ajnani is also for the name.

original: a'atman las kyang @11b rdzogs pa la'o //
analyzed: a'atman las kyang @11b rdzogs pa la'o //

original: pra kri ti sogs rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: pra kri ti sogs rnams las kyang ngo //

original: brda sprod pa'i ming la bzhi pa ya'i 'o //
analyzed: brda sprod pa'i ming la bzhi pa ya'i 'o //
translated: In the name of grammar, the fourth is for the name.

original: pa ra'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: pa ra'i 'ang ngo //
translated: Pari is also for the name.

original: hal aata mtha' las bdun pa'i ming la'o //
analyzed: hal aata mtha' las bdun pa'i ming la'o //
translated: Hal and at the end are for the seventh name.

original: ga b'i yu dhi dag las sthi ra'i 'o //
analyzed: ga b'i yu dhi dag las sthi ra'i 'o //
translated: Gava and yudhi are for sthiri.

original: hrid dib dag las kyang ngo //
analyzed: hrid dib dag las kyang ngo //
translated: Hrid and dib are also for the name.

original: ma dhya las gu ru la'o //
analyzed: ma dhya las gu ru la'o //
translated: Madhya is for guru.

original: aanta las kyang ngo //
analyzed: aanta las kyang ngo //
translated: Anta is also for the name.

original: m'urddha masta ka k'a ma la ma yin zhing rang lus las so //
analyzed: m'urddha masta ka k'a ma la ma yin zhing rang lus las so //
translated: Murddhas, mastaka, kamala are not for one's own body.

original: bandha la'ang gdam nga'o //
analyzed: bandha la'ang gdam nga'o //
translated: Bhanda is also for the name.

original: de'i skyes bu la krita la mang po'o //
analyzed: de'i skyes bu la krita la mang po'o //
translated: In its person, krita is for the plural.

original: pr'a brisha sha rata k'a la d'ipa rnams kyi dza la'o //
analyzed: pr'a brisha sha rata k'a la d'ipa rnams kyi dza la'o //

original: barsha: kshar: sha ra: bar las gdam nga'o //
analyzed: barsha: kshar: sha ra: bar las gdam nga'o //
translated: Varsha, kshara, shara are for the name.

original: sha ya: p'a sa: p'a sin rnams la dus ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: sha ya: p'a sa: p'a sin rnams la dus ma yin pa la'o //
translated: Shaya, pasha, pashin are for the untimely.

original: drug pa ni khros tshig la'o //
analyzed: drug pa ni khros tshig la'o //

original: w'aka di sha pa shyata rnams la yukti: danda: ha ra rnams la'o //
analyzed: w'aka di sha pa shyata rnams la yukti: danda: ha ra rnams la'o //
translated: The words vāka, diśa, paśya, and the like are connected with yuktā, danda, and hara.

original: shvan las she pha: putstsha l'ang+gu la rnams la'o //
analyzed: shvan las she pha: putstsha l'ang+gu la rnams la'o //
translated: The words śvena, śepa, puccha, and aṅgula are connected with śeṣa.

original: pu tra la yang na'o //
analyzed: pu tra la yang na'o //
translated: The word putra is also connected with na.

original: rita las rig pa skye gnas 'brel pa rnams las so //
analyzed: rita las rig pa skye gnas 'brel pa rnams las so //
translated: The words ṛta and ṛtu are connected with birth.

original: sva sri pa ti dag la gdam nga'o //
analyzed: sva sri pa ti dag la gdam nga'o //
translated: The words svāsṛpa and pitṛ are connected with svāsṛ.

original: m'a tri pi tri dag las sva sri 'o //
analyzed: m'a tri pi tri dag las sva sri 'o //
translated: The words mātri and pitṛ are also connected with na.

original: m'a tri bi tri dag la yang na'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las tshig sdud rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: m'a tri bi tri dag la yang na'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las tshig sdud rnams rdzogs so /
translated: Thus ends the section on compounding words from the Pāṇini grammar.

original: // / rtses pa las gong du aana'o //
analyzed: // / rtses pa las gong du aana'o //
translated: The word an is used for play.

original: de'i bu brgyud la'o //
analyzed: de'i bu brgyud la'o //
translated: The word an is used for the descendants of that.

original: yang dag pa'i don rnams kyi thog ma las yang na'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don rnams kyi thog ma las yang na'o //
translated: The word api is used for the beginning of the true meanings.

original: de phan rnams la aatsa rnams kyi dang po'i 'o //
analyzed: de phan rnams la aatsa rnams kyi dang po'i 'o //
translated: The word a is used for the first of the words.

original: bu brgyud la bu'i bu la sogs pa rnams la rigs la'o ;
analyzed: bu brgyud la bu'i bu la sogs pa rnams la rigs la'o ;
translated: The word kula is used for the descendants, such as the grandson and so on.

original: / rigs la gcig pa'o //🔽aata las ainya'o //
analyzed: / rigs la gcig pa'o // aata las ainya'o //
translated: The word kula is used for the single lineage.🔽The word iṇa is used from the word at.

original: yanya ainya dag las so //
analyzed: yanya ainya dag las so //
translated: The words yña and iṇa are used from the words yña and iṇa.

original: ka 'gro ba la'ang ngo //
analyzed: ka 'gro ba la'ang ngo //
translated: The word ka is used for going.

original: garga sogs rnams las yanya'o //
analyzed: garga sogs rnams las yanya'o //
translated: From Garga and so on, Yana.

original: yanya aanya dag gi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: yanya aanya dag gi 'ang ngo //
translated: From Yana and Ana, also.

original: bu brgyud kyi'ang de phan la a'at ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: bu brgyud kyi'ang de phan la a'at ma yin pa la'o //
translated: From the descendants of a son, also, that, but not to the father.

original: ba hu la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ba hu la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: From Bahula and so on, also.

original: su bh'a tri'i aa kang ngo //
analyzed: su bh'a tri'i aa kang ngo //
translated: From Subhadra, Akam.

original: ya\ wa\ tshig dang po dag gi ma yin zhing de dag gi aeetsa'o //
analyzed: ya\ wa\ tshig dang po dag gi ma yin zhing de dag gi aeetsa'o //
translated: From Ya and Va, not the first words, and their Aic.

original: kunydza sogs rnams las rigs la'ang tsphanya'o //
analyzed: kunydza sogs rnams las rigs la'ang tsphanya'o //
translated: From Kunjara and so on, also, to the family, Tphun.

original: pr'ata las tsphanya la bud med min pa la'o //
analyzed: pr'ata las tsphanya la bud med min pa la'o //
translated: From Parata, Tphun, but not to a woman.

original: nyya sogs rnams de'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: nyya sogs rnams de'i rgyal po'o //
translated: From Nya and so on, also, to the king of that.

original: de'i rgyal po mang po rnams la bud med ma yin pa la de yis so //
analyzed: de'i rgyal po mang po rnams la bud med ma yin pa la de yis so //
translated: From the many kings of that, not to a woman, by that.

original: na da sogs rnams las pha ka'o //
analyzed: na da sogs rnams las pha ka'o //
translated: From Nada and so on, to the father.

original: shi ba sogs la aan 'o //
analyzed: shi ba sogs la aan 'o //
translated: From Shiva and so on, An.

original: drang srong aandha ka: brishna: ku ru rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: drang srong aandha ka: brishna: ku ru rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: From the sages Andhaka, Brisha, and Kuru, also.

original: grangs sam: bha dra sngon ma'i m'a tr'i las auta'o //
analyzed: grangs sam: bha dra sngon ma'i m'a tr'i las auta'o //
translated: From Gransam, Bhadra, and the former Matri, Ut.

original: ka n+y'a gyi ka n'i na'ang ngo //
analyzed: ka n+y'a gyi ka n'i na'ang ngo //
translated: From Kanya and Kani, also.

original: bud med rnams las dha ka'o //
analyzed: bud med rnams las dha ka'o //
translated: From women, Dha.

original: shu bhra la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: shu bhra la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: and so on.

original: ka dr'u ma yin pa'i dha la @12a * //
analyzed: ka dr'u ma yin pa'i dha la @12a * //
translated: The dha which is not preceded by ka is the visarga.

original: dbyi'o // aita las kyang ainya ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: dbyi'o // aita las kyang ainya ma yin pa las so //
translated: The i is also from the i which is not preceded by ka.

original: ka ly'a n'i la sogs pa rnams kyi ai nang ngo //
analyzed: ka ly'a n'i la sogs pa rnams kyi ai nang ngo //
translated: The i of kalyāṇī and so on is internal.

original: hrida: bha ga: sindhu rnams mtha' la tshig snga ma'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: hrida: bha ga: sindhu rnams mtha' la tshig snga ma'i 'ang ngo //
translated: The hṛd, bhaga, and sindhu are at the end, and also of the previous word.

original: ku la t'a'i yang na'o //
analyzed: ku la t'a'i yang na'o //
translated: The ku of kula is the aṅga.

original: tsa ta k'a las aee raka'o //
analyzed: tsa ta k'a las aee raka'o //
translated: The ai of cātaka is the rak.

original: go dh'a las dha ka'o //
analyzed: go dh'a las dha ka'o //
translated: The dha of ghodha is the ka.

original: phra mo rnams las yang na'o //
analyzed: phra mo rnams las yang na'o //
translated: The aṅga is also from the small letters.

original: pi tri shva sri las tshan 'o //
analyzed: pi tri shva sri las tshan 'o //
translated: The ṇa of pitṛśvaśura is the ṇa.

original: dhaka la dbyi'o //
analyzed: dhaka la dbyi'o //
translated: The dha of dhaka is the visarga.

original: m'a tri shva sri las 'ang ngo //🔽r'a dzan shva su ra las yata'o //
analyzed: m'a tri shva sri las 'ang ngo // r'a dzan shva su ra las yata'o //
translated: The aṅga is from mātriśvaśura.🔽The ya of rājñaḥ suvarā is the ta.

original: r'a dzan las rigs la yata'o //
analyzed: r'a dzan las rigs la yata'o //
translated: The ya of rājñaḥ is the ra.

original: ksha tra la gha'o //
analyzed: ksha tra la gha'o //
translated: The gha is from kṣatra.

original: ku la las kha'o //
analyzed: ku la las kha'o //
translated: The kha is from kula.

original: tshig sngon na med pa las yata dhaka nya dag yang na'o //
analyzed: tshig sngon na med pa las yata dhaka nya dag yang na'o //
translated: The ya and dha are from that which is not preceded by a previous word.

original: ma h'a ku la las aanya khanya dag go //
analyzed: ma h'a ku la las aanya khanya dag go //
translated: The aṅga and khya are from mahākula.

original: dushku la las dhaka'o //🔽sva sri las tsha'o //
analyzed: dushku la las dhaka'o // sva sri las tsha'o //
translated: The ka is from duṣkula.🔽The ṇa is from svaśrī.

original: bhr'a tri las byata 'ang ngo //
analyzed: bhr'a tri las byata 'ang ngo //
translated: The ya is from bhartṛ.

original: dgra bo la byan la'o //
analyzed: dgra bo la byan la'o //
translated: [The word] 'enemy' [is formed] from the words dvara, 'door', and bhaya, 'fear'.

original: re ba t'i la sogs pa rnams las thaka'o //🔽tha'i aika'o // drang srong ma yin pa'i rgyun ma chad pa la bi da la sogs pa rnams las aanya'o //
analyzed: re ba t'i la sogs pa rnams las thaka'o // tha'i aika'o // drang srong ma yin pa'i rgyun ma chad pa la bi da la sogs pa rnams las aanya'o //
translated: [The word] 'hope' [is formed] from the words aśa, 'desire', and ta, 'to go'.

original: yaska la sogs pa rnams las rigs la'o //🔽aa tri bhri gu kut+sa ba sishtha: go ta ma: aang+gi ras rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: yaska la sogs pa rnams las rigs la'o // aa tri bhri gu kut+sa ba sishtha: go ta ma: aang+gi ras rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: [The word] 'ascetic' [is formed] from the words vid, 'to know', and ala, 'to go', and so on.

original: ljongs kyi sgra las rgyal rigs las aanya'o //🔽thung ngu yang ba'o //
analyzed: ljongs kyi sgra las rgyal rigs las aanya'o // thung ngu yang ba'o //
translated: [The word] 'family' [is formed] from the words yuga, 'pair', and ka, and so on.🔽[The word] 'Brahmin' [is formed] from the words atra, 'here', bhr̥gu, 'name of a sage', kuta, 'origin', and vasistha, 'best', and so on.🔽[The word] 'Kshatriya' [is formed] from the words go, 'cow', and tr̥i, 'three', and so on.

original: yang dag par sbyor ba la lci ba'o //🔽ring po'ang ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par sbyor ba la lci ba'o // ring po'ang ngo //
translated: [The word] 'light' [is formed] from the words alpa, 'small', and guru, 'heavy'.🔽[The word] 'long' [is formed] from the words guru, 'heavy', and dīrgha, 'long'.

original: drang srong ma yin pa lci ba mtha' nye ldan pa las rigs la aan ainya dag ni shyang 'o //
analyzed: drang srong ma yin pa lci ba mtha' nye ldan pa las rigs la aan ainya dag ni shyang 'o //
translated: [The word] 'family' [is formed] from the words guru, 'heavy', and dīrgha, 'long', and so on.

original: aa shva pa ti la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: aa shva pa ti la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: [The word] 'Asvapatī' [is formed] from the words aśva, 'horse', and pati, 'lord', and so on.

original: di ti: aa di ti: a'a di tya pa ti tshig phyi ma las nya'o //🔽aut+sa la sogs pa rnams las aanya'o //
analyzed: di ti: aa di ti: a'a di tya pa ti tshig phyi ma las nya'o // aut+sa la sogs pa rnams las aanya'o //
translated: [The word] 'sun' [is formed] from the words aditi, 'not hidden', and aditi, 'not hidden', and so on.🔽[The word] 'lotus' [is formed] from the words utsa, 'peak', and ala, 'to go', and so on.

original: str'i pum sa dag las dngos po la nanya snanya dag go //
analyzed: str'i pum sa dag las dngos po la nanya snanya dag go //
translated: [The word] 'thing' [is formed] from the words stri, 'woman', and pum, 'man', and so on.

original: de yis btsos pa'i tshos las so //
analyzed: de yis btsos pa'i tshos las so //
translated: From the cooking of that, the cooking.

original: l'a ksh'a: ro tsa na: sha ka la: kardda ma rnams las thaka'o //
analyzed: l'a ksh'a: ro tsa na: sha ka la: kardda ma rnams las thaka'o //
translated: LĀKṢA, ROHA, ŚA, KA, LA, KARDA, and MA, from them THA.

original: rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba'i dus la'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba'i dus la'o //
translated: At the time of the conjunction of the lunar mansions.

original: mnyam par lta ba la'o //
analyzed: mnyam par lta ba la'o //
translated: In the equal view.

original: shing rta yongs su dkris pa'o //
analyzed: shing rta yongs su dkris pa'o //
translated: The complete envelopment of the chariot.

original: snod rnams la der blugs pa la'o //
analyzed: snod rnams la der blugs pa la'o //
translated: In the vessels, pouring into them.

original: zas legs par sbyar ba rnams so //
analyzed: zas legs par sbyar ba rnams so //
translated: The well-prepared foods.

original: de 'di la zla ba nya gang ba'i ming la'o //
analyzed: de 'di la zla ba nya gang ba'i ming la'o //
translated: That is the name of the full moon.

original: de 'di'i lha nyid la'o //
analyzed: de 'di'i lha nyid la'o //
translated: That is his deity itself.

original: ka'i ai ta'o //
analyzed: ka'i ai ta'o //
translated: KĀ, Ī, TA.

original: shu kra las ghan 'o //
analyzed: shu kra las ghan 'o //
translated: From ŚUKRA, GHA.

original: so ma las yana'o //
analyzed: so ma las yana'o //
translated: From SOMA, YA.

original: b'a yu: ri tu: pi tri au shas rnams las yata'o //
analyzed: b'a yu: ri tu: pi tri au shas rnams las yata'o //

original: rita kyi r'ing 'o //
analyzed: rita kyi r'ing 'o //
translated: From RITTA, KĪR.

original: aagni las dhaka'o //
analyzed: aagni las dhaka'o //

original: lha nyid la zlas dbye la'ang ngo //
analyzed: lha nyid la zlas dbye la'ang ngo //
translated: The deity itself is also the division.

original: aindra pha rol gyi ma yin no //
analyzed: aindra pha rol gyi ma yin no //
translated: Not the other side of INDRA.

original: ring po las kyang ba ru na'i 'o //
analyzed: ring po las kyang ba ru na'i 'o //

original: de'i tshogs la'o //
analyzed: de'i tshogs la'o //
translated: His assembly.

original: bhiksha la sogs pa rnams la aana'o //
analyzed: bhiksha la sogs pa rnams la aana'o //

analyzed: kra ma la sogs pa rnams las buna'o //
