original: de 'di na yod pa zhes pa yul la de'i ming la'o //
analyzed: de 'di na yod pa zhes pa yul la de'i ming la'o //
translated: This is in this country—in the object, in its name.

original: de yis rdzogs pa la'o //
analyzed: de yis rdzogs pa la'o //
translated: From that, perfected.

original: de'i gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: de'i gnas pa la'o //
translated: From that, abiding.

original: mi ring ba nyid las kyang ngo //
analyzed: mi ring ba nyid las kyang ngo //
translated: From non-distance.

original: ljongs la dbyi'o //
analyzed: ljongs la dbyi'o //
translated: In the country, a country.

original: ba ra na la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ba ra na la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: From varana, etc., also.

original: lhag ma la'o //
analyzed: lhag ma la'o //
translated: From the remainder.

original: der skyes pa las so //
analyzed: der skyes pa las so //
translated: From birth there.

original: pr'a brisha las thaka'o //
analyzed: pr'a brisha las thaka'o //
translated: From parā, bṛśa, and taka.

original: de la dngos po la'o //
analyzed: de la dngos po la'o //
translated: From that, thing.

original: di sha la sogs pa rnams las yata'o //
analyzed: di sha la sogs pa rnams las yata'o //
translated: From diśa, etc., yat.

original: lus kyi cha shas las kyang ngo //
analyzed: lus kyi cha shas las kyang ngo //

original: de las 'ongs pa la'o //🔽gnas nas 'ongs pa la thaka'o //
analyzed: de las 'ongs pa la'o // gnas nas 'ongs pa la thaka'o //
translated: From that, come.🔽From sthāna, come.

original: de 'di'i gnas la'o //
analyzed: de 'di'i gnas la'o //
translated: From that, its abode.

original: des rab tu gsung ba la'o //
analyzed: des rab tu gsung ba la'o //
translated: From that, it is said.

original: byas pa'i gzhung la'o //
analyzed: byas pa'i gzhung la'o //
translated: From the text of the deed.

original: de'i 'di la'o //
analyzed: de'i 'di la'o //
translated: From that, this.

original: ra tha las yata'o //
analyzed: ra tha las yata'o //
translated: From ratha, yat.

original: gr'a ma las ya khanya dag go //
analyzed: gr'a ma las ya khanya dag go //
translated: From grāma, yakṣa.

original: na d'i la sogs pa rnams las dhaka'o //
analyzed: na d'i la sogs pa rnams las dhaka'o //
translated: From nanda, etc., dha.

original: dakshi n'a pashts'ata pu ras las tyaka'o //
analyzed: dakshi n'a pashts'ata pu ras las tyaka'o //
translated: From dakṣiṇā, paścāt, and pura, tyak.

original: dipa: pr'atsa: aa b'atsa: au d'itsa: pra t'itsa las yata'o //
analyzed: dipa: pr'atsa: aa b'atsa: au d'itsa: pra t'itsa las yata'o //
translated: Dip, parac, avac, udac, pratidac, yato.

original: mi zad pa las tyapa'o //
analyzed: mi zad pa las tyapa'o //
translated: From the indeclinable, tyap.

original: ni las brtan pa la tyapa'o //
analyzed: ni las brtan pa la tyapa'o //
translated: From ni, tyap in the sense of stability.

original: aeesha: mas: hyas: shvas las yang na'o //🔽gang gi aatsa rnams kyi dang po 'phel ba de 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: aeesha: mas: hyas: shvas las yang na'o // gang gi aatsa rnams kyi dang po 'phel ba de 'phel ba'o //
translated: From aish, mas, hyas, shvas, yag.

original: 'phel ba las tsha 'o //
analyzed: 'phel ba las tsha 'o //
translated: That in which the first letters of the words increase is the augment of increase.🔽From the augment of increase, tsha.

original: tyada la sogs ba rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: tyada la sogs ba rnams kyang ngo //
translated: Also from tyad, etc.

original: rkyen dang tshig phyi ma dag las kyang ngo //
analyzed: rkyen dang tshig phyi ma dag las kyang ngo //
translated: Also from the conditions and the following words.

original: bha bata las thaka tshapa dag go //🔽sa 'gro ba la'ang ngo //
analyzed: bha bata las thaka tshapa dag go // sa 'gro ba la'ang ngo //
translated: From bhavati, thag and tsha.

original: ainya las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ainya las kyang ngo //
translated: Also from the going of the earth.🔽Also from iñ.

original: ga ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ga ha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: Also from gha, etc.

original: dza na pa ra dag las kuka 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dza na pa ra dag las kuka 'ang ngo //
translated: Also from jana and para, kuk.

original: yushmad aasmad dag las khanya yang na'ang ngo //
analyzed: yushmad aasmad dag las khanya yang na'ang ngo //
translated: Also from yushmat and asmat, khyan.

original: de la aan la'ang yushm'a ka aasm'a ka dag go //
analyzed: de la aan la'ang yushm'a ka aasm'a ka dag go //
translated: In that, also yushmak and asmak.

original: gcig tshig la ta ba ka ma ma ka dag go //
analyzed: gcig tshig la ta ba ka ma ma ka dag go //
translated: In the singular, tavak and mamaka.

original: ma dhya las ma'o //🔽a'a di las @13a * //
analyzed: ma dhya las ma'o // a'a di las @13a * //
translated: From madhya, ma.🔽Also from adi.

original: kyang ngo // aa dhas kyi mtha' dbyi ba'ang ngo //
analyzed: kyang ngo // aa dhas kyi mtha' dbyi ba'ang ngo //
translated: Also from adhas, the end of the i.

original: mnyam pa la aa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa la aa'o //
translated: The equal [state] is ā.

original: dus las thanya 'o //
analyzed: dus las thanya 'o //
translated: From time is tha.

original: ni sh'a: pra do sha dag las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ni sh'a: pra do sha dag las kyang ngo //
translated: From niśā, pradoṣa, and so forth.

original: shvas las tut 'ang ngo //
analyzed: shvas las tut 'ang ngo //
translated: From śvā is tuṭ.

original: dv'a ra la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang ngo //
analyzed: dv'a ra la sogs pa rnams kyi'ang ngo //
translated: From dvara and so forth.

original: rtag tu aan ste ta dbyi ba'ang ngo //
analyzed: rtag tu aan ste ta dbyi ba'ang ngo //
translated: Always is an, and also tadvyā.

original: s'a yam: tsi ram: pr'a hne: pra ge: mi zad pa rnams las sh++yut yul dag ste tut 'ang ngo //
analyzed: s'a yam: tsi ram: pr'a hne: pra ge: mi zad pa rnams las sh++yut yul dag ste tut 'ang ngo //
translated: From sāyam, cirām, prāhane, prage, and so forth.

original: aa gra bashts'ata las ai man 'o //
analyzed: aa gra bashts'ata las ai man 'o //
translated: From agra-bhakṣa is iman.

original: aanta las kyang ngo //
analyzed: aanta las kyang ngo //
translated: From anta also.

original: de'i rnam par 'gyur ba la'o //
analyzed: de'i rnam par 'gyur ba la'o //
translated: [It is] in its transformation.

original: srog chags dang / sman dang / shing rnams las yan lag la'o //
analyzed: srog chags dang / sman dang / shing rnams las yan lag la'o //
translated: From beings, herbs, and trees, [it is] in the limbs.

original: bshad pa la ma yad yang na ste bza' ba dang / gos de dag las ma yin no //
analyzed: bshad pa la ma yad yang na ste bza' ba dang / gos de dag las ma yin no //
translated: In the explanation, it is mayat, or it is not in those foods and clothes.

original: 'phel ba dang / sha ra la sogs pa rnams las rtag tu'o //
analyzed: 'phel ba dang / sha ra la sogs pa rnams las rtag tu'o //
translated: From increase, śara and so forth, it is always.

original: de rang bzhin brjod pa la ma yata'o //🔽go las gci ba la'o //
analyzed: de rang bzhin brjod pa la ma yata'o // go las gci ba la'o //
translated: That is the expression of its nature.🔽From gola is excretion.

original: go dang ba yas dag las yata'o //
analyzed: go dang ba yas dag las yata'o //
translated: From gola and bāhya is yat.

original: 'bras bu la 'jig go //
analyzed: 'bras bu la 'jig go //
translated: [It is] in the fruit.

original: de phan 'jig pa las 'jig go //
analyzed: de phan 'jig pa las 'jig go //
translated: From that, it is in the destruction of benefit.

original: go n'i'i aita'o //
analyzed: go n'i'i aita'o //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix iṭ.

original: plaksha la sogs pa rnams las aana'o //🔽au las aanya'o //🔽dzambu las yang na'o //
analyzed: plaksha la sogs pa rnams las aana'o // au las aanya'o // dzambu las yang na'o //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix an after plaksha and so on.🔽The genitive case is indicated by the suffix any after u.🔽The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after jambū.

original: dbyi ba'ang ngo //
analyzed: dbyi ba'ang ngo //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after dvipa.

original: ha r'i ta k'i la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ha r'i ta k'i la sogs pa rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after haritaka and so on.

original: de la nges par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de la nges par sbyor ba'o //
translated: That is the definite application.

original: n+ya gro dha'i 'ang gcig nyid la'o //
analyzed: n+ya gro dha'i 'ang gcig nyid la'o //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after nyagrodha.

original: sv'a ga ta la sogs pa rnams kyis 'ang ngo //
analyzed: sv'a ga ta la sogs pa rnams kyis 'ang ngo //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after svagata and so on.🔽The genitive case is indicated by the suffix iṇ after śvāna and so on.

original: shvan la sogs pa rnams kyi ainya la'o //🔽shva ga na las thanya 'ang ngo //
analyzed: shvan la sogs pa rnams kyi ainya la'o // shva ga na las thanya 'ang ngo //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṇ after śva and so on.

original: pa da mtha'i yang na'o //
analyzed: pa da mtha'i yang na'o //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after pada.

original: su sarba aardha las ljongs kyi'o //
analyzed: su sarba aardha las ljongs kyi'o //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after susarvadardha.

original: yang dag par sbyor ba sogs kyang ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par sbyor ba sogs kyang ngo //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after samyagyoga and so on.

original: barma na ma yin pa'i ma sngon ma las bu brgyud la ma yin no //
analyzed: barma na ma yin pa'i ma sngon ma las bu brgyud la ma yin no //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after bhrāmanamā.

original: aoo ksham bu brgyud ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: aoo ksham bu brgyud ma yin pa la'o //
translated: The genitive case is indicated by the suffix aṅ after aukṣma.

original: sha sngon ma han dhrita r'a dzan rnams kyi aan la'o //
analyzed: sha sngon ma han dhrita r'a dzan rnams kyi aan la'o //

analyzed: tshad la dbyi'o //

original: grangs las cha shas la ta ya pa'o //
analyzed: grangs las cha shas la ta ya pa'o //

analyzed: dvi tri dag las ta yapa kyi aa ya tsa yang na'o //

original: au bha las rtag tu'o //
analyzed: au bha las rtag tu'o //

original: de 'di la lhag pa zhes pa da sha'i mtha' las da'o //
analyzed: de 'di la lhag pa zhes pa da sha'i mtha' las da'o //
translated: That which is left over here is daśa. From the end of the case, da.

original: shad mtha' dang / bing sha ti las kyang ngo //
analyzed: shad mtha' dang / bing sha ti las kyang ngo //

original: de'i rdzogs pa la data'o //
analyzed: de'i rdzogs pa la data'o //

original: grangs dang po ma yin pa'i na mtha' las mata'o //
analyzed: grangs dang po ma yin pa'i na mtha' las mata'o //

analyzed: shasha: ka ti: ka ti pa ya: tsa tur rnams kyi thuga'o //

original: tsa tur las tsha yata dag ste tsa dbyi ba'ang ngo //
analyzed: tsa tur las tsha yata dag ste tsa dbyi ba'ang ngo //
translated: The four, ca, ta, ya, and ta, are elided.

original: ba hu: p'u ga: gan: sam gha rnams kyi ti thuka'o //🔽ba tu las ai thuka'o //

original: dvi las t'i ya'o //
analyzed: dvi las t'i ya'o //

analyzed: tri'i slar yang dag par 'gyur ba'ang ngo //

analyzed: ai ran ai ratsa dag kyang ngo //

original: k'anda a'anda las: a'i ran a'i ratsa dag go //
analyzed: k'anda a'anda las: a'i ran a'i ratsa dag go //
translated: from kāṇḍa and āṇḍa.

original: d++yu dru dag las ma'o //
analyzed: d++yu dru dag las ma'o //
translated: from dyau.

original: aata las ai ni than dag go //
analyzed: aata las ai ni than dag go //
translated: The letter i is from the letter a and the letter ta.

original: br'i hi la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: br'i hi la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: It is also from the letters bhr and so forth.

original: shi kha la sogs pa rnams las than ma yin no //
analyzed: shi kha la sogs pa rnams las than ma yin no //
translated: It is not from the letters shi and so forth.

original: tunda la sogs pa rnams las ai latsa'o //
analyzed: tunda la sogs pa rnams las ai latsa'o //
translated: The letter i is from the letters tu and so forth.

original: aasa m'a y'a: me dh'a: sa\ dza\ las bi ni'o //
analyzed: aasa m'a y'a: me dh'a: sa\ dza\ las bi ni'o //
translated: The letter i is from the letters as, ma, ya, me, dha, sa, and ja.

original: shring+ga brinda dag las a'a ra katsa'o //
analyzed: shring+ga brinda dag las a'a ra katsa'o //
translated: The letter i is from the letters shring and bri.

original: pha la barha dag las ai na na'o //
analyzed: pha la barha dag las ai na na'o //
translated: The letter i is from the letters pha, la, and bhr.

original: ra tha las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ra tha las kyang ngo //
translated: It is also from the letter ra.

original: sh'i ta: aushna: tri sha rnams las kyang de mi bzod pa la a'a lutsa'o //
analyzed: sh'i ta: aushna: tri sha rnams las kyang de mi bzod pa la a'a lutsa'o //
translated: The letter i is from the letters shi, ta, ushna, and tri.

original: hi ma las kyang ngo //
analyzed: hi ma las kyang ngo //
translated: It is also from the letter ha.

original: ba la las a'u la'o //
analyzed: ba la las a'u la'o //
translated: The letter u is from the letter va.

original: ba ta las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ba ta las kyang ngo //
translated: It is also from the letter ba.

original: parba: ma ruta dag las ta'o //
analyzed: parba: ma ruta dag las ta'o //
translated: The letter ta is from the letters parva and maruta.

original: a'urn'a las yus 'o //
analyzed: a'urn'a las yus 'o //
translated: The letter u is from the letter urna.

original: b'atsa las gmi ni'o //
analyzed: b'atsa las gmi ni'o //
translated: The letter ni is from the letter vac.

original: smad pa la a'a latsa a'a tatsa dag go //🔽dbang phyug la sv'a la mina'o //
analyzed: smad pa la a'a latsa a'a tatsa dag go // dbang phyug la sv'a la mina'o //
translated: The letters a and at are for contempt.🔽The letter min is for Ishvara.

original: aarshas la sogs pa rnams las aatsa'o //
analyzed: aarshas la sogs pa rnams las aatsa'o //
translated: The letter a is from the letters arsha and so forth.

original: b'a ta: aa tr'i s'a ra dag las kuka 'ang ngo //
analyzed: b'a ta: aa tr'i s'a ra dag las kuka 'ang ngo //
translated: The letter ku is also from the letters vata and atri.

original: hasta las rigs la'o //
analyzed: hasta las rigs la'o //
translated: The letter i is for family from the letter hasta.

original: kam sham dag las: ba bha: yus: ti: tu: ta: ya sa rnams so //
analyzed: kam sham dag las: ba bha: yus: ti: tu: ta: ya sa rnams so //
translated: From kam and sham,🔽va, bha, yu, ti, tu, ta, ya, sa.

original: tundi: ba li: ba ti las bha'o //
analyzed: tundi: ba li: ba ti las bha'o //
translated: From tundi, bali, and bati, bha.

original: aa ham shu bham dag las yusa'o //
analyzed: aa ham shu bham dag las yusa'o //
translated: From aham and subham, yu.

original: ra dzas kri shi: a'a su ti: pa ri shada las ba latsa'o //
analyzed: ra dzas kri shi: a'a su ti: pa ri shada las ba latsa'o //
translated: From raja, kshita, asuti, and parishta, va.

original: ba ya la'o //
analyzed: ba ya la'o //
translated: From bhaya and laya, la.

original: phyogs las snga ma rnam dbye'o //
analyzed: phyogs las snga ma rnam dbye'o //
translated: The first of the directions is the division.

original: dvi la sogs pa rnams ma yin pa'i sarba n'a ma rnams dang kim ba hu rnams las so //
analyzed: dvi la sogs pa rnams ma yin pa'i sarba n'a ma rnams dang kim ba hu rnams las so //
translated: From the ones that are not dvi and so on, all the names and kim bahus.

original: lnga pa las ta sil la'o //
analyzed: lnga pa las ta sil la'o //
translated: From the fifth, ta and sil.

original: ta ha dag las ku'o //🔽ai dam ai sha'o //
analyzed: ta ha dag las ku'o // ai dam ai sha'o //
translated: From ta and ha, ku.🔽From idam, ish.

original: ae tata kyi aa sha'o //
analyzed: ae tata kyi aa sha'o //
translated: From etat, as.

original: ba ri aa bhi dag las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ba ri aa bhi dag las kyang ngo //
translated: From pari and abhi, also.

original: bdun pa las tral 'o //
analyzed: bdun pa las tral 'o //
translated: From the seventh, tral.

original: ai dam las ha'o//🔽kim las aata'o //
analyzed: ai dam las ha'o// kim las aata'o //
translated: From idam, ha.🔽From kim, at.

original: aata la kva'o //
analyzed: aata la kva'o //
translated: From at, kva.

original: sdeb sbyor la ha yang na'o //
analyzed: sdeb sbyor la ha yang na'o //
translated: In prosody, ha is also na.

original: sarba ae ka: aa n+ya: kim: yata: tata rnams las dus la d'a'o //
analyzed: sarba ae ka: aa n+ya: kim: yata: tata rnams las dus la d'a'o //
translated: From sarva, eka, anya, kim, yat, and tat, in time, da.

original: sarba'i d'a la sa yang na'o //
analyzed: sarba'i d'a la sa yang na'o //
translated: From sarva and da, sa also.

original: ai dam las rhila'o //
analyzed: ai dam las rhila'o //
translated: From idam, rhil.

original: ra tha dag las aeta aita dag go //
analyzed: ra tha dag las aeta aita dag go //
translated: From ratha, et and it.

original: aa dhu n'a'o //
analyzed: aa dhu n'a'o //
translated: From adhunā.

original: d'a n'im'ang ngo //🔽tada las d'a 'ang ngo //
analyzed: d'a n'im'ang ngo // tada las d'a 'ang ngo //
translated: and today also.🔽And tomorrow also.

original: de ring ma yin pa la rhil yang na'o //🔽sa dya: pa ru ta: pa r'a ri: aee sha ma: pa re dya bi: aa dya /
analyzed: de ring ma yin pa la rhil yang na'o // sa dya: pa ru ta: pa r'a ri: aee sha ma: pa re dya bi: aa dya /
translated: And not today, also.

original: p'urbe d++yu: aa n+ye d++yu: aa n+ya ta re d++yu: ai ta re d++yu: aa pa re d++yu: aa dha re d++yu: au bha ye d++yu: autta re d++yu:rnams so //
analyzed: p'urbe d++yu: aa n+ye d++yu: aa n+ya ta re d++yu: ai ta re d++yu: aa pa re d++yu: aa dha re d++yu: au bha ye d++yu: autta re d++yu:rnams so //
translated: And yesterday, and today, and tomorrow, and the day after tomorrow, and the day before yesterday, and the day after next, and the day before next, and the day before the day after next, and the day after the day before next.

original: rnam pa brjod pa la th'ala'o //
analyzed: rnam pa brjod pa la th'ala'o //
translated: In the expression of a state, -tha.

original: ai dam las tha mu'o //
analyzed: ai dam las tha mu'o //
translated: From idam, -tham.

original: kim las kyang ngo //
analyzed: kim las kyang ngo //
translated: From kim, -ka.

original: @15a * // phyogs kyi sgra rnams las bdun pa lnga pa dang po rnams las phyogs dus yul rnams la aast'a ti'o //
analyzed: @15a * // phyogs kyi sgra rnams las bdun pa lnga pa dang po rnams las phyogs dus yul rnams la aast'a ti'o //
translated: From the words for directions, the fifth and first of the seven are -as, -ati in the sense of direction, time, and place.

original: p'urba: aa dha ra: aa pa ra rnams kyi aa si la: pur: aa dha: aa ba 'di rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: p'urba: aa dha ra: aa pa ra rnams kyi aa si la: pur: aa dha: aa ba 'di rnams kyang ngo //
translated: Purva, adhara, aparas have -asi, -au, -ava.

original: aast'a ti las kyang ngo //
analyzed: aast'a ti las kyang ngo //
translated: From astitva, also.

original: aa pa ra'i 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: aa pa ra'i 'dam ka'o //
translated: From aparai, optionally.

original: dakshi na autta ra dag las /
analyzed: dakshi na autta ra dag las /
translated: From dakshina and uttara,

original: aa ta sutsa'o //
analyzed: aa ta sutsa'o //
translated: -asya.

original: ba ra: aa ba ra dag las yang na'o //
analyzed: ba ra: aa ba ra dag las yang na'o //
translated: From vara and avara, also.

original: aanytsa las dbyi'o //
analyzed: aanytsa las dbyi'o //
translated: 3. anicya, from anic.

original: au pa ri au pa risht'a ta 'o //
analyzed: au pa ri au pa risht'a ta 'o //
translated: 4. upapari, from upapariṣṭāt.🔽5. paścāt.

original: pashts'ata 'o // autta ra: aa dha ra: dakshi na las a'a ti'o //
analyzed: pashts'ata 'o // autta ra: aa dha ra: dakshi na las a'a ti'o //
translated: 6. uttara, adhara, dakṣiṇa, from āta.

original: ring po ma yin pa la lnga pa ma yin pa las ae nas yang na'o //
analyzed: ring po ma yin pa la lnga pa ma yin pa las ae nas yang na'o //
translated: 7. na dīrgha, from pañcama.

original: dakshi na las a'a tsa'o //🔽ring po las a'a hi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dakshi na las a'a tsa'o // ring po las a'a hi 'ang ngo //
translated: 8. dakṣiṇa, from āca.🔽9. na dīrgha, from āhi.

original: autta ra las kyang ngo //
analyzed: autta ra las kyang ngo //
translated: 10. uttara, from āṅ.

original: grangs las rnam pa'i don la dh'a'o //🔽ae ka las dh'a'i dhya munya yang na'o //
analyzed: grangs las rnam pa'i don la dh'a'o // ae ka las dh'a'i dhya munya yang na'o //
translated: 11. saṅkhyā, from ākāra.🔽12. eka, from dhyamuni.

original: ae dh'a'ang ngo //
analyzed: ae dh'a'ang ngo //
translated: 13. eka, from eka.

original: smad pa la p'a sha pa'o //🔽ain las sha'o //
analyzed: smad pa la p'a sha pa'o // ain las sha'o //
translated: 14. nindā, from pāśa.🔽15. eka, from śa.

original: rdzogs pa las t'i ya las cha la aana'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa las t'i ya las cha la aana'o //
translated: 16. sampūrṇa, from yā.

original: sdeb sbyor ma yin pa la bcu gcig gi snga ma rnams las so //
analyzed: sdeb sbyor ma yin pa la bcu gcig gi snga ma rnams las so //
translated: 17. anupratiṣṭhita, from ekādaśa.

original: shashtha: aashta: ma dag las nya'ang ngo //
analyzed: shashtha: aashta: ma dag las nya'ang ngo //
translated: 18. ṣaṣṭha, aṣṭama, from mā.

original: byung ba sngon ma la tsa rata'o //
analyzed: byung ba sngon ma la tsa rata'o //
translated: 19. pūrva, from cārita.

original: drug pa las r'u pya yang ngo //🔽phul du byung ba la ta mas aishthan dag go //
analyzed: drug pa las r'u pya yang ngo // phul du byung ba la ta mas aishthan dag go //
translated: 20. ṣaṣṭha, from rūpya.🔽21. uttama, from taṃ.

original: ting las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ting las kyang ngo //
translated: 22. uttama, from tiṅ.

original: brjod pa gnyis las brkang ba dang nye ba'i tshig la ta rapa a'iya suna'o //
analyzed: brjod pa gnyis las brkang ba dang nye ba'i tshig la ta rapa a'iya suna'o //
translated: Of the two kinds of expression, [the expression of] the foot and the near-word, [the expression of] the foot is from tara, parā, and suno.

original: aa dza la sogs pa rnams las yon tan brjod pa las 'di'o //
analyzed: aa dza la sogs pa rnams las yon tan brjod pa las 'di'o //
translated: Of the expression of the quality from aja and so on, this is it.

original: ta rab ta mapa dag gha'o //
analyzed: ta rab ta mapa dag gha'o //
translated: Tara, para, tama, and gha.

original: rdzas ma yin pa phul du byung ba la kim dang: ae dang: ting dang: mi zad pa rnams la gha las a'a mu'o //
analyzed: rdzas ma yin pa phul du byung ba la kim dang: ae dang: ting dang: mi zad pa rnams la gha las a'a mu'o //
translated: For a non-substance that is excellent, from kim, e, ting, and the imperishable ones, āmu from gha.

original: tri'i sdeb sbyor la'o //
analyzed: tri'i sdeb sbyor la'o //
translated: In the meter of tri.

original: tri yi aishtha na: ai man: a'i ya sun rnams la'o //
analyzed: tri yi aishtha na: ai man: a'i ya sun rnams la'o //
translated: In the meter of tri, iṣṭha, imana, and āyusun.

original: pra sha sya gyi shra'o //
analyzed: pra sha sya gyi shra'o //
translated: Praśasyagīṣṭha.

original: aatsa gcig pa la rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: aatsa gcig pa la rang bzhin gyis so //
translated: In the single a, by nature.

original: dzya 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dzya 'ang ngo //
translated: Jya also.

original: dzya las a'i yas kyi a'ata'o //
analyzed: dzya las a'i yas kyi a'ata'o //
translated: Āta from jya, āyasa.

original: briddha'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: briddha'i 'ang ngo //
translated: Bṛddhi also.

original: aanti ka dang / b'a dha dag gi ne da s'a dha dag go //
analyzed: aanti ka dang / b'a dha dag gi ne da s'a dha dag go //
translated: Of antika and vādha, nedasādha.

original: sthu la: d'u ra: yu ba: hrasva: kshi pra: kshu dra rnams kyi pha rol gyi dang bo'i yan ste snga mas kyang yon tan no //
analyzed: sthu la: d'u ra: yu ba: hrasva: kshi pra: kshu dra rnams kyi pha rol gyi dang bo'i yan ste snga mas kyang yon tan no //
translated: Of sthula, dūra, yuga, hrasva, kṣipra, and kṣudra, the first of the other, and also the former, the quality.

original: pri ya: sthi ra: sphi ra: au ru: ba hu la: gu ru: braddha: tri pta: d'irgha: brind'a raka rnams kyi pra: stha: spha: ba ra: bam hi: gar: barshi: tra pa: dr'aghi: brinda rnams so //
analyzed: pri ya: sthi ra: sphi ra: au ru: ba hu la: gu ru: braddha: tri pta: d'irgha: brind'a raka rnams kyi pra: stha: spha: ba ra: bam hi: gar: barshi: tra pa: dr'aghi: brinda rnams so //
translated: priya, sthira, sphīta, uru, bahula, guru, baddha, tripita, dīrgha, bhinna.

original: ba hu las dbyi ste ba hu'i bh'u'o //
analyzed: ba hu las dbyi ste ba hu'i bh'u'o //
translated: Bahula becomes bahu.

original: aishthan gyi yit 'ang ngo //
analyzed: aishthan gyi yit 'ang ngo //
translated: Iṣṭa becomes iṭ.

original: yu ba aalpa dag gi ka na yang na'o //
analyzed: yu ba aalpa dag gi ka na yang na'o //
translated: Yuvā and alpa become kanaya.

original: bin ma tu pa dag gis 'jig go //
analyzed: bin ma tu pa dag gis 'jig go //
translated: Vinamati becomes vinaya.

original: kha bsgyur ba la r'u pa ya'o //
analyzed: kha bsgyur ba la r'u pa ya'o //
translated: Rūpa is for varṇa.

original: cung zad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dag la kalpa @15b pa: de shya: de sh'i ya ra rnams so //
analyzed: cung zad yongs su ma rdzogs pa dag la kalpa @15b pa: de shya: de sh'i ya ra rnams so //
translated: Kalpa, cetas, trp, gotr, matra, hatra have dī.

original: supa las ba hu tsa yang na ste dang por 'o //
analyzed: supa las ba hu tsa yang na ste dang por 'o //
translated: Supa becomes bahu or sta.

original: rnam pa brjod pa la dz'a t'i yar 'o //
analyzed: rnam pa brjod pa la dz'a t'i yar 'o //
translated: Jāti is for ākhyāna.

original: gha: r'u pa: kalpa: tse lat: bru ba: go tra: ma tra: ha ta rnams la d'i'i aa tsa gcig ma yin pa las thung ngu'o //
analyzed: gha: r'u pa: kalpa: tse lat: bru ba: go tra: ma tra: ha ta rnams la d'i'i aa tsa gcig ma yin pa las thung ngu'o //
translated: Gha, rūpa, kalpa, celata, trp, gotr, matra, hatra have dī.

original: na d'i'i yang na'o //
analyzed: na d'i'i yang na'o //
translated: Nadi becomes na.

original: auka 'gro ba las kyang ngo //
analyzed: auka 'gro ba las kyang ngo //
translated: Uka becomes gati.

original: 'di las gong du ka'o //
analyzed: 'di las gong du ka'o //
translated: From this, ka is higher.

original: mi shes pa la'o //🔽smad pa la'o //
analyzed: mi shes pa la'o // smad pa la'o //
translated: For the unknown.🔽For the contemptible.

original: mi zad pa sarba n'a ma rnams kyi ti'i gong du aa katsa'o //
analyzed: mi zad pa sarba n'a ma rnams kyi ti'i gong du aa katsa'o //
translated: For the imperishable.

original: ka'i 'ang da'o //🔽ku t'i: sha m'i: shunda rnams las ra'o //
analyzed: ka'i 'ang da'o // ku t'i: sha m'i: shunda rnams las ra'o //
translated: For the small.🔽For the short.

original: bat+sa: au ksha: aa shva rnams las lus nyid la'o //
analyzed: bat+sa: au ksha: aa shva rnams las lus nyid la'o //
translated: For the body.

original: kim yad tad las gnyis las gcig nges par 'dzin pa la da ta ratsa'o //
analyzed: kim yad tad las gnyis las gcig nges par 'dzin pa la da ta ratsa'o //
translated: For the definite determination of one of two.

original: mang po rnams kyi rigs 'dri ba la da ta ma tsa yang na'o //
analyzed: mang po rnams kyi rigs 'dri ba la da ta ma tsa yang na'o //
translated: For the question of the type of many.

original: ae ka las kyang shar pa rnams kyi'o //🔽sgra thams cad las rang don la kana'o //
analyzed: ae ka las kyang shar pa rnams kyi'o // sgra thams cad las rang don la kana'o //
translated: For the eastern.🔽For one's own purpose.

original: ka la aana'i 'o //🔽pra dzny'a la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //🔽grangs las bya ba lan grangs la kri tva sutsa'o //
analyzed: ka la aana'i 'o // pra dzny'a la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo // grangs las bya ba lan grangs la kri tva sutsa'o //
translated: For the one.🔽For the wise.

original: dvitri tsa tur rnams las sutsa'o //
analyzed: dvitri tsa tur rnams las sutsa'o //
translated: For the repeated action.

original: ae ka'i sa krita 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ae ka'i sa krita 'ang ngo //
translated: For the fourth.🔽For the third.

original: mang ba dang nyung ba'i don las byed pa las shas yang na'o //
analyzed: mang ba dang nyung ba'i don las byed pa las shas yang na'o //
translated: For the action of many and few.

original: grangs gcig tshig las thob par 'dod pa la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: grangs gcig tshig las thob par 'dod pa la 'ang ngo //
translated: For the desire to obtain the singular.

original: pra ti sbyor ba la lnga pa las ta si'o //
analyzed: pra ti sbyor ba la lnga pa las ta si'o //
translated: In the case of the compound prāti, the fifth case is used with the affix tas.

original: a'a di ma dhya la sa ta te prishtha p'arshva la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: a'a di ma dhya la sa ta te prishtha p'arshva la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: In the case of ādi, madhya, and anta, the instrumental is used with the affix -pṛṣṭha, etc.

original: byung khungs la yang h'i ya ru ha dag ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: byung khungs la yang h'i ya ru ha dag ma yin pa las so //
translated: In the case of origin, the genitive is used with the affix -haya and -ruha.🔽In the case of the non-occurrence of what has occurred, the compound is used with the affix -bhūta.

original: ma byung ba de byung ba la kri bh'u aasti sbyor ba la phun sum tshogs pa'i byed pa la tsvi'o //🔽aa'i tsvi la'o //🔽bi'i dbyi'o // kyatsvi la'ang ngo //
analyzed: ma byung ba de byung ba la kri bh'u aasti sbyor ba la phun sum tshogs pa'i byed pa la tsvi'o // aa'i tsvi la'o // bi'i dbyi'o // kyatsvi la'ang ngo //
translated: In the case of the completion of an action, the affix -ca is used.🔽In the case of the completion of a cause, the affix -ca is used.

original: tsvi la 'ang ngo //🔽aa rus: ma nas: tsakshusa: tse tas: ra has: ra dzas rnams kyi dbyi'o //
analyzed: tsvi la 'ang ngo // aa rus: ma nas: tsakshusa: tse tas: ra has: ra dzas rnams kyi dbyi'o //
translated: In the case of the completion of a purpose, the affix -ca is used.🔽In the case of the completion of a quality, the affix -ca is used.🔽In the case of the completion of a condition, the affix -ca is used.

original: rdzogs pa la s'a ti yang na'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa la s'a ti yang na'o //
translated: In the case of completion, the affix -sati is used.

original: s'ata dang tshig gi dang po dag gi'o //
analyzed: s'ata dang tshig gi dang po dag gi'o //
translated: In the case of the first word of a sentence, the affix -sati is used.

original: mngon par khyab pa la sam pa da las kyang ngo //
analyzed: mngon par khyab pa la sam pa da las kyang ngo //
translated: In the case of pervasion, the affix -sam is used.

original: de'i g-yog 'khor brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: de'i g-yog 'khor brjod pa la'o //
translated: In the case of expressing its retinue, the affix -sam is used.

original: sbyin par bya ba la tr'a yang ngo //
analyzed: sbyin par bya ba la tr'a yang ngo //
translated: In the case of what is to be given, the affix -tra is used.

original: de ba: ma nu shya: pu ru sha: pu ru: martya rnams las gnyis pa dang bdun pa dag la mang po'o //
analyzed: de ba: ma nu shya: pu ru sha: pu ru: martya rnams las gnyis pa dang bdun pa dag la mang po'o //
translated: In the case of devas, humans, men, persons, mortals, the second and seventh are used in the plural.

original: mi gsal ba rjes su byed pa las aatsa gcig ma yin pa las ae ti ma yin pa la d'a tsa'o //
analyzed: mi gsal ba rjes su byed pa las aatsa gcig ma yin pa las ae ti ma yin pa la d'a tsa'o //
translated: From the unmanifest, the past, the future, and the non-existent, the suffix ṭi is added.

original: des zlos pa la pha rol la'o //
analyzed: des zlos pa la pha rol la'o //
translated: From the repetition, the other.

original: zlos pa la rtag tu d'atsa la'o //
analyzed: zlos pa la rtag tu d'atsa la'o //
translated: From the repetition, always the suffix ṭi.

original: krinya yi dvi t'i ya: tri t'i ya: shamba: b'i dza las rko ba la'o //
analyzed: krinya yi dvi t'i ya: tri t'i ya: shamba: b'i dza las rko ba la'o //
translated: From kṛtya, the second, the third, and the sixth, the suffix ṭha is added.

original: grangs las kyang gu na mtha' las so //
analyzed: grangs las kyang gu na mtha' las so //
translated: From the number, the end.

original: sa ma ya las kyang thob par @16a * //🔽byed pa la'o //
analyzed: sa ma ya las kyang thob par @16a * // byed pa la'o //
translated: From samaya, also the attainment.

original: sa pa tra nishpa tra las shin tu 'khrugs pa la'o //
analyzed: sa pa tra nishpa tra las shin tu 'khrugs pa la'o //
translated: From sapatra and niṣpatra, the very agitated.

original: nishku la las shubs med pa la'o //
analyzed: nishku la las shubs med pa la'o //
translated: From niṣku, the sheath-less.

original: su kha: pri ya las rjes su mthun pa la'o //
analyzed: su kha: pri ya las rjes su mthun pa la'o //
translated: From sukha and priya, the agreeable.

original: du:kha las rjes su mi mthun pa la'o //🔽sh'u la las tshos pa la'o //
analyzed: du:kha las rjes su mi mthun pa la'o // sh'u la las tshos pa la'o //
translated: From duḥkha, the disagreeable.🔽From śūla, the cooked.

original: satya las mna' ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: satya las mna' ma yin pa la'o //
translated: From satya, the oath.

original: ma dra las skra 'dreg pa la'o //
analyzed: ma dra las skra 'dreg pa la'o //
translated: From madra, the hair-cutting.

original: bha dra las kyang ngo zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las de phan gyi rkyen rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: bha dra las kyang ngo zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las de phan gyi rkyen rnams rdzogs so /
translated: From bhadra, also. Thus, in the Pāṇini grammar, the conditions for the suffixes are complete.

original: // / khyab par 'dod pa la rtag tu'o //
analyzed: // / khyab par 'dod pa la rtag tu'o //
translated: In the case of the desire to pervade, always.

original: pha ri'i spangs pa la'o //
analyzed: pha ri'i spangs pa la'o //
translated: In the case of the abandonment of the far,

original: au pa ri: aa dhi: aa dhas rnams kyi nye ba la'o //
analyzed: au pa ri: aa dhi: aa dhas rnams kyi nye ba la'o //
translated: upapari, adhi, adhas.

original: khro ba dang: smad pa dang: mi sdug pa rnams la go bar mi bzod pa dang ; yang dag par 'dod pa dag la bos nas brjod pa tshig dang po'o //
analyzed: khro ba dang: smad pa dang: mi sdug pa rnams la go bar mi bzod pa dang ; yang dag par 'dod pa dag la bos nas brjod pa tshig dang po'o //
translated: In the case of anger, contempt, and the unpleasant, the inability to bear the understanding, and in the case of the desire to be addressed, the first word is addressed.

original: ae ka 'bru mang po 'dra'o //
analyzed: ae ka 'bru mang po 'dra'o //
translated: One syllable is like many.

original: kun du gnod pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: kun du gnod pa la'ang ngo //
translated: Also in the case of all harm.

original: rnam pa la yon tan gyi'o //
analyzed: rnam pa la yon tan gyi'o //
translated: In the case of the aspect, the quality.

original: tshig sdud ltar mang po la'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las gnyis su brjod pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: tshig sdud ltar mang po la'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las gnyis su brjod pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: In the case of many like a compound word, the sutra of the paninis is completed with the duals.

original: // / byings las so ;
analyzed: // / byings las so ;
translated: From the root.

original: / da ltar ba la lata'o //
analyzed: / da ltar ba la lata'o //
translated: In the present, lat.

original: aat dag 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: aat dag 'gro ba'o //
translated: The at-s are going.

original: tipa: tas: dzhi: sib: thas: tha: mipa: bas: mas: ta: a'a t'am: dzha: th'as: a'a th'am: dhvam: ait: pa hi: ma hing ngo //
analyzed: tipa: tas: dzhi: sib: thas: tha: mipa: bas: mas: ta: a'a t'am: dzha: th'as: a'a th'am: dhvam: ait: pa hi: ma hing ngo //
translated: Tip, tas, jhi, sib, thas, tha, mipa, bhas, mas, ta, atam, jha, thas, atham, dhwam, etad, pahi, mahin.

original: la rnams pa rasmee pa da'o //
analyzed: la rnams pa rasmee pa da'o //
translated: The la-s are the aspect.

original: tang a'an dag a'atma ne pa da'o //
analyzed: tang a'an dag a'atma ne pa da'o //
translated: The tang-s and aṅ-s are the self.

original: lhag ma byed pa la pa rasmee pa da'o //
analyzed: lhag ma byed pa la pa rasmee pa da'o //
translated: The remaining ones are formed by parasmai.

original: aa nu d'atta dang ngita dag gi a'atma ne pa da'o //
analyzed: aa nu d'atta dang ngita dag gi a'atma ne pa da'o //
translated: The two, anudatta and nit, have ātmanepada.

original: sva ri ta dang nyita kyi gnyis ka'o //
analyzed: sva ri ta dang nyita kyi gnyis ka'o //
translated: The two, sarita and nyati, have both.

original: lhag ma pa rasmee pa da'o //
analyzed: lhag ma pa rasmee pa da'o //
translated: The remaining ones are parasmai.

original: ting gi gsum gsum rnams dang po dbus ma phyi ma rnams so //
analyzed: ting gi gsum gsum rnams dang po dbus ma phyi ma rnams so //
translated: The three, ting, gi, and gi, are the first, middle, and last.

original: de rnams re re la gcig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams re re la gcig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig rnams so //
translated: Each of them has one word, two words, and many words.

original: lhag ma la dang po'o //
analyzed: lhag ma la dang po'o //
translated: The remaining ones are the first.

original: yushmad nye ba'i tshig mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa gnas pa las kyang dbus ma'o //
analyzed: yushmad nye ba'i tshig mnyam pa'i lhag par byed pa gnas pa las kyang dbus ma'o //
translated: In the case of the near-word samāna, the middle one is also formed by the remaining ātmanepada.

original: aasmad la phyi ma'i 'o //
analyzed: aasmad la phyi ma'i 'o //
translated: In asmad, the last one is formed.

original: ting gi sha 'gro ba bying sa thams cad pa'o //
analyzed: ting gi sha 'gro ba bying sa thams cad pa'o //
translated: Ting is the all-purpose going.

original: byed pa po la sha pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa po la sha pa'o //
translated: In the case of the agent, śa is formed.

original: byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag las so //
analyzed: byings thams cad pa dang byings phyed pa dag las so //
translated: From all-purpose roots and half-roots.

original: dzha'i aanta'o // yanya la aata kyi ring po'o //
analyzed: dzha'i aanta'o // yanya la aata kyi ring po'o //
translated: The jhi is the end. In yna, the long ā of āt.

original: ta 'gro ba'i a'atma ne pa da rnams kyi ti'i ae'o //
analyzed: ta 'gro ba'i a'atma ne pa da rnams kyi ti'i ae'o //
translated: In the going of ātmanepada, the ti is ai.

original: byings thams cad pa pa 'gro ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: byings thams cad pa pa 'gro ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: All-purpose ting is not going.

original: nga 'gro ba'i a'ata kyi'o //
analyzed: nga 'gro ba'i a'ata kyi'o //
translated: I go to the Āṭa.

original: th'as kyi se'o //🔽cho ga bsgrub pa: nges par bod pa: kun du bod pa: gsol ba gdab pa: yang dag par dri ba: don du gnyer ba rnams la linga'o //
analyzed: th'as kyi se'o // cho ga bsgrub pa: nges par bod pa: kun du bod pa: gsol ba gdab pa: yang dag par dri ba: don du gnyer ba rnams la linga'o //
translated: The end of the Tha.🔽The Sa is the end of the Liṅ.

original: pa rasmee pa da la y'a sut steng 'gro ba'i aud'atta 'ang ngo //
analyzed: pa rasmee pa da la y'a sut steng 'gro ba'i aud'atta 'ang ngo //
translated: The Udatta of the Udātta.

original: nga 'gro @16b ba'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: nga 'gro @16b ba'ang ma yin no //
translated: I do not go.

original: ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i sa dbyi'o //🔽aita kyi'ang ngo //
analyzed: ling gi mtha' ma yin pa'i sa dbyi'o // aita kyi'ang ngo //
translated: The Sa is the end of the Liṅ.🔽The Ai is the Āṭa.

original: aata las y'a a'i ya'o //
analyzed: aata las y'a a'i ya'o //
translated: The Ā is the Ai.

original: tas thas: tha mi pa rnams kyi t'am tam: ta: aama rnams so //
analyzed: tas thas: tha mi pa rnams kyi t'am tam: ta: aama rnams so //
translated: The Ta is the Tha. The Ta is the Tam. The Ta is the Aṃ.

original: dzhi'i dzus so //
analyzed: dzhi'i dzus so //
translated: The Ju is the Jhi.

original: nga 'gro pa'i rtag tu'o //
analyzed: nga 'gro pa'i rtag tu'o //
translated: I go to the Tva.

original: ling gi s'i yuta'o //
analyzed: ling gi s'i yuta'o //
translated: The Yu is the Sa of the Liṅ.

original: dzha'i rana'o // aita'i aata'o //
analyzed: dzha'i rana'o // aita'i aata'o //
translated: The Ra is the Jhi. The Aṭ is the Ai.

original: lot 'ang ngo //
analyzed: lot 'ang ngo //
translated: The Lo is the Āṭa.

original: smon pa la ling lot dag go //
analyzed: smon pa la ling lot dag go //
translated: The Liṅ and the Lo are the aspirated.

original: ai'i au'o // tu hi dag gi shis brjod la t'a tang yang na'o //
analyzed: ai'i au'o // tu hi dag gi shis brjod la t'a tang yang na'o //
translated: The Au is the Ai. The Tva and the Hi are the Tva and the Tvaṃ.

original: lota'i lang 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: lota'i lang 'dra ba'o //
translated: The Laṅ is like the La.

original: si'i hi ste pa 'gro ba 'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: si'i hi ste pa 'gro ba 'ang ma yin no //
translated: The Hi is the Si. I do not go.

original: aata las hi'i 'o //
analyzed: aata las hi'i 'o //
translated: The Hi is the Aṭ.

original: mi'i ni'o // phyi ma'i a'at ste pa 'gro ba 'ang ngo //
analyzed: mi'i ni'o // phyi ma'i a'at ste pa 'gro ba 'ang ngo //
translated: The last, ā, is also of beings.

original: de rnams byings kyi dang po'o //
analyzed: de rnams byings kyi dang po'o //
translated: These are the first of the roots.

original: lota'i a'a ni'o //
analyzed: lota'i a'a ni'o //
translated: Of lot, ā.

original: aeta kyi a'ama'o //
analyzed: aeta kyi a'ama'o //
translated: Of et, ām.

original: sa bdag las ba aam dag go //
analyzed: sa bdag las ba aam dag go //
translated: Of the lord of the earth, va.

original: aeta kyi aee'o //
analyzed: aeta kyi aee'o //
translated: Of et, ai.

original: de ring ma yin pa lang ngo //🔽lung lang lring rnams la aat ste au d'atta 'ang ngo //🔽lung 'o // m'ang la lunga'o //
analyzed: de ring ma yin pa lang ngo // lung lang lring rnams la aat ste au d'atta 'ang ngo // lung 'o // m'ang la lunga'o //
translated: Not today, va.🔽Of today, at, and also udāt.

original: sma phyi ma lang 'ang ngo //
analyzed: sma phyi ma lang 'ang ngo //
translated: Of today, ma.🔽Of today, va.🔽Of today, ca.

original: lung la tsli'o //
analyzed: lung la tsli'o //
translated: Of ca, ci.

original: tsli'i sitsa'o // g'a ti gnas pa ghu p'a bh'u rnams las pa rasmee pa da rnams la sitsa'i 'o //
analyzed: tsli'i sitsa'o // g'a ti gnas pa ghu p'a bh'u rnams las pa rasmee pa da rnams la sitsa'i 'o //
translated: Of gati, gupti, and bhū, parasmai pada.

original: bh'u sh'u dag las ting la'o //
analyzed: bh'u sh'u dag las ting la'o //
translated: Of bhū, ting.

original: ka\ nga\ 'gro ba la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ka\ nga\ 'gro ba la 'ang ngo //
translated: Of ka, gati.

original: lung lit dag las bh'u'i buka'o //
analyzed: lung lit dag las bh'u'i buka'o //
translated: Of li, bhu.

original: lhag ma byings phyed pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma byings phyed pa'o //
translated: The rest are half-roots.

original: byings phyed pa'i bal dang po la aita'o //
analyzed: byings phyed pa'i bal dang po la aita'o //
translated: Of half-roots, the first, i.

original: a'atma ne pa da rnams la aata ma min pa las so //
analyzed: a'atma ne pa da rnams la aata ma min pa las so //
translated: Of atmanepada, not of atmanepada.

original: dha la 'ang ngo //🔽aita'i 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: dha la 'ang ngo // aita'i 'dam ka'o //
translated: Of dha, also.🔽Of i, optional.

original: m'ang sbyor ba la ma yin no //
analyzed: m'ang sbyor ba la ma yin no //
translated: Of ma, not in connection.

original: lkog tu gyur pa la lita'o //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa la lita'o //
translated: In the passive, the affix lita.

original: lit 'ang ngo //
analyzed: lit 'ang ngo //
translated: Also in the passive.

original: pa rasmee pa da rnams kyi nal: aa tus: aus: thal: aa thus: aa: nal: ba ma rnams so //
analyzed: pa rasmee pa da rnams kyi nal: aa tus: aus: thal: aa thus: aa: nal: ba ma rnams so //
translated: The affixes parasmād, atus, us, thal, athus, a, nal, and va are for the middle voice.

original: aindhi bha ba ti dag la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: aindhi bha ba ti dag la 'ang ngo //
translated: They are also for indhabhavati.

original: lit la byings aa bhy'a sa med pa'i 'o //
analyzed: lit la byings aa bhy'a sa med pa'i 'o //
translated: In lita, the root abhyāsa is without.

original: aatsa gcig pa'i dang po'i gnyis so //
analyzed: aatsa gcig pa'i dang po'i gnyis so //
translated: The first two of the single a are.

original: snga ma aa bhy'a sa'o //
analyzed: snga ma aa bhy'a sa'o //
translated: The former is abhyāsa.

original: thung ngu'o // aa bhy'a sa la tsar 'ang ngo //
analyzed: thung ngu'o // aa bhy'a sa la tsar 'ang ngo //
translated: It is short. Abhyāsa is also with ca.

original: bha ba ti'i aa'o //
analyzed: bha ba ti'i aa'o //
translated: It is a in bhavati.

original: lita'i ta dzha dag gi ae sha ai re tsa'o //
analyzed: lita'i ta dzha dag gi ae sha ai re tsa'o //
translated: In lita, the first two of ta and jha are e and ai.

original: de ring ma yin pa la lut 'o //🔽sya t'as dag lri lut dag la'o //
analyzed: de ring ma yin pa la lut 'o // sya t'as dag lri lut dag la'o //
translated: It is not today. It is luti.🔽The affixes syat and tā are for luti.

original: luta'i dang po rnams kyi d'a roo ras rnams so //
analyzed: luta'i dang po rnams kyi d'a roo ras rnams so //
translated: The first of luti has the affixes da and ra.

original: ra la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ra la 'ang ngo //
translated: It is also for ra.

original: t'as aasti dag gi dbyi'o //
analyzed: t'as aasti dag gi dbyi'o //
translated: It is the affix of asti of tā.

original: aet la ha'o //🔽smon pa la ling 'o //
analyzed: aet la ha'o // smon pa la ling 'o //
translated: It is ha in etat.🔽In the optative, it is ling.

original: smon pa la kita'o //
analyzed: smon pa la kita'o //
translated: In the optative, it is kṛt.

original: tatha dag gi suta'o //
analyzed: tatha dag gi suta'o //
translated: It is sut of the two.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la lrita'o //🔽ling gi yul la bya ba shor ba la lring 'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba la lrita'o //🔽ling gi yul la bya ba shor ba la lring 'o //
translated: In the future, it is lṛt.🔽In the optative, it is lṛṅ.

original: bklags pa la dang por ka kha med pa mthar sha med pa la yang na'o //🔽puka mtha' dang au pa dh'a thung ngu dag gi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: bklags pa la dang por ka kha med pa mthar sha med pa la yang na'o // puka mtha' dang au pa dh'a thung ngu dag gi 'ang ngo //
translated: In the reading, the first is without ka and kha, and the last is without śa.🔽Also, the last of pu and the short u.

original: bad pra dza hal mtha' rnams kyi aatsa'i 'o //
analyzed: bad pra dza hal mtha' rnams kyi aatsa'i 'o //
translated: Also, the last of pa, pra, ja, and ha.

original: ait la ma @17a * //
analyzed: ait la ma @17a * //
translated: It is not in iṭ.

original: yin no // aasti sitsa'i aa prikta la'o //
analyzed: yin no // aasti sitsa'i aa prikta la'o //
translated: It is in asti, sita, and aprakṛtalā.

original: d'i dh'i be b'i ait rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: d'i dh'i be b'i ait rnams kyi'o //
translated: It is of dī, dhibhū, and iṭ.

original: ait la sa a'it la'o //
analyzed: ait la sa a'it la'o //
translated: It is of iṭ and sita.

original: si tsa aa bhya sta bi di rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: si tsa aa bhya sta bi di rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: It is also of sita, abhyasta, and vidhi.

original: brtsegs pa ma yin pa las lit ka 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: brtsegs pa ma yin pa las lit ka 'gro ba la'o //
translated: It is of lit in the sense of not being piled up.

original: air 'gro ba las yang na'o //
analyzed: air 'gro ba las yang na'o //
translated: It is of i in the sense of going.

original: hal dang po lhag po'o //
analyzed: hal dang po lhag po'o //
translated: The first ha is the remainder.

original: shar s'a ma rnams kha ya rnams so //
analyzed: shar s'a ma rnams kha ya rnams so //
translated: The śa and sa are the khaya.

original: aita 'gro ba'i byings kyi nu ma'o //
analyzed: aita 'gro ba'i byings kyi nu ma'o //
translated: The iṭ is the breast of the root of going.

original: ku ha dag gi tsu'o //
analyzed: ku ha dag gi tsu'o //
translated: The cu is of the ku and ha.

original: byings kyi dang po'i sha'i sa'o //
analyzed: byings kyi dang po'i sha'i sa'o //
translated: The first of the roots is the śa.

original: nyer bsgyur las: su nu ti: su ba ti: sya ti: stoo ti: sto bha ti: sth'a: se na ya: se dha: si tsa: sanydza: svanydza rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur las: su nu ti: su ba ti: sya ti: stoo ti: sto bha ti: sth'a: se na ya: se dha: si tsa: sanydza: svanydza rnams kyi'o //
translated: From the prefixes: su, nu, ti, su, va, ti, sya, ti, sto, ti, stobha, ti, sthā, sena, ya, siddha, ti, sita, and sañja, sañjara.

original: pra ti ma yin pas sa di'o //
analyzed: pra ti ma yin pas sa di'o //
translated: Pratimā means “earth.”🔽Stambhi.

original: stambhi'i 'o // aa ba las kyang brten pa dang mi ring ba dag la'o //
analyzed: stambhi'i 'o // aa ba las kyang brten pa dang mi ring ba dag la'o //
translated: From ava also, “support” and “not far away.”

original: bi las kyang sva na 'i zas la'o //
analyzed: bi las kyang sva na 'i zas la'o //
translated: From vi also, “food” in sva.

original: pa ri ni bi rnams las se ba: si ta: sa ya: si ba: sa ha: stu: shvanydza: sut rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: pa ri ni bi rnams las se ba: si ta: sa ya: si ba: sa ha: stu: shvanydza: sut rnams kyi'o //
translated: Pariṇi, from the vi, means “of the moon,” “of the stars,” “of the sun,” “of the clouds,” “of the water.”

original: si ta las dang por aat sa bar chod pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: si ta las dang por aat sa bar chod pa las kyang ngo //
translated: From sit, “first,” and from ata, “obstacle.”

original: sth'a la sogs pa rnams la aa bhy'a sa yis kyang aa bhy'a sa'i'o //
analyzed: sth'a la sogs pa rnams la aa bhy'a sa yis kyang aa bhy'a sa'i'o //
translated: From sthā and so on, from abhyāsa, “of abhyāsa.”

original: se dha ti 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: se dha ti 'gro ba la'o //
translated: Sedit means “going.”

original: sva ra ti s'u ti: s'u ya ti dh'unya: a'u 'gro ba rnams yang na'o //
analyzed: sva ra ti s'u ti: s'u ya ti dh'unya: a'u 'gro ba rnams yang na'o //
translated: Svarati, sūti, sūyati, dhūnya, ū, “going” again.

original: dzhal gyi dzhal la'o //🔽dh'a ma yin pa'i dzhasha las ta tha dag gi dha'o //
analyzed: dzhal gyi dzhal la'o // dh'a ma yin pa'i dzhasha las ta tha dag gi dha'o //
translated: From jhal, jhal.🔽From dhamma, jha, from dhat.

original: hal dang po'i aata thung ngu'i 'o //
analyzed: hal dang po'i aata thung ngu'i 'o //
translated: From hal, first, ata, short.

original: au pa dh'a'i aata kyi'o //
analyzed: au pa dh'a'i aata kyi'o //
translated: From upadhā, ata.

original: nal phyi ma'i yang na'o //
analyzed: nal phyi ma'i yang na'o //
translated: From nal, after, ū.

original: ni'i ga da: na da: ba ta: pa da: ghu: m'a: sya ti: hanti: y'a ti: b'a ti: dr'a ti: ps'a ti: ba ya ti: ba ha ti: sh'a mya ti: tsi no ti: de ha rnams la'ang ngo //
analyzed: ni'i ga da: na da: ba ta: pa da: ghu: m'a: sya ti: hanti: y'a ti: b'a ti: dr'a ti: ps'a ti: ba ya ti: ba ha ti: sh'a mya ti: tsi no ti: de ha rnams la'ang ngo //
translated: ni, ga, da, na, da, va, ta, pa, da, gha, ma, sya, ti, han, ti, ya, ti, va, ti, dra, ti, pas, ti, va, ti, va, ha, ti, sha, mya, ti, ci, no, ti, de, ha.

original: lit la dang po kun nas bsgyur ba ma yin pa'i hal gcig pa dbus ma'i aata kyi'o //
analyzed: lit la dang po kun nas bsgyur ba ma yin pa'i hal gcig pa dbus ma'i aata kyi'o //
translated: In lit, the first is the single hal of the central aṭ, not completely changed.

original: thal la'ang ait dang bcas pa la'o //
analyzed: thal la'ang ait dang bcas pa la'o //
translated: In thal, too, with iṭ.

original: na'i na'o // nyer bsgyur las tshig sdud ma yin pa las kyang na nye ba'i yul gyi'o //
analyzed: na'i na'o // nyer bsgyur las tshig sdud ma yin pa las kyang na nye ba'i yul gyi'o //
translated: In ni, na, from the indeclinable case of the indeclinable.

original: dang po'i aata kyi'o //
analyzed: dang po'i aata kyi'o //
translated: In the first aṭ.

original: de las nut hal gnyis pa rnams so //
analyzed: de las nut hal gnyis pa rnams so //
translated: From that, the second nūṭ and hal.

original: aatsa dang po rnams kyi a'ata'o //
analyzed: aatsa dang po rnams kyi a'ata'o //
translated: The first aṭ of the first aṭs.

original: ritstsha ma yin pa'i aitsa dang po las kyang lcib ldan pa las so //
analyzed: ritstsha ma yin pa'i aitsa dang po las kyang lcib ldan pa las so //
translated: From the first iṭ, not ric, with iṭ.

original: a'ama las so ;
analyzed: a'ama las so ;
translated: From aṃ.

original: / krinya 'ang rjes su rab tu sbyor te lit la'o //
analyzed: / krinya 'ang rjes su rab tu sbyor te lit la'o //
translated: Kṛñ also is added, in lit.

original: ri'i aa ta'o //
analyzed: ri'i aa ta'o //
translated: The aṭ of ri.

original: lit la: kri: sri: bhri: bri: stu: dru: sru: shr'u las so //
analyzed: lit la: kri: sri: bhri: bri: stu: dru: sru: shr'u las so //
translated: In lit, kṛ, sri, bhṛ, bri, stu, dru, sru, śru.

original: ninsa: niksha: ninda rnams kyi yang na'o //
analyzed: ninsa: niksha: ninda rnams kyi yang na'o //
translated: The same for the feminine of nisa, nika, nida.

original: aa bhy'a sa'i 'dra ba ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: aa bhy'a sa'i 'dra ba ma yin pa la'o //
translated: The same for the feminine of avyas, avya.

original: dzr'i stambhu: mru tsu: mlu tsu: gru tsu: glu tsu: glunytsu: shri rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: dzr'i stambhu: mru tsu: mlu tsu: gru tsu: glu tsu: glunytsu: shri rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: The same for the feminine of jara, stambhu, mrucu, mrucu, grucu, glucu, glucu, sri.

original: au pa dh'a la'ang ngo //🔽sha sha: da da: ba dang po rnams kyi ma yin no //
analyzed: au pa dh'a la'ang ngo // sha sha: da da: ba dang po rnams kyi ma yin no //
translated: The same for the feminine of upadha.🔽The same for the feminine of sas, dad, va.

original: aa dza'i b'i ghanya ma yin pha @17b ya ma yin pa dag las so //
analyzed: aa dza'i b'i ghanya ma yin pha @17b ya ma yin pa dag las so //
translated: The same for the feminine of ajha, bhagha, bhaya.

original: aatsa gcig pa nye ba'i yul las ait ma yin no //
analyzed: aatsa gcig pa nye ba'i yul las ait ma yin no //
translated: The same for the feminine of ac, except for the near-place ita.

original: sitsa la 'phel ba pa rasmee pa da rnams la'o //
analyzed: sitsa la 'phel ba pa rasmee pa da rnams la'o //
translated: The same for the feminine of sica, except for the augment par.

original: aatsa las t'as 'dra bar thal la ait rtag tu 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: aatsa las t'as 'dra bar thal la ait rtag tu 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The same for the feminine of ac, except for the augment ta, which is always added.

original: rita las bh'a ra dv'a dza'i 'o //
analyzed: rita las bh'a ra dv'a dza'i 'o //
translated: The same for the feminine of rita, except for the augment bhara.

original: krita ma yin pa byings thams cad pa dag la ring bo'o //
analyzed: krita ma yin pa byings thams cad pa dag la ring bo'o //
translated: The same for the feminine of krit, except for the augment d, which is added to all roots.

original: ha\ ma\ ya\ mtha' kshana: shvas: dz'a gri ni shvi ae 'gro ba rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: ha\ ma\ ya\ mtha' kshana: shvas: dz'a gri ni shvi ae 'gro ba rnams kyi'o //
translated: The same for the feminine of ksa, svas, jagra, nisvas, e.

original: gu p'u: dh'u pa: pi tsha: da na: pa na rnams las a'a ya'o //
analyzed: gu p'u: dh'u pa: pi tsha: da na: pa na rnams las a'a ya'o //
translated: The same for the feminine of gupu, dhupa, picu, danu, pana, except for the augment ya.

original: san la sogs pa'i mtha' rnams byings so //🔽a'a ya la sogs pa rnams byings phyed pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: san la sogs pa'i mtha' rnams byings so // a'a ya la sogs pa rnams byings phyed pa la yang na'o //
translated: The endings such as san are roots.🔽The endings of the half-roots such as aya are also.

original: aata kyi dbyi'o //
analyzed: aata kyi dbyi'o //
translated: The endings of the roots at and ka are.

original: k'a sa dang rkyen las bod pa ma yin pa la lit la a'ama'o //
analyzed: k'a sa dang rkyen las bod pa ma yin pa la lit la a'ama'o //
translated: The endings of the roots ka and sa are lit and am, when they are not formed from a suffix.

original: shthi bu: kla mu: a'atsa mu rnams kyi sha 'gro ba la'o //
analyzed: shthi bu: kla mu: a'atsa mu rnams kyi sha 'gro ba la'o //
translated: The endings of the roots sthibh, klam, and ac are used for the past.

original: bhr'a sha: bhl'a sha: bhra mu: kra mu: kla mu: tra s'i: tru ti: la sha las yang na'o //
analyzed: bhr'a sha: bhl'a sha: bhra mu: kra mu: kla mu: tra s'i: tru ti: la sha las yang na'o //
translated: The endings of the roots bhrash, bhash, bhra, kra, klam, tras, trut, and lash are also.

original: kram gyi pa rasmee pa da rnams la'o //
analyzed: kram gyi pa rasmee pa da rnams la'o //
translated: The endings of the roots kram and par are used for the future.

original: snu kram dag las a'atma ne pa da'i rgyu mtshan ma yin pa la'o //🔽aishu: ga ma yam rnams kyi tsha'o//🔽yam: ram: nam: a'ata rnams kyi saka'o //
analyzed: snu kram dag las a'atma ne pa da'i rgyu mtshan ma yin pa la'o // aishu: ga ma yam rnams kyi tsha'o// yam: ram: nam: a'ata rnams kyi saka'o //
translated: The endings of the roots snukram are used for the present, except when they are the cause of the present.🔽The endings of the roots ish, gam, and yam are used for the imperative.

original: la\ ra\ mtha'i aata kyi'o //
analyzed: la\ ra\ mtha'i aata kyi'o //
translated: The endings of the roots yam, ram, nam, and at are used for the optative.🔽The endings of the roots la and ram are at.

original: dang po'i nyi tu du rnams so //🔽tr'i: pha la bha dza tra pa kyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dang po'i nyi tu du rnams so // tr'i: pha la bha dza tra pa kyi 'ang ngo //
translated: The endings of the roots da and du are used for the first.🔽The endings of the roots tr, ph, labh, and trp are also used for the first.

original: san lit dag la dzi'i 'o //
analyzed: san lit dag la dzi'i 'o //
translated: The endings of the roots san are ji.

original: aaksha las yang na'o //
analyzed: aaksha las yang na'o //
translated: The endings of the roots ak and aks are also.

original: aus la tshig mtha' ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: aus la tshig mtha' ma yin pa las so //
translated: The endings of the roots u are used when they are not at the end of a word.

original: sa la sha dha dag gi ka'o //
analyzed: sa la sha dha dag gi ka'o //
translated: In the earth, from śa and dha, ka.

original: taksh'u'i phra mor byed pa la'o //
analyzed: taksh'u'i phra mor byed pa la'o //
translated: Takṣu is for making small.

original: krisha: mri sha: spri sha: trip: dri pa: sri pa las tsli'i si tsa yang na'o ;
analyzed: krisha: mri sha: spri sha: trip: dri pa: sri pa las tsli'i si tsa yang na'o ;
translated: Kṛṣṇa, mṛṣa, spṛṣa, tripa, tripa, sripa, from cli, si, ca, ya.

original: / aa nu d'atta'i 'ang rita au pa dh'a'i yang na'o //
analyzed: / aa nu d'atta'i 'ang rita au pa dh'a'i yang na'o //
translated: Anudātta is also for upapada.

original: shal aika au pa dh'a ait med pa las ksa'o //
analyzed: shal aika au pa dh'a ait med pa las ksa'o //
translated: Śalika is upapada without it.

original: ai shu: sa ha: lu bha: ru sha: ri sha las so //
analyzed: ai shu: sa ha: lu bha: ru sha: ri sha las so //
translated: Iṣu, saha, lubdha, ruṣa, riṣa, from these, ya.

original: au sha bi da: dz'a gri rnams las yang na'o //
analyzed: au sha bi da: dz'a gri rnams las yang na'o //
translated: Uṣa, vid, jāgara, from these, also ya.

original: dha'i dha la dbyi'o //
analyzed: dha'i dha la dbyi'o //
translated: Dhā is for dhi.

original: sha 'gro ba ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la ae tsa'i a'ata'o //
analyzed: sha 'gro ba ma yin pa nye ba'i yul la ae tsa'i a'ata'o //
translated: Śa is for non-going, in the vicinity, e, c, ā.

original: a'ata las nal gyi aoo'o //🔽ait la'ang a'ata kyi dbyi'o //
analyzed: a'ata las nal gyi aoo'o // ait la'ang a'ata kyi dbyi'o //
translated: From ā, nal, o.🔽In ita, also, ā, the form.

original: gzhan brtsegs pa sogs kyi yang na'o //
analyzed: gzhan brtsegs pa sogs kyi yang na'o //
translated: Also for other, staka, etc.

original: ling la ae'o //
analyzed: ling la ae'o //
translated: Ling is e.

original: d'apa min pa'i d'a dh'a rnams ghu'o //
analyzed: d'apa min pa'i d'a dh'a rnams ghu'o //
translated: Dā, dādhāra, not in dāpa, are ghu.

original: dhet shvi dag la gdam nga'o //
analyzed: dhet shvi dag la gdam nga'o //
translated: In dheti, śva, the option.

original: tsang la'o // ghr'a: dhet sh'a: tsh'a: s'a las yang na'o ;
analyzed: tsang la'o // ghr'a: dhet sh'a: tsh'a: s'a las yang na'o ;
translated: Gharā, dheti, śā, sā, from these, also ya.

original: / a'ata las so //
analyzed: / a'ata las so //
translated: From ā.

original: p'a: ghr'a: dhm'a: sth'a: mn'a: d'a na: drashti: aarti: sarti: sha da: sad rnams kyi phi ba: dzi ghra: dha ma: tishtha: man: ya tsha: pa shya: ri tsha: dhoo: sh'i ya: s'i da rnams so //🔽brtsegs pa dang po'i rita kyi 'ang yon tan no //
analyzed: p'a: ghr'a: dhm'a: sth'a: mn'a: d'a na: drashti: aarti: sarti: sha da: sad rnams kyi phi ba: dzi ghra: dha ma: tishtha: man: ya tsha: pa shya: ri tsha: dhoo: sh'i ya: s'i da rnams so // brtsegs pa dang po'i rita kyi 'ang yon tan no //
translated: pa, gha, ra, dha, śa, tha, na, da, dha, ta, pa, ja, ghra, dha, ṭha, na, ya, ṭha, paśya, ṭha, ḍho, śī, si, da.🔽 The qualities of the first layer are also of the rit.🔽🔽

original: aarti brtsegs pa dang po dag gi yon tan no //🔽@18a * // rita han dag las sya la'o //
analyzed: aarti brtsegs pa dang po dag gi yon tan no // @18a * // rita han dag las sya la'o //
translated: pa, gha, ra, dha, ta, tha, da, dha, na, ta, tha, da, dha, na, pa, ya, pha, bha, ba,

original: sarti sh'asti: aarti rnams las kyang ngo //🔽ri dri sha dag gi aang la yon tan no //🔽sha yaka ling rnams la ring 'o //🔽ritstsha ti r'ita rnams kyi'o //🔽aatti aarti: bya ya ti rnams kyi ait 'o //🔽shru'i shri 'ang ngo //
analyzed: sarti sh'asti: aarti rnams las kyang ngo // ri dri sha dag gi aang la yon tan no // sha yaka ling rnams la ring 'o // ritstsha ti r'ita rnams kyi'o // aatti aarti: bya ya ti rnams kyi ait 'o // shru'i shri 'ang ngo //
translated: and Sartisasti, Artisasti.🔽The quality of the Rishis is Anga.🔽The long one is of the Shakalyas.🔽The Rishis Rishis and Ritas have Rita.🔽The Attis, Artis, and Vyatis have Iti.🔽And Shri, Shri.🔽

original: hu shnu dag gi byings thams cad pa la'o //
analyzed: hu shnu dag gi byings thams cad pa la'o //
translated: Translation: pa, gha, ra, dha, ta, tha, da, dha, na, ta, tha, da, dha, na, pa, ya, pha, bha, ba,

original: ba ma dag la 'di'i dbyi ba 'ang yang na'o //🔽rkyen auta las kyang brtsegs pa dang po ma yin pa las so //
analyzed: ba ma dag la 'di'i dbyi ba 'ang yang na'o //🔽rkyen auta las kyang brtsegs pa dang po ma yin pa las so //
translated: The suffix -ana is added to the root🔽-ut, and the suffix -ya is added to the root -ut.🔽

original: stu su dh'unya rnams las pa rasmee pa da rnams la'o //
analyzed: stu su dh'unya rnams las pa rasmee pa da rnams la'o //
translated: From STU, SŪ, DHU, the parasmai-pada affixes.

original: ni: shri: dru: sru rnams la byed pa la tsanga'o //🔽pusha la sogs pa rnams dang dyu ta la sogs pa rnams dang li 'gro ba las pa rasmee pa da rnams la'o //
analyzed: ni: shri: dru: sru rnams la byed pa la tsanga'o // pusha la sogs pa rnams dang dyu ta la sogs pa rnams dang li 'gro ba las pa rasmee pa da rnams la'o //
translated: From NI, ŚRI, DRU, SRU, the kṛtya affixes.🔽From PUṢ, etc., DYŪ, etc., and LI, the parasmai-pada affixes.

original: gam la pa rasmee pa da rnams la ait 'o //
analyzed: gam la pa rasmee pa da rnams la ait 'o //
translated: From GAM, the parasmai-pada affixes.

original: bi las skandi'i nishth'a ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: bi las skandi'i nishth'a ma yin pa la'o //
translated: From VI, the final of SKANDI.

original: pa ri las kyang ngo //
analyzed: pa ri las kyang ngo //
translated: Also from PARI.

original: bri r'ita las yang na'o //
analyzed: bri r'ita las yang na'o //
translated: Also from BRI.

original: sitsa la'ang pa rasmee pa da la'o //
analyzed: sitsa la'ang pa rasmee pa da la'o //
translated: Also from SI, the parasmai-pada affixes.

original: ling la ma yin no //
analyzed: ling la ma yin no //
translated: Not from LI.

original: byings kyi r'ita kyi aita'o //
analyzed: byings kyi r'ita kyi aita'o //
translated: The parasmai-pada affixes of the root RI.

original: dansha: sanydza: svanydza rnams kyi shap la'o //
analyzed: dansha: sanydza: svanydza rnams kyi shap la'o //
translated: From DAN, SNYA, SVA, the śapa affixes.

original: dri sha las ma yin no //🔽sri dzi dri sha dag la dzha la ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la aama'o //
analyzed: dri sha las ma yin no // sri dzi dri sha dag la dzha la ka 'gro ba ma yin pa la aama'o //
translated: Not from DRISH.🔽From SRIJ, DRISH, the parasmai-pada affixes.

original: sri dzi dri sha dag las 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: sri dzi dri sha dag las 'dam ka'o //
translated: From SRIJ, DRISH, the parasmai-pada affixes optionally.

original: gupa: ti dza: kati rnams las sana'o //
analyzed: gupa: ti dza: kati rnams las sana'o //
translated: From GUP, TI, J, KTI, the san affix.

original: san yang dag la'o //
analyzed: san yang dag la'o //
translated: San is for parasmai-pada.

original: san gyi snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: san gyi snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: San is like the previous.

original: kati las the tshom la'ang ngo //
analyzed: kati las the tshom la'ang ngo //
translated: From kṛti, doubt.

original: ri ti las a'i yang ngo //
analyzed: ri ti las a'i yang ngo //
translated: From riti, also.

original: rkyen a'am bzhin krinya rjes su sbyar ba'i'o //
analyzed: rkyen a'am bzhin krinya rjes su sbyar ba'i'o //
translated: From the condition aṃ or bhin, kṛtya.

original: ain mtha' las sh'i dhvam: lung lit rnams kyi dha'i'o //
analyzed: ain mtha' las sh'i dhvam: lung lit rnams kyi dha'i'o //
translated: From the end of iṇa, śadhaṃ.

original: sip la sogs pa rnams kyi aat bar na yod pa la 'ang yang na'o //🔽sa di: svanydza dag gi pha rol gyi lit la'o //
analyzed: sip la sogs pa rnams kyi aat bar na yod pa la 'ang yang na'o // sa di: svanydza dag gi pha rol gyi lit la'o //
translated: From sipa and so on, ata.🔽From sad and so on, paripā.

original: ra dhi: dza bha dag gi aa tsa la'o //
analyzed: ra dhi: dza bha dag gi aa tsa la'o //
translated: From rādhi and so on, acala.

original: ka mi las ninga'o //
analyzed: ka mi las ninga'o //
translated: From kam, niṅ.

original: na li tsang la au pa dh'a'i thung ngu'o //
analyzed: na li tsang la au pa dh'a'i thung ngu'o //
translated: From nili, upa.

original: aaka phyis pa ma yin pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin no //
analyzed: aaka phyis pa ma yin pa la yang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin no //
translated: From ak, not removed, also.

original: san la aata kyi'o //
analyzed: san la aata kyi'o //
translated: From san, ata.

original: yang ba'i ring po'o //🔽aita ma yin pa la ni'i 'o //
analyzed: yang ba'i ring po'o // aita ma yin pa la ni'i 'o //
translated: From aṃ, long.🔽From i, not.

original: a'am mtha' a'a lu: a'a pya: aitnu: aishnu rnams la aa ya'o //
analyzed: a'am mtha' a'a lu: a'a pya: aitnu: aishnu rnams la aa ya'o //
translated: From aṃ, aṃ, ā, āpya, iṇu, iṣṇu, a.

original: da ya: aa ya: a'a pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: da ya: aa ya: a'a pa las kyang ngo //
translated: From day, aya, āpa, also.

original: nyer bsgyur gyi aa ya ti la'o ;
analyzed: nyer bsgyur gyi aa ya ti la'o ;
translated: From the preposition a, aya.

original: / d'i ba: dza na: bu dha: p'u ri: t'a yi: py'a yi rnams las yang na'o //
analyzed: / d'i ba: dza na: bu dha: p'u ri: t'a yi: py'a yi rnams las yang na'o //
translated: From dā, jana, budha, pūrṇa, tāyi, and payi, the affix yaṅ is added.

original: tsi na las 'jig go //
analyzed: tsi na las 'jig go //
translated: From ci, the affix jña is added.

original: lit yang dag la'ang ngo //
analyzed: lit yang dag la'ang ngo //
translated: From lita, the affix laṅ is added.

original: sth'a ghu'i aita 'ang ngo //
analyzed: sth'a ghu'i aita 'ang ngo //
translated: From sthā, the affix ghū is added.

original: gzugs thung ngu las so //
analyzed: gzugs thung ngu las so //
translated: From rūpa, the affix kṣaṇa is added.

original: lit la da ya ti'i di gi'o //
analyzed: lit la da ya ti'i di gi'o //
translated: From lita, the affix dayati is added.

original: m'an: ba dha: d'ana sh'a rnams las aa bhy'a sa'i ring po 'ang ngo //
analyzed: m'an: ba dha: d'ana sh'a rnams las aa bhy'a sa'i ring po 'ang ngo //
translated: From māna, badha, and dāna, the long ā is added.

original: d++yuta rnams las @18b lung la'o //
analyzed: d++yuta rnams las @18b lung la'o //
translated: From dyu, the affix ta is added.

original: dyu ti sva pi dag gi sam pra s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: dyu ti sva pi dag gi sam pra s'a ra na'o //
translated: From dyu, the affix svapi is added.

original: brita rnams la sya san dag la'o //
analyzed: brita rnams la sya san dag la'o //
translated: From bṛtti, the affix syan is added.

original: brita rnams las bzhi rnams las ma yin no //
analyzed: brita rnams las bzhi rnams las ma yin no //
translated: From bṛtti, the affix catu is added.

original: srog chags ma yin pa la aa nu: bi: pa ri: aa bhi ni rnams las syanda te'i 'o //
analyzed: srog chags ma yin pa la aa nu: bi: pa ri: aa bhi ni rnams las syanda te'i 'o //
translated: From asat, the affix an is added.

original: kri p'u'i ra la'o //
analyzed: kri p'u'i ra la'o //
translated: From kripa, the affix ṇi is added.

original: a'atma ne pa da rnams la ling sitsa dag go //🔽lut la'ang kli pa'i 'o //🔽t'as la 'ang kli pa'i 'o //
analyzed: a'atma ne pa da rnams la ling sitsa dag go // lut la'ang kli pa'i 'o // t'as la 'ang kli pa'i 'o //
translated: From ātmanepada, the affix liṅ is added.🔽From luti, the affix klipa is added.

original: bya tha'i lit la'o //
analyzed: bya tha'i lit la'o //
translated: From tāsa, the affix klipa is added.🔽From byatha, the affix lita is added.🔽From pat, the affix pum is added.

original: pata'i puma'o // dzr'i: bhra mu: tras rnams kyi yang na'o //
analyzed: pata'i puma'o // dzr'i: bhra mu: tras rnams kyi yang na'o //
translated: From jṛmbha, the affix ṇa is added.

original: sa hi: ba ha dag gi aa yig gi aota'o //
analyzed: sa hi: ba ha dag gi aa yig gi aota'o //
translated: The of sa and ha is the of a.

original: so dha'i 'o //
analyzed: so dha'i 'o //
translated: The of sodha.

original: sha di'i sha 'gro ba'i 'o //
analyzed: sha di'i sha 'gro ba'i 'o //
translated: The of shadhi is the of sha.

original: pha na rnams kyi 'ang bdun rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: pha na rnams kyi 'ang bdun rnams kyi'o //
translated: The of pha and na is the of the seven.

original: yal 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: yal 'dam ka'o //
translated: The of yala is ka.

original: go ha'i au pa dh'a 'i a'uta'o //
analyzed: go ha'i au pa dh'a 'i a'uta'o //
translated: The of goha is the of upadha.

original: du ha: di ha: li ha: gu ha rnams kyi a'atma ne pa da so la gnas pa la yang na 'jig go //
analyzed: du ha: di ha: li ha: gu ha rnams kyi a'atma ne pa da so la gnas pa la yang na 'jig go //
translated: The of duha, diha, liha, and guha is the of atmani.

original: ksa'i aatsa la'o //🔽ri las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ksa'i aatsa la'o // ri las kyang ngo //
translated: The of kasa is acala.🔽The of ri is also.

original: ranydzi'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ranydzi'i 'ang ngo //
translated: The of rani is also.

original: lit la gnyis rnams kyi aa bhy'a sa'i 'o //
analyzed: lit la gnyis rnams kyi aa bhy'a sa'i 'o //
translated: The of the two litas is abhaya.

original: ba tsi: sva pi: ya dza la sogs pa rnams kyi kita la'o //
analyzed: ba tsi: sva pi: ya dza la sogs pa rnams kyi kita la'o //
translated: The of vaci, svapi, yaja, and so on is kshita.

original: benya'i 'o // benya'i wa yi'o //
analyzed: benya'i 'o // benya'i wa yi'o //
translated: The of beniya is va.

original: gra hi: dzy'a: ba yi: by'a dhi: bashti: bi tsa ti: prishtsa ti: pri tsha ti: bhri dzdza ti rnams kyi nga 'gro ba la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: gra hi: dzy'a: ba yi: by'a dhi: bashti: bi tsa ti: prishtsa ti: pri tsha ti: bhri dzdza ti rnams kyi nga 'gro ba la 'ang ngo //
translated: The of grahi, jyi, vayi, vyadhi, bhashi, vichi, prishchhi, prishchhati, bhrinjjahati is nga.

original: lit la ba ya'i ya'o //
analyzed: lit la ba ya'i ya'o //
translated: The of litavaya is ya.

original: kita la de'i 'ang wa yang na'o //
analyzed: kita la de'i 'ang wa yang na'o //
translated: The of kshita is also va.

original: by'a'i lit la ma yin no //
analyzed: by'a'i lit la ma yin no //
translated: The of vayi is not lita.

original: li pi: si tsi hv'a las kyang ngo //
analyzed: li pi: si tsi hv'a las kyang ngo //
translated: The of lipi and sichi is hva.

original: a'atma ne ba da rnams la yang na'o //
analyzed: a'atma ne ba da rnams la yang na'o //
translated: The same for the aṇ of the aṇ affix.

original: aa bhyasta'i 'ang ngo //🔽byings phyed pa la sa'i 'o //
analyzed: aa bhyasta'i 'ang ngo // byings phyed pa la sa'i 'o //
translated: And for the abhyāsas.🔽The sa of the sa affix.

original: sh'a si: ba si: gha si rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: sh'a si: ba si: gha si rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
translated: And for the śās, the sis, and the ghas.

original: shva ya ti'i aa'o //
analyzed: shva ya ti'i aa'o //
translated: The a of the śayati affix.🔽The i of the śve affix.

original: shva'i gdam nga'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las bh'u la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: shva'i gdam nga'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las bh'u la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: Thus ends the section on the bhū and so forth from the sūtra of Pāṇini the grammarian.

original: // / aa da la sogs pa rnams las shapa kyi'o //
analyzed: // / aa da la sogs pa rnams las shapa kyi'o //
translated: From the aḍ and so forth, the śap affix.

original: hu dzhal rnams las hi'i dhi'o ;
analyzed: hu dzhal rnams las hi'i dhi'o ;
translated: From the hujhal, the hi and dhi.

original: / aata las thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: / aata las thams cad kyi'o //
translated: From the aṭ, all.

original: lung san dag la gha sli'o //
analyzed: lung san dag la gha sli'o //
translated: In the Vedas, the ghasli.

original: lit la yang na'o //
analyzed: lit la yang na'o //
translated: And in the Lita, the aṇ.

original: lang gi sh'a ka t'a ya na'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: lang gi sh'a ka t'a ya na'i nges pa'o //
translated: The rule of the Lankiśākaṭāyana.

original: aa nu d'atta nye ba'i yul: ba no ti: ta no ti la sogs pa rnams kyi rjes su sna ldan dzhal ka nga 'gro ba la dbyi'o //
analyzed: aa nu d'atta nye ba'i yul: ba no ti: ta no ti la sogs pa rnams kyi rjes su sna ldan dzhal ka nga 'gro ba la dbyi'o //
translated: The near place, the anudāttu, the vanoti, the tanoti, and so forth, have the jhal ka affix for the meaning of going.

original: ba ma dag la yang na'o //
analyzed: ba ma dag la yang na'o //
translated: And for the bamas, the aṇ.

original: hanti'i dza'o // 'di la gzhi mnyam pa la ma grub po //🔽lung la'ang ngo //
analyzed: hanti'i dza'o // 'di la gzhi mnyam pa la ma grub po // lung la'ang ngo //
translated: The jha of the hanti. This is not established in the common basis.🔽And in the Vedas.

original: aa bhy'a sa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: aa bhy'a sa las kyang ngo //
translated: And from the abhyāsa.

original: ling la han gyi ba dha'o //
analyzed: ling la han gyi ba dha'o //
translated: linga-han-badha.

original: 'jig pa la hal la auta kyi 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa la hal la auta kyi 'phel ba'o //
translated: hal-la-uta-vṛddhi in destruction.

original: aina gyi yana'o //🔽lung la ain gyi g'a'o //
analyzed: aina gyi yana'o // lung la ain gyi g'a'o //
translated: ina-yan.🔽lung-ina-ga.

original: ka 'gro ba la ain gyi ring po'o //
analyzed: ka 'gro ba la ain gyi ring po'o //
translated: ka-gati-ina-dīrgha.

original: ae ti'i ling la'o //
analyzed: ae ti'i ling la'o //
translated: e-ti-linga.🔽asyati, vakti, khyāti—

original: aa sya ti: bakti: khy'a ti rnams @19a * //🔽las aanga'o // bid las lita'i yang na'o //
analyzed: aa sya ti: bakti: khy'a ti rnams @19a * // las aanga'o // bid las lita'i yang na'o //
translated: from these, aṅ.🔽vid-litī-yaṅ.

original: bi d'am kurbantu zhes pa yang na'o //🔽tan la sogs pa rnams las au'o //
analyzed: bi d'am kurbantu zhes pa yang na'o // tan la sogs pa rnams las au'o //
translated: vidāṃ kurvant iti—yaṅ.🔽tan-ādiṣu-au.

original: aata kyi auta byings thams cad pa la'o //
analyzed: aata kyi auta byings thams cad pa la'o //
translated: ata-uta-sarvanāmnām.

original: da'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: da'i 'ang ngo //
translated: dī-api.

original: shna aas dag gi aata dbyi'o //
analyzed: shna aas dag gi aata dbyi'o //
translated: śa-as-ata-dbyaṅ.

original: ghu aas dag gi hi la ae ste aa bhy'a sa dbyi ba'ang ngo //
analyzed: ghu aas dag gi hi la ae ste aa bhy'a sa dbyi ba'ang ngo //
translated: ghu-as-hi-ai-abhā-sya-dbyaṅ.🔽asti-bhū.

original: aasti'i bh'u'o // nyer bsgyur dang pr'a dur dag las aasti'i ya aa tsa pha rol la'o //
analyzed: aasti'i bh'u'o // nyer bsgyur dang pr'a dur dag las aasti'i ya aa tsa pha rol la'o //
translated: parā-duḥ-asti-ya-aca-para.

original: mri dzi'i 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: mri dzi'i 'phel ba'o //
translated: mṛji-vṛddhi.

original: ba tsa'i au ma'o //
analyzed: ba tsa'i au ma'o //
translated: vac-auma.

original: rud la sogs pa rnams las byings thams cad pa la'o //
analyzed: rud la sogs pa rnams las byings thams cad pa la'o //
translated: rud-ādiṣu-sarvanāmnām.

original: rud las kyang lnga rnams las so //
analyzed: rud las kyang lnga rnams las so //
translated: rud-api-pañca-su.

original: garga'i bu dang g'a la bdag gi aata'o //
analyzed: garga'i bu dang g'a la bdag gi aata'o //
translated: The son of Garga and the son of Gāla.

original: su: bi: ni: dur rnams las sva pi: s'u ti: sa ma rnams kyi'o //🔽aa ni ti'i yang na'o //
analyzed: su: bi: ni: dur rnams las sva pi: s'u ti: sa ma rnams kyi'o // aa ni ti'i yang na'o //
translated: Su, vi, ni, du, and ru are from sva, vi, ni, du, and ru.🔽A is from ati.

original: aa bhyasta las aata'o //
analyzed: aa bhyasta las aata'o //
translated: A is from abhyasta.

original: dzus la 'ang 'o //
analyzed: dzus la 'ang 'o //
translated: A is from juṣa.

original: dz'a gri gyi bi tsi na nal nga 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: dz'a gri gyi bi tsi na nal nga 'gro ba rnams ma yin pa rnams la'o //

analyzed: nga ri dr'a'i aita'o //

analyzed: shn'a aa bhyasta dag a'ata kyi'o // aa sti ma yin pa'i tip la'o //

analyzed: sip la byings kyi ru yang na'o // sh'as kyi aita aang hal dag la'o //
translated: A is from śa.🔽A is from kṣa.

original: hil sh'a'o // tsa ksh'ing gi khy'a nya'o //
analyzed: hil sh'a'o // tsa ksh'ing gi khy'a nya'o //
translated: A is from cakṣu.🔽A is from lita.
