analyzed: lit la yang na'o // a'i da dzan dag las dhva la 'ang ngo // sh'ing gi byings thams cad pa la yon tan no //

analyzed: sh'ing las ruta'o // lung lring dag la gdam nga'o //

original: ghu: m'a: sth'a: g'a: p'a dza h'a ti s'a rnams kyi hal la'o //
analyzed: ghu: m'a: sth'a: g'a: p'a dza h'a ti s'a rnams kyi hal la'o //
translated: The hal of ghu, ma, stha, ga, pa, ja, ha, ti, sa.

original: lit la g'anga'o //
analyzed: lit la g'anga'o //
translated: The ga of li, ta, la.

original: yi ai yig dag la d'i dh'i be b'i dag gi'o //
analyzed: yi ai yig dag la d'i dh'i be b'i dag gi'o //
translated: The gi of yi, ai, ya, i, ya, di, dhe, ve, di.

original: dvisha las kyang ngo //
analyzed: dvisha las kyang ngo //
translated: Also from dviṣ.

original: a'urno ti'i 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: a'urno ti'i 'dam ka'o //
translated: The option of ūrṇoti.

original: aa brikta la yon tan no //
analyzed: aa brikta la yon tan no //
translated: The quality of abrikta.

original: a'urno ti'i gdam nga'o //
analyzed: a'urno ti'i gdam nga'o //
translated: The option of ūrṇoti.

original: a'urnu'i yang na'o //
analyzed: a'urnu'i yang na'o //
translated: Also of ūrṇu.

original: aatsa dang po las gnyis pa'i'o //
analyzed: aatsa dang po las gnyis pa'i'o //
translated: The second of the first of a.

original: na da ra rnams brtsegs pa'i dang po rnams ma yin no //
analyzed: na da ra rnams brtsegs pa'i dang po rnams ma yin no //
translated: The first of the stacked nadis are not.

original: nu: ru: stu: sham: yam las byings thams cad pa la'o //
analyzed: nu: ru: stu: sham: yam las byings thams cad pa la'o //
translated: The all-base of nu, ru, stu, śma, ya.

original: br'u las a'ita'o //
analyzed: br'u las a'ita'o //
translated: The ā of brū.

original: br'u las dang po lnga rnams kyi ste br'u'i a'a ha'o //
analyzed: br'u las dang po lnga rnams kyi ste br'u'i a'a ha'o //
translated: The first five of brū, the ā of brū.

original: a'a ha'i tha'o //
analyzed: a'a ha'i tha'o //
translated: The tha of āha.

original: br'u'i ba tsi'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las aad la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: br'u'i ba tsi'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las aad la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The vac of brū. Thus the sutra of the nipātas ending in a and so on is complete.

original: // / dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams las shlu'o //
analyzed: // / dzu ho ti la sogs pa rnams las shlu'o //
translated: The ślu of juhoti and so on.

original: shlu la'o // bh'i hr'i: bhri hu rnams kyi shlu bzhin du yang ngo //
analyzed: shlu la'o // bh'i hr'i: bhri hu rnams kyi shlu bzhin du yang ngo //
translated: The ślu of ślu. The ślu of bī, hri, bhrū is also like that.

original: bh'i'i yang na'o //
analyzed: bh'i'i yang na'o //
translated: The na of bī.

original: aarti bi barti dag gi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: aarti bi barti dag gi 'ang ngo //
translated: Also of arati and vibhuti.

original: aoshti'i sngon ma yin pa'i auta'o //
analyzed: aoshti'i sngon ma yin pa'i auta'o //
translated: Also of ut of osthi.

original: dza h'a ti'i 'ang ngo//
analyzed: dza h'a ti'i 'ang ngo//
translated: Also of jah of jah.

original: @19b ghu ma yin pa'i hal la a'i'o //
analyzed: @19b ghu ma yin pa'i hal la a'i'o //
translated: Also of hal of ghum.

original: ya la dbyi'o //
analyzed: ya la dbyi'o //
translated: Also of ya of ya.

original: hi la a'a 'ang ngo //
analyzed: hi la a'a 'ang ngo //
translated: Also of hi of ha.

original: ni dza sogs gsum rnams kyi shlu la yon tan no //
analyzed: ni dza sogs gsum rnams kyi shlu la yon tan no //
translated: Also of shalu of the three, niza, etc.

original: byings thams cad pa aa tsa pa 'gro ba la aa bhyasta'i ma yin no //
analyzed: byings thams cad pa aa tsa pa 'gro ba la aa bhyasta'i ma yin no //
translated: Also of a of ac of all roots.

original: dza na: sa na: khan rnams kyi san dzhal dag la'o //
analyzed: dza na: sa na: khan rnams kyi san dzhal dag la'o //
translated: Also of san of jana, sana, khan.

original: da dha'i ta tha dag la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: da dha'i ta tha dag la 'ang ngo //
translated: Also of ta of dadha.

original: bhrinya rnams kyi aita'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las hu la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: bhrinya rnams kyi aita'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las hu la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: Also of ita of bhrin. These are the endings of the particles hu, etc.

original: // / dib la sogs pa rnams las shyana'o //
analyzed: // / dib la sogs pa rnams las shyana'o //
translated: Of dip, etc.

original: kri ta: tsri ta: tshri da: tri da: nri ta las si tsa ma yin pa'i sa la'o //
analyzed: kri ta: tsri ta: tshri da: tri da: nri ta las si tsa ma yin pa'i sa la'o //
translated: Of krit, krit, tshrit, trid, nrit, the sa is not compounded.

original: aota kyi shyan la'o //
analyzed: aota kyi shyan la'o //
translated: Of ota, of shyan.

original: r'a dhi la 'tshe ba la'o //
analyzed: r'a dhi la 'tshe ba la'o //
translated: Of radhi, of injury.

original: shli sha 'khyud pa la'o //
analyzed: shli sha 'khyud pa la'o //
translated: Of shli sha, of embrace.

original: ra dha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ra dha la sogs pa rnams las kyang ngo //
translated: Also of radha, etc.

original: ra dhi'i lit la ma yin pa'i ait la ma yin no //🔽na shi'i sha mtha'i'o //
analyzed: ra dhi'i lit la ma yin pa'i ait la ma yin no // na shi'i sha mtha'i'o //
translated: Not in the case of a word ending in i, but in the case of a word ending in i that is not rādhi.🔽The affix śa is added to the end of naś.

original: masdzi: na sha dag gi hal la numa'o //🔽sha ma sogs brgyad rnams kyi shyan la ring po'o //
analyzed: masdzi: na sha dag gi hal la numa'o // sha ma sogs brgyad rnams kyi shyan la ring po'o //
translated: The affix śa is added to the end of naś.🔽The affix śya is added to the end of the eight affixes beginning with śa.

original: aa sya ti'i thu ka'o //
analyzed: aa sya ti'i thu ka'o //
translated: The affix thu is added to the end of asya.

original: ya sa las nyer bsgyur med pa las so //
analyzed: ya sa las nyer bsgyur med pa las so //
translated: Without a preposition, from yasa.

original: sam yas las kyang ngo //
analyzed: sam yas las kyang ngo //
translated: Also from samya.

original: mi di'i yon tan no //🔽m'i n'a ti: mi no ti: d'ing rnams kyi lya pa la 'ang ngo /
analyzed: mi di'i yon tan no // m'i n'a ti: mi no ti: d'ing rnams kyi lya pa la 'ang ngo /
translated: The quality of a man.🔽The affix lyap is added to the end of the three, mi, na, and di.

original: d'ing ra rnams lyi lyap la'ang ngo //
analyzed: d'ing ra rnams lyi lyap la'ang ngo //
translated: The affix lyap is added to the end of the three, mi, na, and di.

original: d'i ra las aa tsaksha ru 'gro ba la yuta'o //🔽dzny'a dzan dag gi dz'a'o //
analyzed: d'i ra las aa tsaksha ru 'gro ba la yuta'o // dzny'a dzan dag gi dz'a'o //
translated: From di, the affix yut is added to the end of aru in the sense of going.🔽The affix ja is added to the end of jña and jña.

original: dza ni ba dhi dag gi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dza ni ba dhi dag gi 'ang ngo //
translated: The affix ja is also added to the end of jani and vaḍi.

original: pad las ta la tsina'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las di bu la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /🔽// / su la sogs pa rnams las shnu'o //
analyzed: pad las ta la tsina'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las di bu la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so / // / su la sogs pa rnams las shnu'o //
translated: From pa, the affix taci is added to the end of ta. Thus the affixes beginning with di are completed.🔽The affix śanu is added to the end of su and so on.

original: su na ti'i sya san dag la'o //
analyzed: su na ti'i sya san dag la'o //
translated: The affix syasanu is added to the end of su and na.

original: tsi'i 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: tsi'i 'dam ka'o //
translated: The affix ci is added to the end of ci.

original: rita las kyang brtsegs pa dang po las so //
analyzed: rita las kyang brtsegs pa dang po las so //
translated: The affix ta is also added to the end of rita.

original: ling se tsa dag gi a'atma ne pa da rnams la'o //
analyzed: ling se tsa dag gi a'atma ne pa da rnams la'o //
translated: The aṇ of the liṅs and the is of the atmanepada.

original: hi nu m'i n'a dag gi'o //
analyzed: hi nu m'i n'a dag gi'o //
translated: The iṇ of the hinum.

original: ha'i tsang ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: ha'i tsang ma yin pa la'o //
translated: The iṇ of the hīc.🔽The aṇ of the dhinvi and the kiṇvi.

original: dhinvi: kinvi dag gi aa 'ang ngo //🔽aashno ti'i 'ang ngo zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las su la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: dhinvi: kinvi dag gi aa 'ang ngo // aashno ti'i 'ang ngo zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las su la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The aṇ of the aśanoti.

original: // / tud la sogs pa rnams las sha'o //
analyzed: // / tud la sogs pa rnams las sha'o //
translated: The śaṇ of the tud and so on.

original: bhrasdza'i bhardza yang na'o //
analyzed: bhrasdza'i bhardza yang na'o //
translated: The bharja of the bhrāsja.

original: mutsa la sogs pa rnams kyi shala'o //
analyzed: mutsa la sogs pa rnams kyi shala'o //
translated: The śal of the muc and so on.

original: kir ti la gcod par byed pa la'o //
analyzed: kir ti la gcod par byed pa la'o //
translated: The kirti of the cheda.

original: aat aa bhy'as dag bar na yod kyang ngo //
analyzed: aat aa bhy'as dag bar na yod kyang ngo //
translated: The aṇ of the ata and abhyās.

original: 'tshe ba la pra ti las kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'tshe ba la pra ti las kyang ngo //
translated: The prati of the upaghāta.

original: aatsa la gdam nga'o //
analyzed: aatsa la gdam nga'o //
translated: The ac of the ācāra.

original: nir ni bi rnams las sphu ra ti sphu la ti dag gi'o //
analyzed: nir ni bi rnams las sphu ra ti sphu la ti dag gi'o //
translated: The sphur and sphul of the nirvi.

original: mi ya ti las lung ling dag gi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: mi ya ti las lung ling dag gi 'ang ngo //
translated: The liṅ of the miyāti.

original: bi dza las aita'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las tud la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: bi dza las aita'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las tud la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The iṭ of the vij.

original: // / ru dha la sogs pa rnams las shnama'o //
analyzed: // / ru dha la sogs pa rnams las shnama'o //
translated: The śaṇ of the rudha and so on.

original: tri na ha las ai ma'o //
analyzed: tri na ha las ai ma'o //
translated: from tri-na-ha, ai-mo;

original: shna las na dbyi'o //
analyzed: shna las na dbyi'o //
translated: from śa-na, na-dya;

original: aanydzi las @20a * //
analyzed: aanydzi las @20a * //
translated: from a-ñja-li,🔽si-ca-la.

original: sitsa la'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las ru dha la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: sitsa la'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las ru dha la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: Thus the Rudra and so forth are completed in the Pāṇini Vyakaraṇa Sūtra.

original: // / ta na la sogs pa rnams las ta th'as dag la'o //
analyzed: // / ta na la sogs pa rnams las ta th'as dag la'o //
translated: From ta-na and so forth, from ta-thā, da-ga;

original: ka ro ti las rtag tu'o //
analyzed: ka ro ti las rtag tu'o //
translated: from ka-roti, always;

original: aa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: aa la'ang ngo //
translated: from a-laṅ, also.

original: sam: pa ri au pa rnams las ka ro ti la rgyan la'o //
analyzed: sam: pa ri au pa rnams las ka ro ti la rgyan la'o //
translated: From saṃ, pari, upa, from ka-roti, ornament;

original: 'dus pa la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: 'dus pa la 'ang ngo //
translated: from saṃ-gati, also.

original: au pa las so sor 'bad pa dang: rnam 'gyur brjod pa dang: rtog pa rnams la'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las ta na la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: au pa las so sor 'bad pa dang: rnam 'gyur brjod pa dang: rtog pa rnams la'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las ta na la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: From u-pa, individual effort, expression of transformation, and imagination. Thus the ta-na and so forth are completed in the Pāṇini Vyakaraṇa Sūtra.

original: // / kr'i la sogs pa rnams las shn'a'o //
analyzed: // / kr'i la sogs pa rnams las shn'a'o //
translated: From kṛ and so forth, from śa-na.

original: stambhu: stumbhu: skambhu: skumbhu: sku nya rnams las shnu 'ang ngo //
analyzed: stambhu: stumbhu: skambhu: skumbhu: sku nya rnams las shnu 'ang ngo //
translated: From stambhuḥ, stumbhuḥ, skambhuḥ, skuṃbhuḥ, sku-nya, also śa-nu.

original: bi las ska bhn'a ti'i rtag tu'o //
analyzed: bi las ska bhn'a ti'i rtag tu'o //
translated: From vi, from ka-bhanati, always.

original: b'u la sogs pa rnams kyi thung ngu'o //
analyzed: b'u la sogs pa rnams kyi thung ngu'o //
translated: From bā-u and so forth, the short.

original: hal las shn'a'i sh'a na tsa hi la'o //
analyzed: hal las shn'a'i sh'a na tsa hi la'o //
translated: From hal, from śa-na, śā-na-ci-ha-la.

original: gra ha las lit ma yin pa la ring po'o //
analyzed: gra ha las lit ma yin pa la ring po'o //
translated: The long vowel is not in the case of graha, laghu, and matimān.

original: shr'i dr'i pr'i rnams kyi thung ngu'o //
analyzed: shr'i dr'i pr'i rnams kyi thung ngu'o //
translated: The short vowel is in the case of śrī, dhara, and pāra.

original: hal rnams so //
analyzed: hal rnams so //
translated: The hal is in the case of hal.

original: nir las kusha las so zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las kr'i la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: nir las kusha las so zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las kr'i la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The pa is in the case of nir, kuśa. Thus the section on kṛt and so on in the Pāṇini grammar is completed.

original: // / sa ty'a pa: p'a sha: r'u pa: b'i n'a: t'u la: shlo ka: se na: lo ma: tva tsa: barna: tsarma: ts'urna: tsu ra la sogs pa rnams las ni tsa'o //
analyzed: // / sa ty'a pa: p'a sha: r'u pa: b'i n'a: t'u la: shlo ka: se na: lo ma: tva tsa: barna: tsarma: ts'urna: tsu ra la sogs pa rnams las ni tsa'o //
translated: The ca is in the case of satya, pāśa, rūpa, veṇu, tūra, śloka, sena, loma, tva, varṇa, carma, cūrṇa, cūḍa, and so on.

original: ni tsa las kyang ngo //🔽au pa dh'a'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ni tsa las kyang ngo // au pa dh'a'i 'ang ngo //
translated: The ca is also in the case of niśa.🔽The ca is also in the case of upa°.

original: ga na'i a'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ga na'i a'i 'ang ngo //
translated: The ca is also in the case of gaṇa and ā.

original: aarti: hr'i: tsl'i: r'i: kr'u y'i: kshm'a y'i: a'ata rnams kyi ni la pu ka'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las tsu ra la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: aarti: hr'i: tsl'i: r'i: kr'u y'i: kshm'a y'i: a'ata rnams kyi ni la pu ka'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las tsu ra la sogs pa rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The pu is in the case of artha, hṛdaya, cala, rāga, kṛpā, kṣamā, and āt. Thus the section on cūḍa and so on in the Pāṇini grammar is completed.

original: // / rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu med pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: // / rgyu dang bcas pa dang rgyu med pa las kyang ngo //
translated: The ca is also in the case of sahetuka and ahetuka.

original: aak phyis pa dang sh'a su rita 'gro ba rnams kyi ma yin no //
analyzed: aak phyis pa dang sh'a su rita 'gro ba rnams kyi ma yin no //
translated: The ca is not in the case of akṛta and śāśvat.

original: ni la 'ang san tsang dag la'o //
analyzed: ni la 'ang san tsang dag la'o //
translated: In the Niṣadha, in the Saṃcaṇa.

original: stambhu: si bu sa ha rnams kyi tsang la'o //
analyzed: stambhu: si bu sa ha rnams kyi tsang la'o //
translated: In the Stambha, in the Siṃha, in the Sahasra, in the Caṅka.

original: ra bhi'i sha lit dag ma yin pa'i aatsa la'o //
analyzed: ra bhi'i sha lit dag ma yin pa'i aatsa la'o //
translated: In the Rabhi, in the Śalita, in the Acala, not in the non-Acala.

original: la bha'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: la bha'i 'ang ngo //
translated: In the Lava also.

original: a'u na ya ti: dhva na ya ti: ae la ya ti: aarda ya ti rnams las ma yin no //
analyzed: a'u na ya ti: dhva na ya ti: ae la ya ti: aarda ya ti rnams las ma yin no //
translated: Not in the Ānayati, in the Dhavanayati, in the Elāyāti, in the Ardayati.

original: smri: dri: tva ra: pratha: mra da: stri: spa sha rnams gyi aata'o //
analyzed: smri: dri: tva ra: pratha: mra da: stri: spa sha rnams gyi aata'o //
translated: In the Smṛ, in the Dri, in the Tva, in the Prtha, in the Mṛda, in the Stri, in the Spaśa, in the Aṭ.

original: beshti'i 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: beshti'i 'dam ka'o //
translated: In the Veṣṭi, optionally.

original: bhr'a dza: bhr'a sa: bh'a sha: d'i pa: dz'i pa: m'i la: p'i da rnams kyi lang na'o //
analyzed: bhr'a dza: bhr'a sa: bh'a sha: d'i pa: dz'i pa: m'i la: p'i da rnams kyi lang na'o //
translated: In the Bhraj, in the Bhās, in the Bhāṣa, in the Dīpa, in the Jīpa, in the Mīla, in the Padā, in the Laṅka.

original: ka na: ra na: ba na: bha na: shra na: hve nya: la pa: lu pa: lu tha: h'a aisha rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ka na: ra na: ba na: bha na: shra na: hve nya: la pa: lu pa: lu tha: h'a aisha rnams kyi 'ang ngo //
translated: In the Kana, in the Rana, in the Vana, in the Bhaṇa, in the Śraṇa, in the Havyū, in the Lāpa, in the Lup, in the Lutha, in the Hāiṣa, in the Ri.

original: ri'i rita'o // sv'a pa'i tsang la'o//
analyzed: ri'i rita'o // sv'a pa'i tsang la'o//
translated: In the Riri, in the Svapa, in the Caṅka.

original: sh'a: tsh'a: s'a: hv'a: by'a: ba: b'a rnams kyi yu ka'o //
analyzed: sh'a: tsh'a: s'a: hv'a: by'a: ba: b'a rnams kyi yu ka'o //
translated: In the Śa, in the Ṭa, in the Sa, in the Hva, in the Vya, in the Va, in the Vā, in the Yuka.

original: hv'a'i sam gra s'a ra na'o //
analyzed: hv'a'i sam gra s'a ra na'o //
translated: In the Hvai, in the Saṃgrāsaraṇa.

original: bi ba ti'i dbyi zhing aa bhy'a sa'i a'i ta'ang ngo //
analyzed: bi ba ti'i dbyi zhing aa bhy'a sa'i a'i ta'ang ngo //
translated: In the Vibati, in the Dvi, in the Avi, in the Iti, in the Aiti.

original: tishtha ti'i ai ta'o //
analyzed: tishtha ti'i ai ta'o //
translated: In the Tiṣṭhati, in the Iti.

original: dzi ghra ti'i yang na'o //
analyzed: dzi ghra ti'i yang na'o //
translated: jighratîti ca.

original: b'a'i rnam par g-yo ba la dzuka'o //
analyzed: b'a'i rnam par g-yo ba la dzuka'o //
translated: vâi vikṣepane juk.

original: l'i ya ti'i 'dam ka'o //🔽l'i l'i dag gi nuk lug dag yang na'o //
analyzed: l'i ya ti'i 'dam ka'o // l'i l'i dag gi nuk lug dag yang na'o //
translated: layatîti yatra.🔽layalau ca punar nuk.

original: l'i las kun nas gus pa dang gnod @20b pa dag la yang na'o //
analyzed: l'i las kun nas gus pa dang gnod @20b pa dag la yang na'o //
translated: layalau ca punaḥ kṛtānukaṃpāyāṃ ca.

original: be bhe ti'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o //🔽bh'ismi dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o //
analyzed: be bhe ti'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o // bh'ismi dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu la'o //
translated: vebhetau bhayakāraṇe.🔽bhayasmṛtitau bhayakāraṇe.

original: bh'i'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la shuka'o //
analyzed: bh'i'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la shuka'o //
translated: bhayakāraṇe śuk.

original: sma ya ti'i rtag tu'o //
analyzed: sma ya ti'i rtag tu'o //
translated: smayatîti nityaṃ.

original: sph'a y'i'i ba'o //
analyzed: sph'a y'i'i ba'o //
translated: sphayatîti vā.

original: sha di'i 'gro ba ma yin pa la ta'o //
analyzed: sha di'i 'gro ba ma yin pa la ta'o //
translated: śaḍîti agamanāya.

original: ru ha'i pa yang na'o //
analyzed: ru ha'i pa yang na'o //
translated: ruhatîti ca.

original: kr'i aing dzi rnams gyi nila'o //
analyzed: kr'i aing dzi rnams gyi nila'o //
translated: kṛīṃ jīrṇānāṃ nil.

original: ni la'ang san tsang dag la'o//
analyzed: ni la'ang san tsang dag la'o//
translated: nilāṃ ca saṃcārye.

original: si dhya ti'i 'jig rten pha rol nyid ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: si dhya ti'i 'jig rten pha rol nyid ma yin pa la'o //
translated: siddhatîti paralokāya.

original: tsi sphu ra dag gi ni la'o //
analyzed: tsi sphu ra dag gi ni la'o //
translated: ciṣphuradīnāṃ la.

original: b'i ya ti'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
analyzed: b'i ya ti'i rab tu skye ba la'o //
translated: vayatîti prajāyate.

original: au'i pu yan dzi aa pha rol la'o //
analyzed: au'i pu yan dzi aa pha rol la'o //
translated: ūpurāñjīti paratra.

original: sra ba ti: shri no ti: dra ba ti pra ba ti bla ba ti: bya ba ti rnams kyi yang na'o //
analyzed: sra ba ti: shri no ti: dra ba ti pra ba ti bla ba ti: bya ba ti rnams kyi yang na'o //
translated: sravatîti śrīṇotîti dravatîti pravatîti labhatîti kṛyatîti ca.

original: do sha'i ni la'o //
analyzed: do sha'i ni la'o //
translated: The short of the aṇ is in doṣa.

original: sems nyon mongs pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: sems nyon mongs pa la yang na'o //
translated: The long of the aṇ is in kleśa.

original: ma 'gro ba rnams kyi thung ngu'o //
analyzed: ma 'gro ba rnams kyi thung ngu'o //
translated: The short of the aṇ is in agotra.

original: dza n'i: dzr'i shu: kna sa: ranydza'i 'ang ma mtha'o //
analyzed: dza n'i: dzr'i shu: kna sa: ranydza'i 'ang ma mtha'o //
translated: The long of the aṇ is in jānīḥ, jarīṣu, kaṃsaḥ, and rājī.

original: 'chi ba dang dga' ba dang rno bar byed pa rnams la dzny'a'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba dang dga' ba dang rno bar byed pa rnams la dzny'a'o //
translated: The aṇ is in jñā, which means death, joy, and sharpness.

original: nyer bsgyur med pa las /
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa las /
translated: From the indeclinables.

original: dzva la: hva la: hma la: nam dang: gl'a: sn'a: ba na: ba ma'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dzva la: hva la: hma la: nam dang: gl'a: sn'a: ba na: ba ma'i 'ang ngo //
translated: The aṇ is in jvālā, hālā, haṃlā, namalā, galā, sanālā, and vāmī.

original: kam: aam: tsam gyi ma yin no //
analyzed: kam: aam: tsam gyi ma yin no //
translated: The aṇ is not in kam, am, and cam.

original: sha mu'i mi mthong ba la ma 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: sha mu'i mi mthong ba la ma 'gro ba'o //
translated: The aṇ is in asamu, which means not seeing.

original: ya mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: ya mu'i yongs su 'jug pa ma yin pa la'o //
translated: The aṇ is in ayamu, which means not engaging.

original: skha di'i aa ba dang pa ri dag las kyang ngo //
analyzed: skha di'i aa ba dang pa ri dag las kyang ngo //
translated: The aṇ is in sakhid, avat, and parī.

original: khong du chud pa ma yin pa la ni la ga mi'o //
analyzed: khong du chud pa ma yin pa la ni la ga mi'o //
translated: The aṇ is in laṅghami, which means not understood.

original: tsi na dang nal dag ma yin pa la han gyi ta'o //
analyzed: tsi na dang nal dag ma yin pa la han gyi ta'o //
translated: The aṇ is in haṃgī, which means not in ciṇ and nal.

original: a'irshya ti'i gsum pa'i gnyis so zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las nitsa mtha' can rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: a'irshya ti'i gsum pa'i gnyis so zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las nitsa mtha' can rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The third of aiṣya is so. The sūtra of the Pāṇini grammar is completed with the aṇ affix.

original: // / byings las las dang 'dod pa byed pa po mnyam pa las yang na'o //🔽au ai au pa dh'a hal dang po dang ra la las san 'ang ngo //🔽sa la aa bhy'a sa'i gnyis dag gi'o //
analyzed: // / byings las las dang 'dod pa byed pa po mnyam pa las yang na'o // au ai au pa dh'a hal dang po dang ra la las san 'ang ngo // sa la aa bhy'a sa'i gnyis dag gi'o //
translated: The affix ya is added to the root, and the affix ṇ to the root and the desire.🔽The affix upa is added to the first and the affix ṇ to ra.🔽The affix ṇ is added to sa and la.

original: hal mtha' las kyang ngo //🔽san la ait yang na'o //🔽aika las dzha la'o //
analyzed: hal mtha' las kyang ngo // san la ait yang na'o // aika las dzha la'o //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to the final hal.🔽The affix ṇ is added to sa.🔽The affix ṇ is added to eka.

original: aatsa han gam rnams kyi san la'o //
analyzed: aatsa han gam rnams kyi san la'o //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to aṅ, ac, and han.

original: san la 'ang ngo //
analyzed: san la 'ang ngo //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to sa.

original: aing gi 'ang ngo //
analyzed: aing gi 'ang ngo //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to iṅ.

original: gra ha gu ha dag gi'ang san la'o //
analyzed: gra ha gu ha dag gi'ang san la'o //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to graha and guha.

original: ru da: bi da: mu sha: gra hi: sva pi: pra tsha las san 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ru da: bi da: mu sha: gra hi: sva pi: pra tsha las san 'ang ngo //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to rud, vid, muṣ, grahi, and sva.

original: smi: b'ung: ri: aanydz'u: aa sha rnams kyi san la'o //
analyzed: smi: b'ung: ri: aanydz'u: aa sha rnams kyi san la'o //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to smṛ, bāhu, ri, aṅgu, and aśa.

original: kr'i las kyang lnga rnams las so //
analyzed: kr'i las kyang lnga rnams las so //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to the five kṛ.

original: a'i pa mtha' dang: ri dha: bhrasdza dambhu: shri spri: yu: a'urnu: bha ra: dzny'a pi: san rnams kyi san la'o //
analyzed: a'i pa mtha' dang: ri dha: bhrasdza dambhu: shri spri: yu: a'urnu: bha ra: dzny'a pi: san rnams kyi san la'o //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to the final ai, ri, dha, bhrāṣṭa, dambha, śrī, spṛś, yu, ūrṇā, bhāra, and jñāpi.

original: a'apa: dzny'a pi: ri dha rnams kyi a'ita'o //
analyzed: a'apa: dzny'a pi: ri dha rnams kyi a'ita'o //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to ṛ and dha.

original: dambha'i aita 'ang ngo //
analyzed: dambha'i aita 'ang ngo //
translated: The affix ṇ is added to dambha.

original: ta no ti'i 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: ta no ti'i 'dam ka'o //
translated: The case of the Tannotas.

original: san la: m'i: m'a: ghu: ra bha: la bha: sha ka pa ta rnams kyi aa tsa'i ai sha'o //
analyzed: san la: m'i: m'a: ghu: ra bha: la bha: sha ka pa ta rnams kyi aa tsa'i ai sha'o //
translated: The case of the San, La, Ma, Ga, Ghu, Ra, Bha, La, Bha, Sha, and Kapata.

original: mu tsa'i las ma yin pa'i yon tan la yang na'o //
analyzed: mu tsa'i las ma yin pa'i yon tan la yang na'o //
translated: The case of the Muci, and the case of the qualities that are not of the Muci.

original: stoo ti dang ni dag gi @21a * //
analyzed: stoo ti dang ni dag gi @21a * //
translated: The case of the Sto, and the case of the Dhi.

original: aa bhy'a sa'i 'o //🔽svi di: sva di: sa ha rnams kyis 'ang ngo zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las san mtha' can rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: aa bhy'a sa'i 'o // svi di: sva di: sa ha rnams kyis 'ang ngo zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las san mtha' can rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The case of the Avayasi.🔽The case of the Svi, Sva, and Saha.

original: // / byings aatsa gcig pa hal dang po las bya ba yang dag par sdud pa la yang ngo //🔽'gro ba la 'khyog po kho na la'o //
analyzed: // / byings aatsa gcig pa hal dang po las bya ba yang dag par sdud pa la yang ngo // 'gro ba la 'khyog po kho na la'o //
translated: The case of the Hal, which is the case of the single Aci, and the case of the correct collection of the actions.🔽The case of the Lupa, which is the case of the crooked going.

original: lu pa: sa da: tsa ra: dza pa: dza bha: da ha: da sha: gr'i rnams las smad pa nyid la'o //

original: ya'i hal las so //

original: gr'i'i yang la'o //
analyzed: gr'i'i yang la'o //

original: brdzun la dzny'a las so //
analyzed: brdzun la dzny'a las so //
translated: In the sense of to lie, [the suffix] jña is used.

original: las med pa las kyang ngo //
analyzed: las med pa las kyang ngo //
translated: It is also used in the sense of without action.

original: sam pra ti dag las dran pa ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: sam pra ti dag las dran pa ma yin pa la'o //
translated: In the sense of to be forgetful, [the suffix] samprati is used.

original: bad las gsal ba dang: nye bar 'dun pa dang: shes pa dang: 'bad pa dang: blo gros mtha' dad pa dang: nye bar bsngags pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: bad las gsal ba dang: nye bar 'dun pa dang: shes pa dang: 'bad pa dang: blo gros mtha' dad pa dang: nye bar bsngags pa rnams la'o //
translated: 'to be inclined', 'to know', 'to strive', 'to be intelligent', 'to be praised'.

original: gsal bar lhan cig brjod pa la'o //
analyzed: gsal bar lhan cig brjod pa la'o //
translated: from pra, 'to shine', 'to be manifest'.

original: aa nu las las med pa las so //
analyzed: aa nu las las med pa las so //
translated: from anu, 'to be without action'.

original: bi pra brjod pa la gdam nga'o //
analyzed: bi pra brjod pa la gdam nga'o //
translated: from vi, 'to speak', 'to choose'.

original: aa pa las gr'i las so //
analyzed: aa pa las gr'i las so //
translated: from apa, 'to be without'.

original: sam las dam bca' ba la'o //🔽auta las tsa ra las las dang bcas pa las so //
analyzed: sam las dam bca' ba la'o // auta las tsa ra las las dang bcas pa las so //
translated: from sam, 'to promise'.🔽from upa, 'to be with action'.

original: sam las gsum pa sbyor ba la'o //
analyzed: sam las gsum pa sbyor ba la'o //
translated: from sam, 'to be the third', 'to be connected'.

original: d'an las gal te bzhi pa'i don la'o //🔽au pa las yam las rang gi bya ba la'o //
analyzed: d'an las gal te bzhi pa'i don la'o // au pa las yam las rang gi bya ba la'o //
translated: from dā, 'to be the fourth', 'to have the meaning of the fourth'.🔽from upa, 'to be one's own action'.

original: au pa yam las 'dam ka'o //
analyzed: au pa yam las 'dam ka'o //
translated: from upayam, 'to be an option'.

original: dzny'a: shr'u: smri: dri sha rnams kyis na las so //
analyzed: dzny'a: shr'u: smri: dri sha rnams kyis na las so //
translated: from jña, śru, smṛ, dṛś, 'to be'.

original: aa nu las dzny'a las so //
analyzed: aa nu las dzny'a las so //
translated: from anu, 'to be jña'.

original: pra ti a'ang dag las shru las so //
analyzed: pra ti a'ang dag las shru las so //
translated: from prati, 'to be śru'.

original: ji ltar bklags pa la'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bklags pa la'o //
translated: 'as it is read'.

original: dngos po dang bya ba dag las so //
analyzed: dngos po dang bya ba dag las so //
translated: 'from a thing and an action'.

original: pra au pa dag las yu dzi las mchod sbyin gyi snod ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: pra au pa dag las yu dzi las mchod sbyin gyi snod ma yin pa la'o //
translated: From the Prācīnas, yuj from a non-vessel of sacrifice.

original: sam las kshu la'o //
analyzed: sam las kshu la'o //
translated: From sam, kṣu.

original: bhu dza las skyong ba ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: bhu dza las skyong ba ma yin pa la'o //
translated: From bhuj, a non-protector.

original: ni las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la'o //
analyzed: ni las 'bras bu ldan pa'i byed pa po la'o //
translated: From ni, the agent who possesses the result.

original: bklags pa rnam par bshad pa las so //
analyzed: bklags pa rnam par bshad pa las so //
translated: From the reading, the explanation.

original: @22b gri dhi panytsi dag las rab tu thob pa la'o //
analyzed: @22b gri dhi panytsi dag las rab tu thob pa la'o //
translated: From gri and dhi pañci, a complete acquisition.

original: ma thya nye ba'i tshig las krinya las yang yang la'o //
analyzed: ma thya nye ba'i tshig las krinya las yang yang la'o //
translated: From mat, a near word. From kṛt, again and again.

original: aa pa las ba da las so //
analyzed: aa pa las ba da las so //
translated: From apa, from bad.

original: sam auta a'ang rnams las yam las gzhung ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: sam auta a'ang rnams las yam las gzhung ma yin pa la'o //
translated: From sam, ut, and aṅ, yam from a non-text.

original: nyer bsgyur med pa las dzny'a las so //
analyzed: nyer bsgyur med pa las dzny'a las so //
translated: From the near word, jñā.

original: nye ba'i tshig rtogs pa la gdam pa'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las byings dang nyer bsgyur sbyor ba rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: nye ba'i tshig rtogs pa la gdam pa'o zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a ka ra na'i mdo las byings dang nyer bsgyur sbyor ba rnams rdzogs so /
translated: The selection of the near word is complete.

original: // / dngos po dang las las so //
analyzed: // / dngos po dang las las so //
translated: From thing and action.

original: byings thams cad pa rnams las yaka'o //
analyzed: byings thams cad pa rnams las yaka'o //
translated: From all the roots, yak.

original: dngos po dang las dag la tsina'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang las dag la tsina'o //
translated: From thing and action, cin.

original: dngos po dang las dag las nye ba'i yul dang han gra ha dri sha rnams kyi: sya: si tsa: s'i yut: t'a si rnams la tsin bzhin ait yang na'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang las dag las nye ba'i yul dang han gra ha dri sha rnams kyi: sya: si tsa: s'i yut: t'a si rnams la tsin bzhin ait yang na'o //
translated: From things and actions, to the proximate objects, the han, the gra, the ha, the dri, the sha, the sy, the si, the ts, the ci, the sai, the yu, the ta, the si, the rnams, the cin, the bzhi, the it, the yang, the na'o.

original: ta no ti'i yaka la'o //
analyzed: ta no ti'i yaka la'o //
translated: The ta, the no, the ti, the yak.

original: ta pa'i aa nu ta pa'i 'ang ngo //
analyzed: ta pa'i aa nu ta pa'i 'ang ngo //
translated: The ta, the pa, the anu, the ta, the pa, the 'ang.

original: tsin krit dag la a'ata las yuka'o //
analyzed: tsin krit dag la a'ata las yuka'o //
translated: The cin, the krit, the a, the ta, the yuk.

original: tsin na mul dag la ring bo yang na'o //
analyzed: tsin na mul dag la ring bo yang na'o //
translated: The cin, the na, the mul, the ring, the bo, the yang.

original: bham dzi'i tsin la'o //
analyzed: bham dzi'i tsin la'o //
translated: The bham, the ji, the cin.

original: tsin: na mul dag la yang na'o //
analyzed: tsin: na mul dag la yang na'o //
translated: The cin, the na, the mul, the yang.

original: bya ba'i las mnyam pa las can no //
analyzed: bya ba'i las mnyam pa las can no //
translated: The action is equal to the one with the karma.

original: ku shi: ranydza dag la shar pa rnams kyi shyan te pa rasmee pa da'ang ngo //🔽aatsa las las byed pa la'o //🔽ru dha las ma yin no //
analyzed: ku shi: ranydza dag la shar pa rnams kyi shyan te pa rasmee pa da'ang ngo // aatsa las las byed pa la'o // ru dha las ma yin no //
translated: The ku shi, the rnyaj, the rnams, the shar, the pa, the rsyan te, the par, the smin, the pa, the 'ang.🔽The a, the tsa, the las, the byed pa, the la.🔽The ru dha, the las, the ma yin no.

original: du ha: snu ha: nam rnams kyi yaka tsin dag ma yin no //
analyzed: du ha: snu ha: nam rnams kyi yaka tsin dag ma yin no //
translated: The du ha, the snu ha, the nam, the rnams, the yak, the cin, the dag, the ma yin no.

original: ni: shranthi: granthi: br'unya rnams la a'atma ne pa da ste las las yaka tsin dag ma yin no zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a kar na'i mdo las dngos po dang las rnams rdzogs so /
analyzed: ni: shranthi: granthi: br'unya rnams la a'atma ne pa da ste las las yaka tsin dag ma yin no zhes pa p'a ni ni by'a kar na'i mdo las dngos po dang las rnams rdzogs so /
translated: In the case of śraddhā, granthī, varūṇī, the a is changed to ā by the rule ātmā ne pade, and the a of aṅga is not changed to ā by the rule aṅgādyakārāntāḥ, and so the text is complete.

original: // / dngos su shes pa'i brjod pa la lrita'o //
analyzed: // / dngos su shes pa'i brjod pa la lrita'o //
translated: The word liṭ is used for the expression of direct knowledge.

original: yata la ma yin no //🔽de 'dod pa la yang na'o //
analyzed: yata la ma yin no // de 'dod pa la yang na'o //
translated: The word laṭ is not used.🔽The word laṭ is used for the optative mood.

original: lkog tu gyur pa la lita'o //🔽ha sha shvata dag las lid 'ang ngo //🔽yang dag par dri ba la'ang sdod pa'i dus la'o //🔽sma la lrita'o //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa la lita'o // ha sha shvata dag las lid 'ang ngo // yang dag par dri ba la'ang sdod pa'i dus la'o // sma la lrita'o //
translated: The word liṭ is used for the subjunctive mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the optative mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the subjunctive mood.

original: lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa la'ang ngo //
translated: The word liṭ is used for the optative mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the subjunctive mood.

original: na nu la dri pa so sor brjod pa la'o //🔽na nu dag las yang na'o //🔽sma ma yin pa la phur la lung 'ang ngo //
analyzed: na nu la dri pa so sor brjod pa la'o // na nu dag las yang na'o // sma ma yin pa la phur la lung 'ang ngo //
translated: The word liṭ is used for the optative mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the subjunctive mood.

analyzed: y'a bata pu r'a dag las nges tshig la lata'o // ka d'a karti dag las yang na'o //
translated: The word liṭ is used for the optative mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the subjunctive mood.

original: kim 'jug pa las 'dod pa la'o //🔽'dod pa can 'grub pa la'ang ngo //
analyzed: kim 'jug pa las 'dod pa la'o //🔽'dod pa can 'grub pa la'ang ngo //
translated: The word liṭ is used for the optative mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the subjunctive mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the optative mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the subjunctive mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the optative mood.🔽The word liṭ is used for the subjunctive mood.

original: lota'i don gyi mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: lota'i don gyi mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: In the sense of now, it is the present.

original: da ltar ba nye ba la da ltar ba bzhin yang na'o //
analyzed: da ltar ba nye ba la da ltar ba bzhin yang na'o //
translated: In the sense of near, it is the present, and also the past.

original: the tshom la 'das pa bzhin yang na'o //
analyzed: the tshom la 'das pa bzhin yang na'o //

original: mgyogs par brjod pa la lrita'o //
analyzed: mgyogs par brjod pa la lrita'o //

original: the tshom brjod pa la ling 'o //🔽aa pi dz'a tu dag las smod pa la lata'o //🔽ka tham la ling 'ang yang na'o //
analyzed: the tshom brjod pa la ling 'o // aa pi dz'a tu dag las smod pa la lata'o // ka tham la ling 'ang yang na'o //

original: kim 'jug pa la ling lrit dag go //
analyzed: kim 'jug pa la ling lrit dag go //

analyzed: kim ki la yod pa'i don rnams la lrita'o // dz'a tu yang dag las linga'o //

analyzed: lhag ma dang yi di ma yin pa la lrita'o // auta aa pi dag las legs pa'i don la linga'o //

analyzed: ling gi yul la bya ba shor ba dang byung ba la'ang lring rtag tu'o //

analyzed: srid pa las aa lam zhes pa gal te grub par mi sbyor ro //
translated: In the sense of what, it is the present, and also the past.🔽 In

analyzed: byings la srid pa brjod pa la ya di ma yin pa la yang na'o //
translated: The verbal root bhū means to exist.

analyzed: rgyu dang rgyu can dag la ling 'o //
